texts.en: Santos, 60, lives in his own home with his family, which is comprised of his life partner and 17-year-old son. Santos has worked in the transportation service industry for six years. This allows him to make a living and pay household expenses. Santos's living conditions are very modest and in bad condition so he would like to improve this. He is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in wood, cement, and sand to replace the deteriorating wood from his roof. He will also heighten the walls, which are very short right now.

loans.use: to buy wood, cement, and sand to repair the roof and walls of his home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 26 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de elotes, tamales y atol desde hace varios años, sus alimentos los prepara en su hogar para luego salir a comercializarlos por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y por ser un alimento muy vendible en esa zona, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clientela esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar leche, azúcar y elotes por mayor, para seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y asi poder junto con su familia tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is twenty-six years old and lives in her own house with her two children and her husband. She has made a living selling corn on the cob, tamales, and atol [a corn-based beverage] for several years. She prepares her foods so that she can go out later and sell them in the neighborhoods around her house. She has a large clientele due to her good prices and because the food is very marketable in the area. With help fromher husband and that which she earns from her work, they are able to cover some of the household expenses. 

The client is requesting a loan to buy milk, sugar, and corn on the cob at wholesale so that she can continue with her business which generates a good profit. With this she will be able to have a better quality of life along with her family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale milk, sugar, and corn on the cob.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, tin plates, yeast, and butter.

loans.name: Marleny Antonia

texts.es: Marleny de 39 años de edad vive en casas propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Marleny, 39, lives in her own home with her husband and their two children. She has a store where she sells basic necessity items such as beans, milk, eggs, and bread. She has had this business for many years and this has provided her with experience in sales, which allows her to earn more income. The store is in her home and she is well-known by her neighbors in the area. She has gained many customers because her store is well-stocked. She wants to grow her business and make another investment but she needs capital so she is requesting a loan to buy the necessary supplies for her store. She assures lenders that she will pay off her debt, and she also says that this will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, and drinks.

loans.name: Angela Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña angela de 44 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos,  Ella posee una tienda desde hace 2 años en su lugar de residencia donde vende pan, refrescos, aceites, verduras, frutas, golosinas y también de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo entre otras cosas con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar. Doña angela solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar.
texts.en:
Angela, 44, lives with her husband and two children. She has had a store at home for two years, where she sells bread, beverages, oil, vegetables, fruits and sweets, as well as soap and shampoo. With the profits she makes and with the help of her husband, they manage to cover their home expenses.

Angela is requesting a loan to stock her store in order to offer her customers a better service. Her sales will increase, which is important for her in order to get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy bread, beverages, oil, vegetables, fruits, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Maria Evelia

texts.es: María de 51 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Las condiciones habitacionales de María y su familia son muy humildes. Con el fin de mejorar su seguridad y la de su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, grava, arena y hierro. Expresa que con lo que percibe de su negocio de venta de antojitos típicos logrará pagar el las cuotas mensuales que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and lives with her family in a house of their own. María and her family live in very humble conditions.

María is requesting a loan at FUSAI in order to create safer conditions for her family. She will build a retaining wall and she needs bricks, cement, gravel, sand and iron bars.

María says that she will pay the installments with the profits she makes from selling traditional sweets and snacks.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, gravel, sand and iron bars to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Wilian Isaac

texts.es: Wilian tiene 31 años de edad  y reside solo en su propia casa. Él es un hombre muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para ganarse el sustento. ES muy conocido en su comunidad y sus vecinos dan muy buenas referencias ya que se caracteriza por ser trabajador y responsable. Wiliam desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para cambiar las deterioradas paredes que actualmente posee su  vivienda.
texts.en:
Wilian is 31 years old and lives alone in a house he owns. He is a hardworking man, who fights hard to make a living. He is well-known in his community and his neighbors give good references of him. He is a hardworking and responsible person. 

Wilian wants to make some home improvements, and this is why he is requesting a loan at FUSAI. He will buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to change the walls of his house, which are in bad shape.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to change the walls of his house, which are in bad shape.

loans.name: Reina De Los Angeles

texts.es: Reina de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 13 y 20 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, Reina es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace 10 años se decidió en poner una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de estos años, Cuenta con mucha clientela que la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos buscan, Reina solicita un prestamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que Dde esta manera logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Reina, 46, lives with her husband and two children aged 13 and 20 in a house of their own. Her children are students and she is an enterprising and hardworking woman. Ten years ago, she decided to open a small store and she has been able to keep it running with effort and dedication. She has many customers, who prefer her because they always find what they are looking for.

Reina is requesting a loan at INTEGRAL to invest in her store and stock it with all kinds of products, such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, toilet paper, detergent and many more products that her customers need. She is confident that in this way she will be able to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, etc. for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials to install a gate

loans.name: Ana Dolores

texts.es: Ana tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su esposo y sus dos hijos de 17 años y 8 años de edad. Ana se gana la vida por medio de la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una pequeña tienda que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado adecuar en su lugar de residencia. Ana desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica ya que no cuenta con el servicio. Además, desea enrejar la vivienda para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: hierro y una puerta. Espera poder tener acceso a esta vivienda y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 36 years old and lives with her husband and two children aged 17 and 8 in a house of their own. Ana makes a living selling essential supplies in a small store that she opened at home with a lot of effort.

Ana wants to improve their living conditions and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI. She will pay for the installation of electricity, a service she lacks at the moment. She is also thinking to fence her house and for this she needs materials such as iron and a door. She hopes to be able to make the improvements she has in mind in order to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for the installation of electricity and to buy materials to fence her house.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofia de 61 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus nietos de 16 años y 14 años de edad. Sofía se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Su deseo es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita esta crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro para reparar  las paredes de la vivienda las cuales son de bajareque y se encuentran dañadas. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así proceder a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Sofía is 61 years old. She lives in a house that she owns with her grandchildren, aged 16 and 14. Sofía has been working as a housekeeper for a long time. She would like to make some home improvements and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI.

She will buy bricks, sand, cement and iron bars to repair the walls of her house, which are made of bajareque [wattle and daub] and are in bad conditions. She hopes to receive this loan in order to start working as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement and iron bars to change the walls of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tiles, wood and beams to improve the roof of his house

loans.name: Blanca Trinidad

texts.es: Blanca de 42 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos de 23 años, 21 años y 15 años de edad. Blanca posee una pequeña tienda en su comunidad en la cual vende variedad de artículos. Blanca hace todo lo que esta a su alcance para  dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de construir un pequeño cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, grava, arena  y pagar mano de obra para la construcción del dormitorio.
texts.en:
Blanca, 42, lives with her children, aged 23, 21 and 15, in a house of their own. She has a small store where she sells a wide variety of things. She does everything she can to improve her children’s living conditions.

Blanca has decided to build a small bedroom and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI. She will buy cement, gravel and sand, and will pay for the labor needed.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel and sand and pay for the labor needed to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Maria Silvia

texts.es: María de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos y un nieto. María trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace tres años y de esta forma lleva el sustento a sus hijos y mantiene la economía de su hogar. Ella solicita a FUSAI este crédito para invertir en la construcción de una fosa séptica para lo cual necesita comprar  materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y tubos. Confía que con los ingresos que percibe de su trabajo logrará cancelar las cuotas que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Maria, 36, lives in her own home with her children and a grandchild.  Maria has worked as a domestic for 3 years; this is how she supports her children and the household finances.  Maria is requesting this loan from FUSAI to build a septic tank.  To do this, she will need to purchase materials such as bricks, cement, sand, and pipes.  Maria is confident that with the income she earns from her work, she will be able to make the loan payments and pay off the debt.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a septic tank

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra de 24 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 5 años de edad. Sandra se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Sandra desea mejorar el las condiciones de uno de los cuartos de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera y así comenzar las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en: Sandra, 24, lives in her own house with her life partner and their young, 5 year-old daughter.  Sandra has been earning a living working as a domestic for a long time.  She wants to improve the condition of one of the rooms in her house.  For this reason, she has approached FUSAI to request a loan to buy sheets of corrugated metal and wood.  This way she can start making the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair one of the rooms in her house

loans.name: Andres Hernan

texts.es: Andres de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 19 años y 11 años de edad. Él trabaja como albañil desde hace 22 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro perimetral para lo cual necesita comprar maya ciclón y postes de cemento y así dar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en: Andres, 49, lives in his own home with his wife and their 2 children aged 19 and 11.  He has been working as a bricklayer for 22 years.  This is how he earns a living and supports his household.  With the aim of providing his family with better security, he decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a wall around his house.  To do this, he must buy chain link fence and cement posts.  This way, he can provide his family with greater security.

loans.use: to buy chain link fencing and cement posts to build a wall around his house

loans.name: Tania Yaneth

texts.es: Tania de 19 años de edad habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su compañero de vida  y sus dos hijos. Tania es muy trabajadora y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Ella se gana la vida mediante prestación de servicios domésticos y mediante la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo. Tania desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, lámina y clavos.
texts.en: Tania, 19, lives in very humble conditions with her life partner and their two children.  Tania is very hardworking and responsible, and she does everything she can to give her children better living conditions.  Tania earns a living by working as a domestic, and also by selling beauty products through a catalog.  She wants to improve her living conditions; this is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy building materials such as wood, corrugated metal, and nails.

loans.use: to buy wood, corrugated metal and nails to improve the condition of her home

loans.name: Rafaela Francisca

texts.es: Rafaela tiene 47 años d edad y se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante desde hace 4 años por lo que cuenta con mucha experiencia y clientes. Rafaela solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto para la hija ya que su vivienda es pequeña y no hay mucho espacio para toda la familia. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en:
Rafaela, 47, sells cosmetics via catalogue.  She has done this work as a street vendor for four years, so she has a lot of experience and customers.

Rafaela's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in building a room for her daughter.  Her house is small and there's not much room for the whole family.  She's going to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails with the requested amount.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails

loans.name: Pedro Lorenzo

texts.es: Pedro tiene 58 años de edad y trabaja como fotógrafo en eventos especiales y otros. Es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su esposa e hijos mejores condiciones. Pedro solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un servicio sanitario ya que el que tenia en uso colapso y es necesario construir uno nuevo. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en: Pedro, 58, works as a photographer for special events and other occasions.  He is a very hardworking and responsible man who does everything he can to give his wife and children better living conditions.  Pedro is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in building a bathroom, because the one he had been using collapsed, and he needs to build a new one.  With the sum he is requesting, he will buy sheets of corrugated metal, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, cement, sand and iron

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es: María tiene 54 años de edad y se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Junto a su compañero de vida mantienen a sus tres hijas 21 años, 17 años y 14 años de edad. María habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y desea reparar el techo de la misma por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina galvanizada para hacer el cambio del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Maria, 54, has been working as a domestic for a long time.  Along with her life partner, she has 3 daughters aged 21, 17, and 14.  Maria lives with her family in very humble conditions.  She wants to repair the roof on her home, and so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase wood and sheets of corrugated metal so that she can put in a new roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair her roof

loans.name: Isaia Walberto

texts.es: Isaia de 44 años d edad reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 22 años, 16 años y 11 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Isaia trabaja como empleado desde hace mucho tiempo en una empresa cercana de su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a sus hijos. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una letrina ya que la que tiene se encuentra colapsada. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina, galvanizada, ladrillo, hierro y cemento.
texts.en:
Isaia, 44, lives in his own house with his life partner and his three children, ages 22, 16, and 11, who attend school.

Isaia has been an employee in a company near his town for a long time.  This is how he earns a living and supports his children.

He's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in building a latrine, because the current one is broken.  With the requested amount he'll buy galvanized metal sheets, bricks, rebar, and cement.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, brick, rebar, and cement to build a latrine

loans.name: Elvira De Los Angeles

texts.es: Elvira de 53 años de edad habita en casa propia  desde hace mucho tiempo y se dedica a los oficios domésticos desde hace tres años.  Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Elvira solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una galera para bodega ya que su vivienda es pequeña y no tiene mucho espacio para sus pocas pertenencias. Con el crédito solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
53-year-old Elvira has lived in her own house for a long time and for 3 years has earned a living doing domestic work. She is a very hard-working woman who does everything she possibly can to provide for her household. 

Elvira is asking for this loan from FUSAI to build an outbuilding to use for storage since her house is small and she does not have much space for her few belongings. With the requested loan she will buy laminated sheets and wood.

loans.use: to buy galvanised sheets and wood to build an outbuilding to use as a storeroom.

loans.name: Rosa Evelin

texts.es: Rosa de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo. Rosa se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que  este a su alcance para ayudar a la economía del hogar. Rosa desea construir el techo del corredor de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y teja.
texts.en: Rosa is 39 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and her son. Rosa earns a living selling vegetables at the central market in her local area. She is a very hard-working woman who does everything she possibly can to help the household finances. Rosa wants to build a roof on the passageway outside her home so she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy wood and tiles.

loans.use: to buy wood and tiles to put a roof on the passageway of her home.

loans.name: Mercedes Yolanda

texts.es: Mercedes de 66 años de edad es una mujer admirable ya que es muy conocida en su localidad como una mujer trabajadora y responsable. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace mucho tiempo. Dicho negocio es muy importante ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Mercedes desea reparar el techo de su vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y no es muy seguro. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Mercedes, 66, is an admirable woman who is very well known in her town as being a hard worker and responsible.  For quite some time she has been running a store and the business is very important because it is her main source of income.  Mercedes wants to repair the roof of her house which is dilapidated and not very safe.  Therefore she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy wood and metal sheeting.

loans.use: To buy wood and metal sheeting to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Etbel Jeannette

texts.es: Etbel de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 12 y 18 años de edad, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de cosmeticos, lociones, perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, etc.  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Etbel esta solicitando un credito a INTEGRAL para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio ya que le genera buenas ganancias y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Etbel, 44, lives in her own house with her husband and two children, ages 12 and 18.  For several years she has been selling cosmetics, lotions, perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc.  Her business is set up at home and the profits she earns, and help from her husband, go toward covering household expenses.  Etbel is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy more wholesale products so she can continue her business.  It generates a good profit, so she can give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, lotions, perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Samuel

texts.es: Carlos de 31 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa, su hija y un hijo quienes se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Carlos trabaja como carpintero dese hace 7 años. Es un hombre muy trabajador quien se gana la vida honradamente y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Carlos desea ampliar su pequeña galera donde con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer una pequeña carpintería la cual es muy importante ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en:
Carlos, 31, lives in his own house with his wife as well as his daughter and son, who attend public school in their town.

Carlos has worked as a carpenter for seven years.  He's a very hardworking man who earns an honorable living and does everything he can to support his household.

Carlos wants to expand his small workshop, where he has managed with a lot of effort to set up a small furniture store that's very important to him because it's his main source of income.  This is why he's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in buying galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es: Rosa tiene 20 años de edad y junto a su compañero de vida trabajan muy duro para sacar adelante a su pequeña hija. Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva desde hace dos años. Tiene mucha experiencia en el negocio por lo que ya posee muchos clientes que cada día  la prefieren más. Rosa desea hacer una pequeña ampliación a su pequeña vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava.
texts.en: Rosa, 20, lives with her common-law husband and they work hard to provide for their small daughter.  Rosa has been in business for two years selling new clothing.  She has a lot of experience and many customers who prefer her business to others.  She wants to carry out small improvements at home and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand and gravel.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand and gravel to renovate her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn, beans, pumpkin, pork cracklings and other products to make pupusas.

loans.name: Oscar Alfonso

texts.es: Oscar de 46 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su y sus dos hijos de 20 y 18 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Oscar es un hombre muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Oscar solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la terminación de las paredes de su vivienda ya que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar. Con el crédito solicitado comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y pagará mano de obra.
texts.en:
Oscar is 46 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their two children (aged 20 and 18 years old each). Both the children are in education. 

Oscar is very hard-working and is doing everything possible to give his family better living conditions. He is applying for this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in finishing the walls of his house. For financial reasons, Oscar has previously been unable to finish building them. With this loan, Oscar will buy bricks, cement, sand and iron and pay labourers.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron and to pay labourers to finish building the walls on his house.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es: Ana de 24 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar y  trabaja como empleada en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Ana desea construir un muro de retención frente a su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra para la construcción del muro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio lo antes posible a la construcción.
texts.en: Ana, 24, lives in her own home with her family and she works in a company near her town.  Ana wants to build a retention wall in front of her house and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron, and to hrie workers to build the wall.  She hopes she can count on this financing and begin construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand and iron, and to hire workers to build a retention wall.

loans.name: Juan Melquicedec

texts.es: Juan de 36 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia junto a sus padres. Juan trabaja como mecánico  desde hace 16 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Juan solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de dos puestas y tres ventanas para la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma ya que pronto se casará y desea tener lista la vivienda.
texts.en: Juan, 36, is single and lives in his own home with his parents.  He has been working as a mechanic for 16 years, earning a living and maintaining his household this way.  Juan is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy two doors and three windows for the house.  He also wants to put down a cement floor, which he will do himself, because he is getting married soon and wants to have the house ready.

loans.use: To buy two doors, three windows, cement, sand and gravel.

loans.name: Maria Fredesvinda

texts.es: María de de 63 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad. María es una mujer trabajadora quien se dedica a la venta de variedad de frutas como: limones, guineos, marañones, arrayán, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene a su familia. Ella desea reparar su  cocina dado que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y es necesario hacer cambio del material. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera, ladrillo, cemento y arena.
texts.en: María is 63 years old and lives in the house that she owns with her children, who are all now adults. María is a hard-working woman who makes a living selling a variety of fruits such as a lemons, bananas, cashews, myrtles and more. With this work, María earns a living and can support her family. María wants to repair her kitchen as, over time, it has deteriorated and she needs to replace some of the material. To do this, María is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy metal laminate sheeting, wood, bricks, cement and sand.

loans.use: to buy metal laminate sheeting, wood, bricks, cement and sand in order repair her kitchen.

loans.name: Raul Humberto

texts.es: Raul tiene 59 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Raul se gana la vida mediante la comercialización de mariscos los cuales vende en el mercado central de su localidad. Raul solicita a FUSAI este crédito para construir una pila y para comenzar un pequeño cuarto dormitorio para lo cual requiere de materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Raul is 59 years old and lives in the house that he owns with his partner and children. Raul makes a living selling seafood at the local market. Raul is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to build a sink and to start building a small dormitory. To do this work he needs to buy materials such as bricks, cement, sand, iron and galvanised laminate sheeting.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron and galvanised laminate sheeting to build a sink and start building a bedroom.

loans.name: Maria Bernarda

texts.es: María de 62 años de edad vive con su hija de 19 años de edad. María ha logrado sacar adelante a su hija y se siente orgullosa ya que actualmente está cursando una profesión universitaria. María se ha dedicado desde hace mucho tiempo ha vender antojitos típicos como Tostadas, atol de maíz, empanadas de frijol y de leche entre otros productos. Ella tiene un lugar especifico en su comunidad donde hace su venta, aunque cuando las ventas no son tan buenas tiene que caminar buena parte del pueblo. María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar materia prima para su negocio así como aceite, harina, azúcar, canela, maíz, guineo etc.
texts.en: María, 62, lives with her 19-year-old daughter who she has raised and is very proud of because she is currently studying at the university.  María has been in business for several years selling local snack foods such as tostadas, atol de maíz (corn flower drink), bean and milk empanadas (pies) and other products.  She works in a specific neighborhood of the village and even when sales are low she has to walk quite a ways through the village.  María is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy ingredients for her business such as oil, flour, sugar, cinnamon, corn, bananas, etc.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as oil, flour, sugar, cinnamon, corn, bananas, etc.

loans.name: Maria Felicita

texts.es: María de 63 años de edad se dedica desde hace 32 años a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado de su localidad. María es una persona muy carismática y muchas persona prefieren comprar sus productos ya que la forma como los atiende es muy agradable. María desea seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes mayor cantidad y variedad de productos por lo que ha solicitado a FUSAI para un crédito y poder comprar más productos como; Naranjas, Papayas, Tomate grande, Frijol, Maíz, Maicillo y otros más. María tiene un buen record crediticio.
texts.en: María, 63, has been selling fruits and vegetables at the local market for 32 years.  She is a very charismatic person and many people prefer to buy products from her because of her kind customer service.  María wants to continue offering her customers a wider variety of products so she is requesting a loan through FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy more products such as oranges, papayas, tomatoes, beans, corn, sorghum and other products.  María has a good credit record.

loans.use: To buy products such as oranges, papayas, tomatoes, beans, corn, sorghum and others.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora es una mujer muy trabajadora quien a sus 63 años se dedica a la venta de pollo. El negocio lo tiene desde hace 10 años el cual ha sido y sigue siendo muy importante ya que con lo que ella y su esposo perciben logran llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de su familia. Teodora solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para repellar las paredes de la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en: Teodora is 63 years old and is very hard-working. She makes a living selling chicken, a business which she has had for ten years. The business has been and continues to be very important for her as, with it, she and her husband earn a living to support their household and family economy. Teodora is applying for this loan from FUSAI so as to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to plaster the walls and cement the floor of her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to plaster the walls and cement the floor of her house.

loans.name: Jose Vicente

texts.es: jose de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos de 27, 26, 21 y 19 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, Jose es un hombre emprendedor y luchador. Hace 18 años se decidió en poner una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de estos años, Cuenta con mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos buscan, él solicita un prestamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jose is 58 years old and lives in the house that he owns with his wife and their four children, who are aged 27, 26, 21 and 19 years old, respectively. All of the children are in education. Jose is enterprising and feisty. Eighteen years ago he started his own little shop and, with a lot of effort and dedication, he has managed to keep it going all these years. He has many customers who prefer Jose's shop because he always has the products that they are looking for. Jose is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in his shop and to stock it up with all sorts of products, such as rice, beans, sugar, coffee, milk, sweets, oil, paper, detergent, and more products that customers like. Jose  is confident that, with this loan, he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, oil, paper and detergent.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana de 45 años de edad es madre soltera y aun tiene a su cargo un hijo menor de edad y viven en casa propia. Ana ha acomodado un pequeño negocio en su casa de habitación dedicándose a la elaboración de distintos platos de comida; siendo la predilecta para sus clientes la sopa de patas (plato típico del país con ingredientes de patas de vaca, verduras, y tripas). Ana ha visto un incremento del número de clientes y ya que necesita comprar más insumos para su negocio se ha dirigido a FUSAI para solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar más materia prima como; Chile verde, elotes, güisquil, Yuca, cebolla, plátano, pipian entre otros productos claves para una exquisita sopa de patas. Ana está muy confiada que podrá saldar la deuda que este crédito implica.
texts.en: Ana is 45 years old and a single mother. She is still responsible for her son, who is under 18. The two of them live together in a house that Ana owns. Ana also has a small business in her home, where she makes different dishes. To tempt her neighbours, Ana prepares "sopa de patas" (a typical Salvadoran soup made with cow's feet, tripe and vegetables). Ana has seen an increase in the number of customers and, as she needs to buy more supplies for her business, she has come to FUSAI to apply for a loan. This will allow her to buy basic ingredients, such as green chillis, corn on the cob, yucca, onions, plantains, chilli sauce and other key products necessary for making her delicious soup. Ana is very confident that she can pay off this loan.

loans.use: to buy more basic supplies such as green chillis, corn on the cob, yucca, onions, plantains, chilli sauce and other products for her food business.

loans.name: Marina De La Paz

texts.es: Doña Marina de 61 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos en casa del hijo mayor, ella se dedica a vender ropa y zapatos en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella desea acrecentar su negocio pero no tiene suficiente capital para poder realizarlo por eso solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar ropa por mayor para damas, caballeros y niños para tener mas clientela y asi pueda obtener mejores ingresos para tener lo necesario en su hogar sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en: Marina is 61 years old and lives in her eldest son's house. Marina makes a living selling clothes and shoes at the market near to her home. She has many customers because of the quality of her products, and the good prices. Marina is able to cover some household costs with her profits. She wants to expand her business but she does not have enough capital to do so. As a result Marina is applying for a loan which will allow her to buy men's, women's and children's clothes in order to have more customers and to earn a higher income and have everything she needs at home.

loans.use: to buy men's, women's and children's clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Alicia

texts.es: Ana de 45 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus hijo y sus padres. Ella se dedica a la venta de chocolate artesanal y a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace tres años. Ana desea construir una pila para almacenar el agua ya que actualmente utiliza barriles los cuales se encuentran picados y el agua se filtra. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena.
texts.en: Ana, who is 45 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house along with her son and her parents. For three years she has been selling artisanal chocolate and providing domestic services. Ana wants to construct a water trough to store water, since she now uses barrels, which are rotting and the water leaks out. To do this, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, and sand.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand to construct a water trough.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es: María de 53 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y  sus hijos de 16 años, 13 años y 8 años de edad. María se dedica a la crianza de pollo, venta de pollos y tamales. Las ventas las realiza d forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. María desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena,grava, teja y varilla para encementar el piso de la vivienda y para reparar el techo de la misma.
texts.en: Maria, who is 53 years old, lives in her own house along with her husband and their children, ages 16, 13, and 8. Maria raises chickens and sells chickens and tamales. She makes her sales as a street vendor in the different zones of her district. Maria wants to improve their living conditions, and so she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, gravel, tiles, and rods to cement the floor of her home and repair the roof.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, tiles, and rods to cement the floor of her house and to repair the roof.

loans.name: Wiliam Ernesto

texts.es: Wiliam tiene 19 años de edad y reside junto a su grupo familiar. Él es un joven muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para ayudar a su familia en la economía de su hogar. Él trabaja como ayudante de albañil desde hace mucho tiempo y así es como ayuda a su madre con los gastos diarios. Wiliam solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro.
texts.en: Wiliam is 19 years old and lives with his family. He is a very hard-working young man and is doing everything that he can in order to support his family with the household economy. Wiliam has been working as a builder's assistant for a long time now and, with this work, he helps his mother with daily costs. Wiliam is applying to FUSAI for this loan in order to build a bedroom in his home. To do this, he needs to buy materials, such as bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cements, sand, gravel and iron in order to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Maira Claribel

texts.es: Maira de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de 6 años de edad. Maira se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como yuca frita, enchiladas, pasteles de carne, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Maira desea construir un baño y cambiar el techo de la vivienda ya que esta deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y ladrillo y así dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Maira, who is 23 years old, lives in her own house along with her little son, who is 6 years old. Maira's work is selling typical foods such as fried yucca, enchiladas, meat pastries, etc. In this way she earns a living and brings sustenance to her household. Maira wants to construct a bathroom and change the roof of her house, since it is deteriorated. To do this, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement, sand, and bricks and thus begin the construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy sheets of galvanized metal, wood, cement, sand, and bricks to construct a bathroom and to repair the roof of her home

loans.name: Silvia Janet

texts.es: Silvia de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella  trabaja como costurera, se encarga de confeccionar ropa formal, uniformes y ropa casual, ella es alguien muy detallista quien desarrolla un trabajo muy bueno, lo que le permite contar con la fidelidad de muchos clientes amigos y vecinos. Silvia  elabora trabajos por encargo y así mismo elabora prendas de vestir para vender en su casa de habitación, con lo que puede obtener ganancias extras. Silvia  solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder comprar telas en diferentes colores y estampados, así mismo comprar hilo, agujas y todo lo necesario para elaborar la ropa con lo que pueda realizar más trabajos y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Silvia, who is 47 years old, lives in her own house with her family. She works as a seamstress and makes formal clothing, uniforms, and casual clothing. She is someone who is very detail-oriented, and she produces very good work, which allows her to have the loyalty of many customers, friends and neighbors. Silvia does work on order and she also makes articles of clothing to sell in her home, with which she can obtain extra income. Silvia is applying for a loan with the goal of being able to buy fabrics in different colors and patterns, as well as thread, needles, and everything necessary to make clothing; she will use these items to complete more work and thus obtain better earnings to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, needles, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Sandra Dinora

texts.es: Sandra de 32 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos de 11 años, 8 años y 4 años de edad. Sandra posee una pequeña tienda la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Tiene dos años de contar con su negocio por lo que cuanta con experiencia y muchos clientes. Sandra solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del techo ya que se encuentra deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y polines.
texts.en: Sandra, who is 32 years old, lives in her own house along with her husband and their children, ages 11, 8, and 4. Sandra has a little store that is her principal source of income. She has had this business for two years, and so she has experience and many customers. Sandra is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in improving the roof of her house, since it is deteriorated. With the amount she has applied for, she will buy galvanized metal sheets and purlins.

loans.use: to buy sheets of galvanized metal and purlins.

loans.name: Maria Ester

texts.es: María de 67 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar y se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 10 años. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. María desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para hacer el cambio del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: María, 67, lives in her own home with her family. She has earned her living as a domestic servant for 10 years. She is a very hardworking woman who does everything in her power to give her family a better life. María wants to repair the damaged roof of her house. She has applied for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized steel and wood to repair the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase materials to repair her roof.

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es: Cristino de 55 años de edad es un hombre trabajador quien se dedica a la agricultura y presta sus servicios en una institución pública de su localidad. Cristino habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 17 años, 10 años y 8 años de edad. Cristino solicita este crédito a FUSAI para construir una pila para almacenar el agua ya que actualmente almacena el agua en barriles los cuales se encuentran dañados y desperdicia mucha agua. Con el Crédito comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava para la construcción de la pila.
texts.en: Cristino, who is 55 years old, is a hard-working man who works in agriculture and also in a public institution in his district. Cristino lives in his own house along with his wife and their three children, ages 17, 10, and 8. Cristino is applying to FUSAI for this loan to construct a trough to store water, since now he stores water in barrels that are damaged and lose a lot of water. With the loan, he will buy bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to construct the trough.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to construct a water trough

loans.name: Rene Antonio

texts.es: Rene de 50 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus padres y trabaja como asistente contable en  un despacho contable cercano a su localidad.  Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para reparar el techo de  la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado  a causa del sol y las lluvias.  Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en: Rene, 50, lives in his own house with his parents. He works as a bookkeeper at an accounting firm near his home. In order to have better housing, he requests this loan from FUSAI to repair the roof of the house that has been damaged by the sun and rain. With the amount requested, he will buy galvanized sheet metal and wood.

loans.use: to purchase sheet metal and wood to repair his roof.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Ángel tiene 68 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeña hija de un año de edad. Ángel trabaja como auxiliar de albañil desde hace 10 años lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Desea reparar el techo de la casa ya que se encuentra dañado a causa del sol y las lluvias. Ángel solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: lámina galvanizada y madera para hacer el cambio respectivo de la cubierta del techo.
texts.en: Ángel is 68 years old. He lives in his own house along with his life companion and their little daughter who is one year old. Ángel has worked as a bricklayer's assistant for 10 years, and this allows him to bring sustenance to his household. He wants to repair the roof of his house, since it has been damaged by sun and rain. Ángel is applying to FUSAI for this loan to buy the necessary materials, such as sheets of galvanized metal and wood, to make these changes in the roof covering.

loans.use: to buy sheets of galvanized metal and wood to make changes in the roof covering of his home

loans.name: Elvis Emmanuel

texts.es: Elvis tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa familiar junto a su hija de 13 años de edad. Elvis trabaja como como motorista en una cooperativa cercana a su localidad.  Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para mejoramiento del techo de la vivienda.  Espera poder contar con  este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacerlo por su cuenta pero si con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Elvis, 31, lives in his family home with his 13-year-old daughter. Elvis drives a motorcycle taxi in a cooperative near his home. He has made the decision to apply for a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of wood and galvanized steel sheeting to improve his home. He hopes to have this funding because he does not have the capital available to do this work on his own. He agrees to pay the monthly repayment.

loans.use: to purchase steel sheeting and wood to improve his home's roof.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio de 66 años de edad habita junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia. Antonio trabaja como empelado en una cooperativa cercana a su localidad. Antonio desea mejorar el techo de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera y así hacer el cambio del techo lo antes posible y dar a su familia mayor seguridad.
texts.en: Antonio is 66 years old. He lives with his family in his own home. Antonio works as an employee in a coo-operative close to where he lives. Antonio wants to improve the roof of his house so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI. He will invest it buying galvanized laminate and wood and make the changes to his roof as soon as possible and provide his family with more security.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and wood to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: María de 31 años de edad se encuentra habitando en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas de 8 y 6 años de edad, quienes a la fecha se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. María se gana la vida por medio de la venta de flores, dicho negocio lo tiene desde hace 5 años  por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y clientes que cada día la prefieren más. María desea ampliar un curto de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, lámina galvanizada y cemento.
texts.en:
María is 31 years old. She lives in her own house with her life companion and her two children 6 and 8 years old. Both study at the local public school. María makes her living selling flowers, a business she has had for 5 years. She has much experience and clients who prefer her. 

María wants to enlarge a room in her house so she has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of bricks, galvanized laminate and cement.

loans.use: to buy bricks, galvanized laminate and cement to enlarge a room in her house.

loans.name: Evelio

texts.es: Evelio de de 54 años de edad trabaja muy duro y es muy conocido en su localidad como un hombre responsable y trabajador. Evelio trabaja como empleado en una cooperativa cercana a su localidad. Él desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Evelio  is 54 years old and works very hard. He is known locally as a responsible and hard-worker. Evelio works for a co-operative close to his residence. He wants to improve the roof of his home, so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized laminate and wood to proceed with the improvements as soon as he can.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and wood to repair the roof of his house,

loans.name: Blanca Antonia

texts.es: Blanca de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieto, desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta antojitos como: tamales, pupusas, yuca y papas frita, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Blanca esta solicitando un credito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios como: maíz, frijoles, quesillo, papas, yuca, verduras, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Blanca is 60 years old. She lives in her own home with her daughter and a grandson. She sells traditional foods like tamales, pupusas, yucca and fried potatoes, etc. Her business is located in her home and she manages to pay some of the household expenses with what she earns. 

Blanca is requesting a loan to buy necessary ingredients like corn, beans, cheese, potatoes, yucca, vegetables, etc so she can continue with her work. This is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cheese, potatoes, yucca, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Encarnacion

texts.es: Encarnación  tiene 56 años de edad y trabaja como empleado de una cooperativa cercana a su localidad. Es un hombre muy trabajador quien se esfuerza mucho para ganarse el sustento. Habita en casa propia la cual requiere mejoramiento de techo dado que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Encarnación is 56 years old and works as an employee at a co-operative close to where he resides. He is a hard-working man who makes a lot of effort to earn his living. He lives in his own house which needs some repairs as it has deteriorated over time. So he has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of  galvanized laminate and wood to proceed with the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and wood to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente reside en casa de sus padres junto con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos. El cliente se dedica  a la venta de juegos de video y accesorios para teléfonos desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y gracias a su amabilidad, creatividad y a la gran variedad de productos que mantiene ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes, El ciente ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar mayor variedad de juegos de video, estuches para teléfonos, audifonos, carcasas entre otras cosas y poder surtir su negocio de tal manera que logre obtener mejores ingresos para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
This client lives in his parents' home with his life partner and their two children. He has been selling video games and cell phone accessories for several years. His business is located in his home. Thanks to his kindness, creativity, and the wide variety of products he carries, he has been able to gain the trust of many customers.

This client has decided to request a loan from Integral in order to buy a greater variety of video games, cell phone cases, sleeves, earphones, and other items. This will allow him to stock his business in order to obtain higher income, so that he can have a better quality of life alongside his family.

loans.use: to buy a wider variety of video games, cell phone cases, sleeves, earphones, and other items.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es: Karla de 33 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su hijo de 13 años de edad. Karla trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace 8 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y desea dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a sus hijos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lamina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Karla is 33 years old. She lives in her own home with her 13 year old son. She has worked as a domestic employee for 8 years. She earns her living in this way and supports her household. She wants to improve the roof on her house as it is deteriorating and she wants to offer better living conditions for her child. So Karla has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized laminate and wood to repair the roof as quickly as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and wood to repair the roof on her house.

loans.name: Silvia Nohemy

texts.es: Silvia de 30 años de edad es una mujer que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora y responsable. Ella habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija. Silvia se dedica  ala venta de flores desde hace 12 años y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Silvia desea reparar las paredes de su humilde vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava. Expresa que con lo que percibe de su negocio logrará pagar las cuotas del crédito.
texts.en: Silvia, who is thirty years old, is known for being a hardworking and responsible woman. She lives in her own home with her life partner and their daughter. Silvia has been working selling flowers for twelve years, and that is how she provides for her family. Silvia wants to repair the walls in her humble home, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in bricks, cement, sand, and gravel. She states that she will be able to pay the loan installments with what she makes from her business.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to repair the walls in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 24 años de edad tiene un negocio de venta de tortas y hamburguesas desde hace varios años tiene muy buena clientela pues vende su comida a un buen precio, su negocio lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de su residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda en los gastos que hay en su casa, el clienta solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario para elaborar sus tortas y hamburguesas como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en su casa con los gastos que se le puedan presentar.
texts.en:
This client, who is 24 years old, has a business where he has been selling sandwiches and hamburgers for several years. He has a very good customer base because he sells his food at a good price. His business is located near his home, and the profit he makes helps him with his household expenses.

This client is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy everything he needs to make his sandwiches and hamburgers, such as bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, lunch meats, and other ingredients, so that he can have better earnings and continue helping out at home with expenses that may arise.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, lunch meats, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Carolina Estefany

texts.es: Carolina de 20 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo. Carolina se gana la vida por medio de la venta de verduras. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en un lugar fijo dentro del mercado y ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Ella desea repellar las paredes de la vivienda para protegerlas del sol y las lluvias para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena y así dar el mantenimiento a su vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Carolina is twenty years old and lives in her own home with her life partner and their little boy. Carolina makes a living selling vegetables. Her business is located in a permanent stand in the market and she already has lots of customers, who prefer her more and more each day. 

She wants to plaster the walls of her house in order to protect them from the sunlight and the rain, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing cement and sand so that she can carry out this maintenance project as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of her home.

loans.name: Mariana Luz

texts.es: Mariana de 48 años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijo en casa propia; ella posee una carpintería donde elabora y vende muebles, sillas, mesas, bancos, entre otros , tiene varios años con el negocio que lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia y le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, posee mucha clientela pues vende a precios accesibles y además el servicio es excelente; Mariana quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar madera por mayor, clavos, pintura, barniz etc. Mariana tiene la esperanza que podrá saldar su financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merece.
texts.en:
Mariana is 48 years old and lives with her two children in her own home. She owns a carpentry shop where she makes and sells furniture, chairs, tables, benches, and other things. Her business is set up in her home and has been running for several years. She has gained a lot of experience from it and it allows her to make the best profit. She has lots of customers because she sells her items at affordable prices and her service is also excellent. 

Mariana wants her business to expand, but she needs capital, which is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy wholesale wood, nails, paint, varnish, etc. Mariana is hopeful that she will be able to pay off her financing and at the same time give her family the quality of life that they deserve.

loans.use: madera por mayor, clavos, pintura, barniz etc.

loans.name: Ivon Lizeth

texts.es: Ivon de 43 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 13 y 10 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente. Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, frijoles, leche, golosinas, refrescos, etc.  últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con productos de excelente calidad a precios realmente accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Ivon es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere sentirse ganadora y para lograr el éxito sus mayores secretos son la constancia y la dedicación, esta dispuesta a hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, embutidos, golosinas, bebidas etc. Ella tiene la confianza que con su dedicación podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Ivon, who is 43 years old, lives with her husband and their two children, who are ages thirteen and ten and are currently in school. She owns a store where she sells basic staple goods like rice, beans, milk, sweets, soft drinks, etc. Lately she has gained a lot of customers because she always has what people need. She offers excellent quality products at really affordable prices and her service is unbeatable. 

Ivon is an enterprising woman who is very driven to get ahead. She wants to feel like a winner and she thinks that the greatest secrets to achieving success are perseverance and dedication. She is ready to expand her business, which is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to purchase basic grains, instant mixes, cold cuts, sweets, drinks, etc. She is confident that her dedication will enable her to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant mixes, cold cuts, sweets, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Mirna Cristabe

texts.es: Mirna de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija de 12 años de edad quien estudia actualmente, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de pescado su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y el producto que es de calidad, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Mirna esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de pescado por mayor asi como lo muestra la fotografía, para seguir con su trabajo y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mirna is 35 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and 12-year-old daughter. Her daughter currently goes to school. Mirna has worked for a number of years now selling fish. Her business is located in a market near her home. She has many customers because of her good prices and high-quality product. With the income she earns from her business and the help of her husband, they are able to pay some of their household expenses.

Mirna is requesting this loan to buy fish at wholesale prices and, as can be seen in the photograph, to continue with her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fish at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Alba America

texts.es: Alba de 34 años de edad es madre soltera vive con su hijo de 10 años de edad quien estudia actualmente, ella es una mujer luchadora y responsable para que a su hijo no le falte lo necesario para la subsistencia. Actualmente tiene un negocio de venta de comida cerca de su lugar de residencia en una fabrica indudustrial desde hace varios años, tiene mucha clientela fija pues da a un buen precio el plato de comida, alba desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima para variar su menú como: verduras, pollos, carne, arroz, frutas, etc. y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que solicita un crédito para comprar lo dicho; y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su hijo lo necesario sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
Alba is 34 years old and a single mother. She lives with her 10-year-old son, who goes to school. Alba has a fighting spirit, and she is responsible for providing for her son. She has for a number of years now operated a food stall in an industrial factory near her home. She has many steady customers because she offers her meals at good prices.

To increase her income, Alba would like to expand her business by buying tables and chairs and vary her menu by buying more ingredients, such as vegetables, chicken, meat, rice and fruit. Alba is requesting this loan because she does not have enough economic resources to make this investment. She hopes to improve her profit so she can give her son all he needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, and to buy ingredients such as vegetables, chicken, meat, rice and fruit.

loans.name: Arturo Napoleon

texts.es: Arturo de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa e hijos. Arturo se gana la vida  mediante el comercio de ganado. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia. Arturo desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y ademas, desea comprar dos ventanas para dar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en: Arturo is 39 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children. He has earned a living buying and selling livestock for a number of years now, which has given him a lot of experience. Arturo would like to improve the condition of his house. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of his house, which is damaged and needs repair. He would also like to buy two windows to improve his family’s security.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of his house, and to buy two windows.

loans.name: Marta Gladis

texts.es: Marta vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cinco hijos de 21, 16, 14, 10 y 3 años de edad los cuatro mayores estudian actualmente . Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que ella realiza es excelente y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles;ela es una mujer dedicada a su trabajo, responsable y honesta, Marta  esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas, y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y asi ella  podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Marta lives in her own home with her husband and five children, ages 21, 16, 14, 10 and 3. Her four oldest children are currently in school. She has a sewing workshop in her home in which she makes various articles of clothing. Recently she has been gaining many customers because of her excellent work and truly affordable prices. She is responsible, honest and dedicated to her work.

Marta is requesting this loan to buy fabrics, thread, buttons, needles and other sewing items. She hopes to continue satisfying her customers’ needs and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, buttons, needles and other sewing items.

loans.name: Jose Edgardo

texts.es: José tiene 21 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de un año de edad. José trabaja como empleada en una empresa cercana a su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de construir un fosa séptica solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de grava, cemento, arena, hierro y ladrillo para proceder a la construcción de la fosa lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Jose is 21 years old and lives in his own home with his partner and their one-year-old son. Jose works as an employee in a company near his town, which is how he earns a living and supports his family.

Jose would like to build a septic tank. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy gravel, cement, sand, iron and brick so that he can build the septic tank as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy gravel, cement, sand, iron and brick to build a septic tank.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es: Juan de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos. Él y su familia habitan en condiciones muy humildes  pero con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo van saliendo adelante. Juan trabaja en construcción desde hace 22 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto para lo cual necesita comprar: ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro  y grava.
texts.en: Juan is 49 years old and lives in his own home with his three children. He and his family live in humble conditions, but with a lot of effort and work they are getting ahead. Juan has worked in construction for 22 years now, which is how he earns a living and provides for his family. He decided to request this loan from FUSAI to buy brick, cement, sand, iron and gravel to build a room.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, sand, iron and gravel to build a room.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente habita en casa propia junto con su familia, el posee un taller de carpintería en el cual fabrica y vende variedad de muebles. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse al negocio y gracias a Dios y a su dedicación ha logrado mantenerlo en marcha. Muchas personas lo prefieren ya que él ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus muebles. Últimamente los clientes han aumentado y cada día la demanda es mayor. Su sueño es poder ver florecer su negocio y sabe que para eso tiene que invertir un poco más en la producción de tal forma que logre cubrir toda la demanda. Para esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de madera, clavos, pega, barniz y de más artículos que logren atraer a más clientes de tal forma que pueda logra su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: The borrower lives in his own home with his family. He has a carpentry workshop in which he makes and sells a variety of furniture. He has many years of experience with this business, and thanks to God and to his dedication, he has been able to keep it going. Many people prefer him for his high-quality furniture and good prices. Recently he has had more customers and every day demand for his products has increased. His dream is to see his business prosper, and he knows that for this to happen he must invest a little more now in his production to meet all of the demand. For this reason he decided to request this loan from Apoyo Integral to invest in his business and buy wood, nails, glue, varnish and other items to attract more customers. His goal is to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, glue and varnish, among others.

loans.name: Juan Nepanuceno

texts.es: juan de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposa, el se dedica al cultivo y venta de de maiz y frijol desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos asi como los muestra en la fotografía en los mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Juan esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, controles de plagas, etc. para seguir con sus siembras ya si obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan is 45 years old and lives in a home of his own with her three children and wife.  He has been raising and selling corn and beans for several years and sells his products, as shown in the photograph, in the local markets.  He uses his earnings to pay for some of his household expenses.  Juan is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers, compost, seeds, insecticides, etc. so he can continue planting, improve his income, and provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Raquel Guadalupe

texts.es: Raquel tiene 49 años de edad y su esposo emigro al extranjero en busca de mejores condiciones hace algunos años. Ella habita en casa propia junto a un sobrino y se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos ya que lo que le manda su esposo no le alcanza a cubrir los gastos del hogar. Raquel desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y necesita nuevos materiales. Por lo anterior solicita esta crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra lámina galvanizada y madera. Se compromete a cancelar el crédito en las fechas establecidas.
texts.en:
Raquel is 49 years old. Her husband emigrated to another country a number of years ago in search of better conditions. She lives in her own house along with a nephew. She works providing domestic services, because the amount her husband sends her does not cover her household expenses.

Raquel would like to repair the roof of her house, which is damaged and needs new materials. For this reason she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheeting and wood. She promises to pay off the loan within the established periods.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 25 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su madre, ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer honesta, trabajadora y sobre todo muy emprendedora. Hace varios años que logro establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar y gracias a Dios y a su arduo trabajo y dedicación el negocio es muy reconocido en la zona.
