Para ella es muy importante mantener activo este negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos, posee mucha clientela que la buscan por la calidad y las buenos precios de los productos, es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la tienda tales como: huevos, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, leche, frijoles, pan dulce y de más artículos que parezcan atractivos para los clientes. De esta manera espera lograr su sueño de seguir mantenido activo su negocio y por consecuencia seguir trabajando por un mejor futuro.
texts.en: The borrower is 25 years old and lives in her own home with her two children and her mother. She is known for being honest, hardworking, and above all, enterprising. A number of years ago she started a small grocery store in her home, which, thanks to God and to her hard work and dedication, is now well known in the neighborhood. It is very important for her to keep her business going, because it is her principal source of income. She has many customers who choose her because of the quality of her products and her good prices. For this reason, she decided to request this loan from Apoyo Integral to buy merchandise for her store, such as eggs, candy, sugar, rice, milk, beans, pan dulce [sweet baked goods] and other items that are attractive to her customers. She hopes to achieve her dream, which is to keep her business going and to continue working for a better future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store, such as eggs, candy, sugar, rice, milk, beans and pan dulce [sweet baked goods].

loans.name: Sara Elizabeth

texts.es: Sara de 38 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 19 años y 18 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta  de tortillas(preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz). Tiene 5 años de contar con el negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren mas. Sara desea reparar el techo de un cuarto de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir  en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo.
texts.en: Sara is 38 years old and lives with her husband and two children, ages 19 and 18 in a home of her own. She sells tortillas (made from corn flour).  She has been doing this for five years and has many customers who prefer to buy from her more and more.  She wants to repair the roof over her house, which is in bad shape and is asking for a loan, through FUSAI, to buy galvanized metal and lumber.

loans.use: to replace her roof.

loans.name: Felipe De Jesus

texts.es: Felipe de 54 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida con quien tienen tres hijos de 2, 6 y 9 años de edad. Felipe ha podido proveer a su familia de una vivienda digna, la que continua ampliando para que sus hijos se sientan bien dentro de ella. Él ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para continuar mejorando su vivienda con la pavimentación del área del corredor por lo que comprará cemento, arena, grava y regla pacha de pino para la elaboración del pavimento del corredor. Felipe, se compromete a solventar este crédito en el tiempo que el contrato así lo estipula para dejar las puertas siempre abiertas.
texts.en:
Felipe is 54 years old and lives with his life partner. They have three children, ages 2, 6 and 9.  Felipe has been able to provide his family with decent housing and he continues expanding the home so that his children feel comfortable in it.

He has requested a loan from FUSAI to continue improving his home by paving the passageway area. He will buy cement, sand, gravel for constructing the paved passageway, and pine struts as well. He promises to pay off this loan in the time stipulated in the contract, in order to leave the doors always open.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, and gravel for installing pavement in the passageway, as well as pine struts.

loans.name: Noel

texts.es: Noel de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus padres y sus hermanos todos trabaja y ayudan en los gastos del hogar, el se dedica desde hace 12 años a la elaboración y venta de hamacas, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clienta por ser un buen productos y a un buen precio, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias ayuda en los gastos del hogar, Noel esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos de colores por mayor para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi podrá obtener mejores ganancias para seguir ayudando a su familia en lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Noel is 31 years old and lives in a home of his own with his parents and siblings.  They all work and help with the household expenses.  He has been making and selling hammocks for 12 years and sells his products in the markets near his home.  He has many customers and good earnings that help with the household expenses.  Noel is asking for a loan to buy colored threads in quantity so he can continue his work, which is his only source of income.  This will allow him to increase his income so he can provide for his family without limitation.

loans.use: to buy threads.

loans.name: Rene Bautista

texts.es: Rene de 56 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos. Él trabaja como agricultor desde hace 37 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Rene desea construir un cuarto de adobes ya que su casa es pequeña y no hay mucho espacio para todos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de adobes, cemento y arena. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Rene is 56 years old and lives in a home of her own with her wife and children.  He has worked as a farmer for 37 years and earns a living and supports his family in this manner.  Rene ants to build an adobe room onto his small house which does not have enough room.  He is asking for a loan through FUSAI so he can buy adobe, cement, and sand.  He hopes to be able to get this loan so he can begin construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building material.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es: José de 24 años de edad vive con sus padres a quienes cuida con mucho esmero. José posee 2 manzanas de terreno con 450 arboles de naranjo manteniendo una producción constante por 6 meses al año, los otros 6 meses José trabaja como jornalero. Él a visto la necesidad de ampliar más el corredor de la vivienda de sus padres; techarla e instalar piso de ladrillo de cemento. Por lo que ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina  y madera para la estructura del techo, cemento, arena y grava para el encementado del corredor. José se compromete a solventar cada cuota que este crédito implica.
texts.en:
José is 24 years old and lives with his parents, whom he looks after with a great deal of care.  José has two manzanas of land (around 3.5 acres) with 450 orange trees, maintaining a constant production for six months of the year. The other six months José works as a day laborer. 

He has found it necessary to widen the passageway of his parents' home, put a roof on it and install a cement brick floor. So he has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy sheet metal and wood for the roof structure, and cement, sand and gravel for installing the cement floor of the passageway. 

José promises to make each payment that this loan entails.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal and wood for repairing the roof structure; cement, sand and gravel for paving the passageway.

loans.name: Jose Heriberto

texts.es: Jose de 34 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su compañera de vida y su hija, el se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas y verduras como: fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, piñas, melones, entre otros tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y con un excelente servicio; el quiere realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Jose tiene buenas referencias de pago, esta agradecido con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Jose is 34 years old and lives with his wife and daughter.  He buys and sells fruits and vegetables such as strawberries, bananas, oranges, tomatoes, onions, pineapples, and melons.  He has been doing this for several years and he has gained much experience that has allowed him to have better earnings.  His point of sale is in a strategic location and well-travelled.  He has many customers who prefer to buy from him because he offers good quality fresh products at good prices and provides excellent service.  He wants to make a new investment but doesn’t have enough capital, so he is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so he can buy fruits and vegetables in quantity.  Jose has good credit references, he is grateful for the support, and is certain that he can repay the loan.  He is also certain that he will be able to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Rosaura Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosaura de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; Rosaura es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor, para poder seguir con su negocio y asi darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosaura is 46 years old and lives in her own home with her two children.  She sells clothing and has been doing this for several years and this has provided her with lots of experience, making it possible to obtain better profits.  Her business is located in her home and she has many customers because they know that she provides quality items, affordable prices, and good customer service.  Rosaura is an entrepreneurial woman, dedicated to her work and who strives every day, through maximum effort, to earn a living.  Her customer demand has increased in the recent weeks and she wants to take advantage of this with a new investment, but she doesn’t have enough capital.  She is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so she can buy clothing in quantity to continue her business and provide a better quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Gustavo Alirio

texts.es: Gustavo de 31 años de edad está acompañado y tienen una niña de 2 años de edad. Gustavo es un agricultor que alquila 2.5 manzanas de terreno para sembrar maíz, frijol y algunas hortalizas, la mayor parte de lo que siembra lo vende y otra la deja para la alimentación de su familia. Gustavo desea realizar algunos reparaciones en su vivienda; en el área de la cocina el techo está deteriorado, el piso de cemento está agrietado el techo de su vivienda está muy deteriorado y el piso de cemento está agrietado. Gustavo solicitó un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina galvanizada, clavos, para reparar el techo y adquirir el cemento, arena, grava, regla riostra de pino para el encementado del área de cocina.
texts.en:
Gustavo is 31 years old and lives with his partner. They have a two-year-old child. Gustavo is a farmer who rents 2.5 manzanas (about 4.4 acres) of land for growing corn, beans and a few vegetables. The greater part of what he grows he sells, and uses the rest to feed his family. 

Gustavo wishes to do some repairs to his home; in the kitchen area the roof is in poor condition and the cement floor is cracked. 

Gustavo has requested a loan from FUSAI in order to buy galvanized sheet metal, nails and pine struts for repairing the roof, and to acquire the cement, sand, and gravel for installing a cement floor in the kitchen area.

loans.use: To buy galvanized sheet metal, pine struts and nails for repairing the roof and for acquiring the cement, sand, gravel for installing a cement floor in the kitchen area.

loans.name: Geronimo

texts.es: Gerónimo de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su hija de 12 años y su compañera de vida. Gerónimo es un hombre muy trabajador y desde hace 14 años aprendió el oficio de Albañilería por lo que en su municipio y lugares aledaños es ampliamente conocido y recomendado para trabajar en la construcción de diversas obras civiles. Gerónimo desea ampliar su humilde vivienda y construir con lámina y madera una nueva habitación y además encementar el piso de su vivienda. Gerónimo no posee el total del capital para la obra, por tal razón a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar madera, clavos, lámina galvanizada, arena, grava, cemento para la construcción de la habitación y encementar el piso.
texts.en:
Gerónimo is 50 years old and lives in his own home with his 12-year-old daughter and his life partner. Geronimo is a very hard-working man and 14 years ago learned the construction trade for which he is widely known in his municipality and surrounding areas. He is recommended for working on various civil construction projects. 

Geronimo wishes to enlarge his modest home and construct a new room with sheet metal and wood. In addition, he will install a cement floor in his home. Geronimo does not have all of the capital for the work and for this reason has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy wood, nails, galvanized sheet metal, sand, gravel, and cement for building the room and installing the cement floor.

loans.use: To buy wood, nails, sheet metal roofing, sand, gravel and cement for building a room and installing a cement floor.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: María de 37 años de edad está casada y tiene tres hijos en edad escolar. María junto a su esposo hace 18 años lograron adquirir un terreno y construir una pequeña vivienda. Hoy su vivienda necesita algunas reparaciones en el piso y en las paredes, que actualmente son de lámina galvanizada. María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para realizar las obras de instalación de ladrillo de cemento en todo el piso de su vivienda, sustituir algunas estructura de madera y las láminas de las paredes que están deterioradas. El dinero del crédito lo invertirá para pagar la mano de obra, comprará cemento, ladrillo de cemento para piso, arena, lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera.
texts.en:
María is 37 years old, married, and has three school-aged children. 18 years ago, Maria and her husband managed to acquire a parcel of land and build a small house. Now her home needs some repairs to the floor and to the walls, which currently are of galvanized sheet metal. 

Maria has requested a loan from FUSAI to undertake the work of installing cement bricks throughout the floor of her home and replace some structural wood and the sheet metal of the walls, both of which are in poor condition. She will use the loan money to pay for labor, and will buy cement, cement brick for the floor, sand, galvanized sheet metal, nails and wood.

loans.use: To buy cement brick, sand, cement, galvanized sheet metal, nails and wood, in order to repair the floor and replace some structural wood and sheet metal walls that are in poor condition.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moisés de 61 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y con  mucho esfuerzo han logrado establecer un pequeño comedor en el cual vende variedad de platillos a sus clientes. Moisés es un hombre trabajador y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para mantener la economía del hogar. Él desea ampliar las instalaciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: lámina, madera, ladrillo, y clavos para hacer un cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en: Moisés is 61 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife. With a lot of hard work, they have been able to set up a small restaurant where he sells a variety of dishes to his customers. Moisés is a hardworking and responsible man who does everything within his reach to support his family. He wants to add on to his house and that is why he is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy the materials he needs such as: sheeting, wood, bricks, and nails to make a bedroom.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, woods, bricks and nails to make a bedroom.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 27 años de edad vive el solo en casa alquilada. El posee una panadería en el cual elabora pan francés y pan dulce, posee mucha clientela por su amabilidad a la hora de vender y los precios muy accesibles. el es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre esta en busca de darle lo mejor a su familia, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, latas, levaduras, manteca, etc. y todo lo necesario para su panadería para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos, el tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The client is 27 years old. He lives alone in a rented house. He has a bread bakery where he makes French bread and sweet bread. he has a lot of customers because he is friendly when he sells to them and his prices are very accessible. He is a very hardworking man who is always looking for a way  to give his family the best. That is why he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy flour wholesale, and canned goods, yeast, lard, etc., everything he needs for his bread bakery to be able to keep doing his work, since this is his only source of income. He hopes that in this way, he can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour wholesale, and canned goods, yeast, lard, etc.

loans.name: Isaac Antonio

texts.es: Isaac tiene 19 años de edad y habita junto a sus padres en casa muy humilde. Él es un joven muy trabajador quien dese hace dos años se trabaja como mesero en un restaurante cercano a su localidad. Isaac desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda y para pintar las paredes de la misma. Con el monto solicitado comprará: lámina galvanizada, cemento y pintura. Esta consiente de la responsabilidad que el crédito implica y se compromete a pagar las cuotas mensuales en el tiempo correspondiente.
texts.en: Isaac is 19 years old. He lives with his parents in a very humble house. He is a hardworking young man who has worked as a waiter for two years in a restaurant close to where he lives. Isaac wants to improve the conditions of his home. That is why he is asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in repairing the roof and to paint its walls. With the amount he has asked for, he will buy: galvanized sheeting, cement and paint. He is aware of the responsibility that the loan implies and he is committed to making the monthly payments on time.

loans.use: to buy: galvanized sheeting, cement and paint to repair the roof of his house and paint its walls.

loans.name: Ana Silvia

texts.es: Ana de 50 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y su hija de 25 años de edad, ella se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir. El negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación. Ana es una mujer increíble y muy ejemplar ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable y positiva, además, muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona y de su trabajo. Elabora variedad de prendas de vestir  a precios muy accesibles. También ofrece calidad en su trabajo, razón por la cual muchas personas la prefieren. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y sobre todo con clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para  invertir en su pequeño negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: telas, hilos, elástico, etc. para la elaboración de variedad de prendas de vestir. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de dar un mejor servicio a los clientes de tal forma que los clientes se sientan motivados a seguir solicitando sus servicios y así sus ventas e ingresos se vean incrementados. Espera lograr su objetivo y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 50 years old. she lives in a house she owns with her husband and their 25 year old daughter. She works making and selling clothing. The business is located in her house. Ana is an incredible woman and a good role model because she is hardworking, responsible and positive. In addition, many people give good references about her as a person and her work. She makes a variety of clothing items at very accessible prices. She also offers quality work and that is why many people prefer her. She has been doing this work for many years. She has done this activity for several years and has a lot of experience and above all regular customers who prefer her more every day. She has made the decision to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to invest in her small business by buying materials she needs, such as fabric, threads, elastic, etc. to make a variety of items of clothing. She does all of this in order to give her customers better service so that they will be motivated to keep asking for her services and thus her sales and income will increase. She hopes to achieve her goal and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Leonel Eduardo

texts.es: Leonel tiene 41 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia junto a su familia. Leonel se dedica a la pesca desde hace 13 años y es así como se gana la vida y colabora con la economía del hogar. Leonel es muy trabajador y responsable y muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su familia desea mejorar el piso de la vivienda el cual es de cemento y desea cambiarlo por ladrillo. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo de piso y arena para hacer el cambio de piso y para repellar las paredes de la vivienda.
texts.en: Leonel, 41, is single and lives in his own home with his family. Leonel has been fisherman for 13 years and this is how he make a living to support his household. Leonel is very hard-working and responsible. Many people give good references for him. With the goal of improving the conditions of his home, and those of his family, he wants to improve the floor of his home, which is now cement. He wants to replace this with brick. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, brick flooring, and sand to improve the floor and plaster the walls in his home.

loans.use: to buy cement, brick flooring, and sand to improve the floor and plaster the walls in his home.

loans.name: Lidia Jeanethe

texts.es: Lidia es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 4 años. Ella es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 8 años y y su hijo de un año de edad. Con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a sus hijos solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una puerta, ventanas y balcones para la vivienda ya que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en: Lidia is a very hardworking woman who has earned her living through domestic services for 4 years. She is a single mother and lives in her own home with her 8 year old daughter and her one year old son. In order to give her children more security she is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in buying a door, windows, and balconies for the house, since due to a lack of resources she hasn't been able to do it on her own.

loans.use: to buy: a door, windows, and balconies for her house.

loans.name: Magaly Guadalupe

texts.es: Magaly de 39 años de edad, habita con sus tres hijos en casa propia su esposo vive en el extranjero y le ayuda económicamente. Magaly es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en su hogar de residencia. El negocio consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para ella lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Ella  sueña con dar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y sabe que la única fuente de ingresos es su pequeño negocio, por tanto no puede descuidarse de el, por lo que cada día trabaja duramente para por mantenerlo activo. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Magaly is 39 years old. She lives with her three children and her own house. Her husband lives abroad and helps her financially. Magaly is an enterprising woman who is a fighter. Some years ago, she decided to open a small business in her home. The business is a small store where with a lot of hard work and dedication she has been able to maintain it for several years. She has a lot of customers because for her the customers are the most important thing.  She always serves them with a smile and a lot of friendliness. That is the reason that she gained the trust of many in the area and she also has what the customers are looking for. She dreams of giving her children a better quality of life and she knows that the only source of income is her little business. That is why she can't neglect it, and every day she works hard to keep it active. It is for this reason that she was motivated to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to invest in her little store and stock it with every type of product, such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergent and more attractive products for her customers. She is confident that in this way, she will be bale to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper and detergent.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel tiene 68 años de edad y se dedica a la pesca desde hace 40 años. Es muy trabajador y responsable quien todos los días sale a pescar para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Habita en casa propia junto a esposa y desea hacer un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro ya que no cuenta con el capital necesario para hacer el desembolso pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Miguel, 68, has been a fisherman for 40 years. He is very hard-working and responsible. Every day, he sells fish to support his household. He lives in his own home with his wife and wants to add a fourth bedroom, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying bricks, cement, sand, and iron because he doesn't have the capital he needs for expenses. However, he does have the ability to make the payments for this loan.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron to build a fourth bedroom.

loans.name: Maria Daisy

texts.es: Maria de 48 años de edad, habita en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposo, Maria posee un negocio de venta de tortillas. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esa actividad razón por la cual ya es muy conocida en la zona y los clientes la prefieren por brindar un buen servicio y sobre todo higiene y buenos precios en sus tortillas. Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora cada día se esfuerza para poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para dar mantenimiento de la venta de tortillas comprando maiz por mayor y cal. Tiene mucha Fe que tendrá éxito con la decisión tomada y sus condiciones de vida poco a poco se irán trasformando de manera positiva.
texts.en:
Maria, 48, lives in her own home with her three children and her husband. Maria has a business selling tortillas. She has done this work for many years, so she is well-known in the area and her customers prefer her due to her good service and, above all, the cleanliness and good prices of her tortillas. She is a hard-working and enterprising woman who works every day to give her family a better quality of life.

She's decided to request a loan from Integral to perform maintenance on her tortilla sales by buying wholesale corn and lime powder. She has faith that she will be successful with this decision and her living conditions will make a positive transformation little by little.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn and lime powder.

loans.name: Jose Ernesto

texts.es: José es un hombre de 31 años de edad quien junto a su compañera de vida mantienen a sus hijos de 8 años y 11 años de edad.  José trabaja en su pequeño taller que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación. Elabora puertas, balcones, polines y portones y es así como se gana la vida honradamente y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Para mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de materiales como: cemento, arena, grava y láminas para encementar el piso de la vivienda que actualmente es de tierra y para cambiar unas láminas que están en mal estado.
texts.en: Jose, 31, takes care of his 8 and 11-year-old children along with his life partner. Jose works in a small workshop, which he has been able to establish in his home with much effort. He makes doors, balconies, joists, and gates. This is how he makes an honest living and supports his household. To improve his living conditions, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying materials such as cement, sand, gravel, and laminate to add a cement floor to his home and to replace some laminate that is in poor condition.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and laminate to add a cement floor to his home and to replace some laminate that is in poor condition.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 25 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija, ella es una joven muy trabajadora posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, siendo mujer sabe desempeñar muy bien su trabajo, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, hasta ahora el negocio le ha dado muy buenos resultados ya se hizo de mucha clientela pues la buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; ella quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para compra de material por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc. la clienta tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: This borrower, 25, lives with her life partner and her daughter. She is a young hard-worker who has a metal structures workshop. As a woman, she knows how to carry out her job, making doors, balconies, bars, and other items. She has several years of experience in this business and this experience helps her to improve her work every day. Thus far, this business has given her very good results. She has many customers who seek her out due to the high quality of her work, affordable prices, and most of all, because she does the work according to the customer's preferences. She wants to grow her business but needs capital to buy materials. Therefore, she is requesting a loan from Integral to buy iron, metal, tools, and other items. This lender has good credit references and she is sure that she will pay off this debt. This loan will also bring her economic stability.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, tools, and other items.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa de 43 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 17 años de edad quien se encuentra estudiando. Rosa es muy trabajadora ya que todos los días se dedica al comercio de verduras en el mercado municipal de su localidad. Rosa solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del piso de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena y grava para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Rosa, 43, lives with her husband and her 17-year-old son in a house of their own. Her son is a student. Rosa is a hardworking woman who sells vegetables at the local marketplace every day.

Rosa is requesting a loan from FUSAI. She will use it to improve the floor of her house. With the requested amount, she will buy cement, sand and gravel in order to start the works as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to improve the floor of her house.

loans.name: Yency Yohana

texts.es: Yency de 21 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 3 años de edad. Yency es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos de belleza desde hace tres años. Muchas personas la prefieren por que ofrece productos de buena calidad a muy buenos precios. Yency desea construir un cuarto en su terreno para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos. Espera poder tener accesos a este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacerlo por su cuenta pero si con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Yency, 21, lives in her own home with her life partner and her 3 year-old child.  She is a very hardworking woman who's had a business selling clothing and beauty products for 3 years.  Many people prefer her business because she offers good quality products at very good prices.  

Yency wants to build a room on her property, and so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in sheets of corrugated metal, wood, and nails.  She hopes to be able to access these funds, because she lacks the capital to do this on her own.  However, she has the capacity to make the monthly payments on this loan.

loans.use: to buy building materials to add a room

loans.name: Julia Elizabeth

texts.es: Julia de 32 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 9 años y 4 años de edad quienes se encuentran en edad escolar. Julia se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta en mucha experiencia y clientes que cada día la refieren más. Julia desea construir una pila con baño para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en  la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en:
Julia, 32, lives with her partner and two children aged 9 and 4 in a house of their own. Her children go to school and she sells clothes as a street vendor. She has been doing this for a long time, so she has good experience and her products are every day more appreciated by her customers.

Julia wants to build a concrete water tank and a bathroom, so she is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to build a concrete water tank and a bathroom.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: julio de 59 años de edad vive con esposa en casa propia, Julio es un hombre muy trabajador, responsable y muy emprendedor, desde hace varios años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside y también a la siembra de maiz y frijol. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas y concentrado para el ganado y  asi poder seguirle dando a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
Julio, 59, lives with his wife in a house of their own. He is a hardworking, responsible and enterprising man, who has been producing and selling dairy products in the area where he lives for some years now. He also grows corn and beans. He has a good customer base due to his ability to gain people’s trust.

The quality and price of his products are good and he has decided to invest in his animals, which are the foundation of his business. This is why he has requested a loan to buy vitamins and concentrated feed. He will be able to continue improving his family’s quality of life, without limitations.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and concentrated feed for his cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 20 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, su esposo es empleado de una comercial, ella se dedica a la venta de calzado desde hace 3 años su negocio lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en un lugar muy estratégico para la venta por esa razón posee mucha clientela que la prefieren por la calidad de sus productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su compañero de vida logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, La clienta esta solicitando un credito para la compra de calzado por mayor para poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir le dando a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
This borrower is 20 years old and lives with her life partner and her son in a house of their own. Her husband works for a distribution company, and she has been selling shoes for three years. Her store is located in a strategic area, close to her house, which is why she has many customers that prefer her products because of their good quality and price. With the profits she earns and the help of her husband, they manage to cover some of the home expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy shoes at wholesale, in order to increase her profits and continue to give her family everything they need, without limitations.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es: Vicenta tiene 50 años de edad y se dedica al comercio de tienda. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para ganarse la vida y mantener la economía del hogar. Vicenta solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena dado que desea repellar las paredes de la vivienda y no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Vicenta is 50 years old and works as a store clerk. She is a hardworking woman who does everything she can to make a living and maintain her family.

Vicente is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of her house. She does not have enough money to pay in cash, but she can pay the loan’s installments.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of her house.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: elsa de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, su sobrina y sus dos hermanos, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta y elaboración de pupusas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por la higiene que tiene a la hora de preparar los alimentos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo ayuda en los gastos de su casa, Elsa esta solicitando un credito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios como: quesillo, maiz, chicharrón, tomates, frijoles, repollos, etc. para seguir con su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias para seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
Elsa, 61, lives with her mother, her niece and two brothers in a house of their own. She has been making and selling pupusas [thick corn tortillas] for some years, at home. She has many customers, because of her hygiene standards and good prices. With what she earns, she helps to cover the home expenses.

Elsa is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as cheese, corn, shredded pork, tomatoes, beans and cabbage to continue selling her pupusas, increase her income, and continue helping her family.

loans.use: to buy cheese, corn, shredded pork, tomatoes, beans, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Maria Concepcio

texts.es: Doña María vive con su esposo y su hija en casa propia, ella tiene un negocio de venta de pupusas cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos de los gastos de su hogar. Cuenta con la satisfacción de tener clientela fija ya que esta ubicado en un lugar muy transitado. Doña Maria desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, más materia prima como: maíz, frijoles, chicharrón, quesillo y todo lo necesario para su negocio y asi tener un poco  mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y poder comprar lo dicho y así obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her husband and daughter in her own home.  She's had a business selling pupusas (a traditional Salvadoran dish made with a thick corn tortilla) near her home for a number of years.  With the earnings she gets from her sales, she is able to cover some of the household expenses.  

Maria has the satisfaction of having a regular clientele, because she’s located at a very busy place. She wants to expand her business by purchasing  tables, chairs, and raw materials like corn, beans, pork, cheese, and everything else she needs for her business so that her income will improve a bit.  However, she lacks the funds to make this investment.  This is why she approached INTEGRAL to request a loan to purchase the aforementioned items.  In this way, she will increase her earnings and have better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, cheese, beans, corn, pork, etc.

loans.name: Maria Dominga

texts.es: María de 34 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su hija y su esposo quien es empleado de una empresa. María se dedica a la venta y elaboración de tortillas, posee mucha clientela ya que vende las mejores tortillas y calientitas, María trabaja de lunes a domingo cada mediodía y cada tarde, ella es una persona amable, responsable y muy dedicada a su hogar. ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar maíz por mayor y obtenerlo a precios más bajos, lo que le permitirá obtener más ganancias en sus ventas,y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria, 34, lives in her own home with her daughter and her husband, who works for a company.  Maria has a business making and selling tortillas.  She has a lot of customers because she sells the best, piping hot tortillas.  Maria works every day at noontime and in the evening.  She is a kind and responsible person who is devoted to her household.  Maria is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn at wholesale to get the lowest price.  This will enable her to increase her profits from her sales, and thereby give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale

loans.name: Cruz Maria

texts.es: Cruz de 41 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hija y nieta. Ella posee un molino de nixtamal en el cual muchas personas llegan a moler variedad de semillas como: maíz, frijoles, arroz,etc. Además, posee una pequeña pupuseria (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.) que le permite percibir otros ingresos que le ayudan a cubrir los gastos del hogar. Desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de la vivienda ya que actualmente es de tierra.
texts.en:
Cruz, 41, lives in her own home with her daughter and granddaughter.  She has a mill where many people come to grind a variety of grains such as: corn, beans, rice, etc.  She also has a business selling pupusas (a traditional dish made out of cornmeal, beans, cheese, etc.)  This business allows her to earn additional income to help cover the household expenses.  

Cruz wants to improve the condition of her house, and so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, and gravel.  She wants to put a cement floor in her house, because currently it has an earthen floor.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to put a cement floor in her house

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 26 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su compañero de vida logran salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar materia prima como: quesillo, frijoles, maiz, chicharron, gaseosas, refrescos,etc. también mesas, sillas y todo lo necesario para su negocio y así poder obtener mejores ingresos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This borrower is 26 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner.  She's had a business selling pupusas (a traditional dish made with a thick corn tortilla) for a number of years.  Her business is located in her home.  With the earnings she obtains from the business, and with the help of her partner, she is able to cover the household expenses.  

This borrower is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as: cheese, beans, corn, pork, soft drinks, other beverages, etc.  She also wants to buy tables, chairs, and everything else she needs for her business.  This way, she can increase her income and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cheese, beans, corn, pork, soft drinks, tables, chairs, etc.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María de 34 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 6 años y 2 años de edad. María se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza desde hace dos años. Es muy trabajadora y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Con el fin de darle mayor seguridad a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas para la vivienda ya que las que tiene actualmente no son muy seguras.
texts.en: Maria, 34, lives in her own home with her life partner and their 2 children aged 6 and 2.  Maria's had a business selling beauty products for 2 years.  She is very hardworking and responsible, and she does everything she can to give her children better living conditions.  In order to give her family better security, she decided to request this loan from FUSAI to buy doors and windows for her home, because the ones she has now are not very secure.

loans.use: to buy doors and window for her home

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 20 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hijo y sus dos padres, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y el pipían, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la comercializa en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, semillas, herbicidas y todo lo necesario para empezar a realizar su siembra y así poder obtener mejores ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This borrower is a 20 year-old single mother who lives in her own home with her child and both of her parents.  For a number of years, she has been farming.  Her main crops are corn and squash.  When her harvest is ready, she sells her products in the various markets located close to her home.  With the earnings she obtains, she is able to cover some of the household expenses.  She is requesting a loan to buy organic and chemical fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, herbicides, and everything else she needs to start putting in her crops.  This way she will increase her earnings, and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Irvin Oswaldo

texts.es: Irvin tiene 23 años de edad y habita junto a sus padres y hermanos en casa familiar. Irvin trabaja como empleado en una empresa de transporte desde hace un año y es así como se gana la vida y colabora con la economía del hogar. Él desea ayudar a su familia con las mejoras de la vivienda y es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción del corredor de la vivienda para lo cual necesita materiales como: lámina galvanizada y polines.
texts.en: Irvin, 23, lives with his parents and siblings in the family's home.  Irvin has been working for a transportation company for a year.  This is how he earns a living and contributes to the household finances.  Irvin wants to help his family to make some improvements to their home.  This is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy materials to add a veranda to the house.  He will use these funds to buy construction materials such as sheets of corrugated metal and beams.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a veranda

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 57 años de edad  vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro,  santos es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante,con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Santos quiere mejorar su vivienda y terminar de construir uno cuartos para sus hijos, por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de arena, cemento, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra y asi poder terminar la construcción para que el su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Santos, 57, lives with his life partner and his children.  He makes a living growing corn and beans.  He has been in agriculture for a long time, so he has a lot of experience in that field.

Santos is an enterprising man who very much wants to get ahead.  With what he earns from his sales he's able to cover some of the household expenses.

Santos wants to improve his home and finish building some rooms for his children, so he's requesting a loan to buy sand, cement, bricks, and rebar, and to pay for labor.  This way he can finish construction and he and his family can live with greater comfort and security.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, bricks, and rebar, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Roxana Katherinne

texts.es: Roxana de 22 años de edad habita en casa propia y trabaja como empleada en una empresa cercana a su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Roxana desea mejorar el techo de la vivienda ya que el que actualmente tiene se encuentre deteriorado. Roxana solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra lámina galvanizada, madera y teja para proceder a cambiar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Roxana, 22, lives in her own house and works for a business near her town to earn a living and support her family.

Roxana wants to improve the roof of her house because it has deteriorated.  She's asking FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and tiles so she can change the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and tiles for her roof

loans.name: Susana Herlinda

texts.es: Susana de 30 años de edad habita en casa propia junto  a su esposo y sus dos hijas de 6 y dos años de edad. Susana se dedica a la prestación de servicios y además tiene una pequeña tienda en la cual vende variedad de artículos de primera necesidad. Ella desea mejorar las condiciones del techo de la vivienda ya que cuando llueve se filtra el agua. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y nueva teja para asegurar la cubierta del techo.
texts.en:
Susana, 30, lives in her own house with her husband and her two children, ages 6 and 2.  She makes a living in the service sector and also has a small store where she sells a variety of necessities.

Susana wants to improve the roof of her house because it leaks when it rains.  She's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in buying galvanized metal sheets and new tiles to secure her roof.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets and new tile for her roof

loans.name: William Ernesto

texts.es: William de 30 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 7 años de edad y su hija de 2 años de edad. William trabaja en un taller de mecánica en el cual recibe un ingreso mensual que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Él desea mejorar el techo y la pared interna de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizad y madera para proceder lo antes posible a la mejora del techo y la pared interna.
texts.en:
William, who is thirty years old, lives in his own home with his life partner and their son and daughter, who are ages two and seven. William works for a car repair shop, from where he earns the monthly income that allows him to provide for his family. 

He wants to improve the roof and the inside of the walls in his home, which is why he is requesting this loan from FUSAI. He will invest in purchasing sheet metal and wood in order to start the improvements to the roof and interior walls as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal and wood to improve the roof and the inside of the walls of his home.

loans.name: Froilan De Jesus

texts.es: Froilan tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijas de 3 años, 12 años, 7 años y sus dos hijos de 8 años y 2 años de edad. Él trabaja como ganadero desde hace mucho tiempo tiempo y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar y da a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Froilan solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del piso de la vivienda ya que se encuentra en mal estado. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena y grava para reparar el piso de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Froilan is 36 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and their children. They have three girls, who are three, twelve, and seven years old, and two boys, who are eight and two. He has worked as a cattle rancher for many years, so that is how he provides for his family and gives them better living conditions. 

Froilan is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in improving the floor of the home, which is in disrepair. He will use the requested amount to buy cement, sand, and gravel in order to repair the floor of his home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to repair the floor in his home.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: A sus 73 años de edad Santiago trabaja como jornalero y además se dedica a la comercialización de arena. Es un hombre muy trabajador  ya que hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su familia mejores condiciones. Santiago habita en casa propia junto a compañera de vida y sus hijos y desea invertir en la construcción de dos paredes para construir un cuarto dentro de la vivienda. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para la construcción.
texts.en:
At his 73 years of age, Santiago works as a laborer and also selling sand. He is a very hard worker, and does everything that is in his power to give his family better living standards. 

Santiago lives in his own home with his life partner and their children, and he wants to invest in building two walls to create a new room in his house. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the materials he needs for the project, like bricks, sand, and iron.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron to build a room.

loans.name: Rosa Alicia

texts.es: Rosa de 49 años de dad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y le colaboran con la economía del hogar. Rosa se dedica a la compra y venta de maíz desde hace 10 años por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Rosa desea hacer algunas mejoras en su vivienda como ampliar el corredor, techarlo y encementarlo por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena, grava y una puerta  para la entrada de la vivienda.
texts.en: Rosa, who is 49 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and her adult children, who contribute to the household economy. Rosa has been working buying and selling corn for ten years, so she has a lot of experience and many customers who prefer her more and more every day. Rosa wants to make some improvements on her home, like widening the corridor, as well as roofing and cementing it. That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in purchasing sheet metal, cement, sand, gravel, and a new front door.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, cement, sand, gravel, and a new front door to improve her home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de refrescos, gaseosas, jugos, agua, etc. desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico para la venta por esa razón posee mucha clientela, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor y asi poder seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poderle dar a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client lives in her own house with her husband and children.  She has made a living for several years selling soft drinks, soda, juice, water, etc.  She has a lot of customers because her business is located in a very strategic location for sales.  With her husband's help, she manages to pay for some of their household expenses.

The client's requesting a loan to buy more products wholesale so she can continue with her business.

This is her only source of work to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, soda, juice, water, etc.

loans.name: Carmen Anneli

texts.es: Carmen tiene 31 años de edad y habita sola con su pequeña hija de 6 años de edad ya que hace algunos años se divorcio de su esposo. Ella trabaja como empleada en un centro de bienestar ubicado dentro de su localidad. Carmen Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la conexión del servicio de agua potable  dado que no cuenta con el vital líquido.
texts.en: Carmen is 31 years old and lives alone with her little six-year-old daughter, because she divorced her husband a few years ago. She is employed with a welfare center located in her community. Carmen is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in connecting potable water utilities because she currently doesn't have this vital resource.

loans.use: to connect potable water utilities.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es: Haydee de 55 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y dos hijos de 22 años y 27 años de edad. Haydee se dedica al comercio de ropa y comida de forma ambulante desde hace 6 años por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Ella desea ampliar su negocio de venta de ropa ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos: por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de de ropa al por mayor como: faldas, camisas, vestidos, pantalones, ropa interior, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder invertir en el negocio con el fin de incrementar sus ventas y sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Haydee is 55 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and two children aged 22 and 27. Haydee makes a living selling clothing and food. She has worked as a street vendor for 6 years and so she has a lot of customers who increasingly choose her out of preference. 

Haydee wants to expand her clothing sales business since it is her main source of income and so she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy wholesale clothing such as skirts, shirts, dresses, trousers, underwear etc. She hopes to get the loan so she can invest in the business in order to increase her sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy skirts, shirts, dresses, trousers, underwear etc.

loans.name: Blanca Elizabeth

texts.es: Blanca tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 10 años y 11 años de edad. Blanca se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 3 años y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar y junto a su esposo dan a sus hijos mejores condiciones. Blanca ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI ya que no cuenta con el servicio de agua potable y desea hacer la instalación lo antes posible y no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso pero si cuenta con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Blanca is 27 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their two children, who are ages ten and eleven. Blanca has been working as a domestic for three years and that is how she provides for her family and, along with her husband, gives their children better living standards. 

Blanca has decided to request this loan from FUSAI because she doesn't have potable water utilities currently and wants to have the installation done as soon as possible. She doesn't have enough capital available to pay for it up front, but she does have the ability to pay monthly, and this loan will allow her to do so.

loans.use: to invest in connecting to potable water utilities.

loans.name: Arely

texts.es: Arely tiene 43 años de edad y es madre soltera de dos niñas de 17 años y 10 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y muy reconocida en su localidad como una mujer responsable. Arely trabaja como empleada desde hace dos años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva  el sustento a su hogar. Ella desea instalar el servicio de agua potable en su vivienda pero no cuenta con los recursos económicos para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta por leo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la conexión del agua potable en su vivienda que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: Arely is 43 years old and is a single mother of two girls, who are ages seventeen and ten. She is a very hard worker and she is well-known in her community for being a responsible woman. Arely has been working as a domestic for two years and that is how she earns a living and provides for her family. She wants to install potable water utilities in her home but she doesn't have enough financial resources to pay for the expense on her own. That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in connecting her home to the potable water she so badly needs.

loans.use: to invest in installing potable water in her home.

loans.name: Jose Amilcar

texts.es: José de 50 años de edad habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su esposa y sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar. Jose es un hombre admirable ya que trabaja muy duro  en la agricultura para dar a su familia mejores condiciones. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la conexión del servicio de agua potable dado que no cuenta con el servicio lo cual le genera muchos inconvenientes. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: José is fifty years old and lives in very humble conditions with his wife and his children, who help him with the household expenses. José is an admirable man, because he works very hard as a farmer so that he can give his family better living standards. In order to improve his living conditions, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in connecting potable water utilities, because he currently doesn't have that service, which is very inconvenient. He hopes to obtain this financing so that he can improve his and his family's living standards.

loans.use: to invest in connecting his home to potable water utilities.

loans.name: Maria Natalia

texts.es: María de 56 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre y un hijo de 20 años de edad. María es una mujer muy admirable quien ha trabajado toda su vida para mantener a su familia y llevar el pan de cada día. Trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace 2 años y de esta forma mantiene la economía al hogar. María desea invertir en la instalación del agua potable en su hogar dado que no cuenta con el servicio. En vista que no cuenta con el capital disponible para el desembolso solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del servicio de agua potable y así mejor sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
María, who is 56 years old, lives in her own home with her mother and a twenty-year-old son. María is a very admirable woman who has worked her whole life in order to support her family and provide for them. She has been working as a domestic for two years, which is how she is supporting her household economy. 

María wants to invest in installing potable water in her home, because she doesn't have this srevice currently. Since she doesn't have enough available capital for the expense, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in installing potable water utilities and improve her and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to connect to potable water utilities.

loans.name: Maria Vicenta

texts.es: María de 50 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 17 años y su hijo de 13 años de edad. María trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace 5 años y de esta forma va sacando adelante a sus hijos. Actualmente, María no cuenta con el servicio de agua potable por lo que desea instalar el servicio. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la conexión del servicio del agua potable y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: María, who is fifty years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own home with her seventeen-year-old daughter and her thirteen-year-old son. María has been working as a domestic for five years and that is how she supports her children. Currently María doesn't have potable water utilities, which is why she wants to install this service. For that reason she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in connecting to potable water utilities in order to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to connect to potable water utilities.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es: Albertina de 40 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Albertina habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y se gana la vida mediante la venta de verduras las cuales comercializa en la plaza cercana a su localidad. Albertina desea invertir en su negocio  de verduras ya que es muy importante para su subsistencia  por que con lo que percibe el esposo de su trabajo no logran cubrir los gastos del hogar. Albertina solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de verduras al por mayor como: zanahorias, papas, tomates, cebollas y pipianes.
texts.en:
Albertina, who is 40 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their children. Albertina and her family live in very basic conditions and she earns a living selling vegetables in the square near where she lives.

Albertina wants to invest in her vegetable business since it is very important in providing enough money for the family to survive on. The money her husband earns from his work is insufficient to cover the household expenses.

Albertina is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy wholesale vegetables such as carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, onions and pipián [type of squash].

loans.use: to buy carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, onions and pipián [type of squash]

loans.name: Maria Berta Araceli

texts.es: María de 56 años de edad habita en casa de propia junto a su compañero de vida y trabaja como empleada en una pupusería desde hace 12 años. María habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su pareja y desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y grava ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta pero si con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en: María, 56, lives with her life partner in a house of their own. She has been working as a clerk for a grocery store for twelve years. María and her partner live in very humble conditions and she wants to build a bedroom. This is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI, to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron bars and gravel. She does not have enough to pay for these materials in cash, but she can pay the loan’s monthly installments.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron bars and gravel to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Jacqueline Yesenia

texts.es: Jacqueline de 19 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa familiar junto a su grupo familiar. Ella es una joven admirable quien desde muy temprana edad ha trabajado para ganarse el sustento y ayudar a su familia. Se dedica a la venta de verduras en la plaza de su localidad. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio en la compra de verduras al por mayor como: papas, cebollas, tomates, pipianes, zanahorias, etc. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer el desembolso dado que no cuenta con el capital disponible.
texts.en:
Jacqueline, who is 19 years old, is single and lives in the family home with her family.  She is an admirable young woman who has worked from a very young age to support herself and help the family. She makes a living selling vegetables in the local market square.

In order to improve her income she has decided to invest in her business by buying wholesale vegetables such as potatoes, onions, tomatoes, pipian [type of squash], carrots etc. This is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to cover the outlay, as she does not have available capital.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, onions, tomatoes, pipian [type of squash], carrots etc.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana de 34 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y y sus cinco hijos. Ana se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace dos años y además posee una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la tienda como: frijoles, arroz, maíz, golosinas, pan dulce, detergente, etc. Confía que de esta forma logrará mejorar sus ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 34 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their five children. For two years Ana has earned a living doing domestic work and she also has a small shop in her home, which she has managed to set up with a great deal of hard work.

In order to improve her income she is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy stock for the shop such as beans, rice, corn, sweets, sweet bread, detergent etc. She is confident that this will help her to improve her income and consequently her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, corn, sweets, sweet bread, detergent etc.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: A sus 44 años de edad Isabel es madre soltera y habita junto a su pequeño hijo de 10 años de edad. Isabel se dedica a la venta de deliciosos sorbetes (helados de frutas) desde hace 5 años. De esta forma es como mantiene a su hijo y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Isabel desea  encementar el piso del corredor de la vivienda por lo que ha solicitado este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento y grava ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en:
44-year-old Isabel is a single mother who lives with her small son, who is 10. Isabel has been selling delicious “sorbetes” (frozen fruit juice) for five years; this is how she maintains her son and brings food to the table.

Isabel wants to lay some concrete on the floor of her corridor and she is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy sand, cement and gravel because she does not have the money she needs to do so.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and gravel to lay concrete on the floor of her corridor.

loans.name: Francis Geovani

texts.es: Francis de 35 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus cuatro hijos quienes lo motivan a seguir luchando por mejores condiciones de vida. Él se dedica a la venta de granos básicos como maíz, frijoles, arroz y azúcar en el mercado central de su localidad. Desea ampliar  su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de granos básicos para la venta y así poder mejorar sus ventas al igual que sus ganancias con el fin de dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Francis is 35 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their four children, who are his motivation to keep working hard for better living conditions. Francis makes a living selling basic grains such as corn, beans, rice and sugar in the local area's central market.

He wants to expand his business so he is asking FUSAI for this loan to buy larger quantities of basic grains to sell, so he can improve his sales and his profits in order to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Elmer Jovel

texts.es: Elmer tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de tres años de edad. Elmer se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos lo cual es su principal fuente de ingresos y desea invertir en su pequeña granja con el fin de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de  mayor cantidad de pollos y así poder cumplir su objetivo y mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer is 25 years old and lives in his own house with his partner and their little 3-year-old son. Elmer earns a living raising and selling chickens, which is his main source of income. He wants to invest in his small chicken farm in order to improve his sales and income.

For this reason he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy a large quantity of chickens so he can fulfil his objectives and improve his own and his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of chickens to fatten for sale.

loans.name: Ana Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 7 y 6 años de edad . Ana se gana la vida mediante la venta de mariscos, dicho negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante desde dos años. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos desea invertir en su negocio ya que es una de las principales fuentes de ingresos con las que cuentan dado que con lo que gana su compañero de vida no logran cubrir los gastos del hogar. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mariscos (camarones, pescado y conchas) al por mayor y así poder cumplir su objetivo.
texts.en:
Ana, 23, lives with her life partner and two children aged 7 and 6 in a house of their own. She makes a living selling seafood. She has been working as a street vendor for two years.

In order to improve her income, Ana is planning to invest in her business, which is one of the family’s main sources of income. Her life partner does not make enough to cover all the home expenses. This is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy seafood in bulk (shrimps, fish and shellfish) and be able to reach her goal.

loans.use: to buy seafood in bulk (shrimps, fish and shellfish).

loans.name: Estefany Emperatriz

texts.es: Estefany tiene 18 años de edad y junto a su compañero de vida han procreado un hijo quien tiene dos años de edad. Ella es una joven trabajadora y responsable tiene dos años de trabajar en una fábrica cercana a su localidad y junto a su compañero de vida complementan para cubrir los gastos del hogar. Estefany desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su familia es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y pagar la mano de obra para encementar el piso de su humilde vivienda. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Estefany is 18 years old. She and her life partner begot a child who is now two years old. She is a hardworking young woman who has been working for two years in a factory nearby. She and her life partner cover the home expenses together.

Estefany wishes to improve her family’s living conditions and is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy cement, sand and gravel, and pay for the labor needed to lay cement on the floor of her house. She hopes to receive this loan and proceed to fix the floor as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel, and pay for the labor needed to lay cement on her floor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, lime powder and beans at wholesale

loans.name: Sandra Marlene

texts.es: Sandra de 30 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 11 años, 8 años y 3 años de edad. Sandra se dedica a la venta de dulces artesanales desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar y junto a su compañero de vida mantienen a sus queridos hijos. Sandra habita en condiciones muy humildes y su vivienda necesita urgentemente cambió de techo ya que se encuentra deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, polines y pago de mano de obra.
texts.en:
Sandra, 30, lives with her life partner and three children aged 11, 8 and 3 in a house of their own. Sandra has been selling home-made sweets for a long time, and this is how she brings food to the table. Her husband helps her to sustain their beloved children.

Sandra lives in very humble conditions and the roof of her house needs to be repaired urgently because it is in bad shape. This is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheets and beams and to pay for the labor.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets and beams, and pay for the labor needed to fix her roof.

loans.name: Maria Genoveva
