texts.es: María tiene 56 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 2 años. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien habita junto a su madre en casa propia. María desea mejorar su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de verduras y frutas al por mayor como: tomates, papas, zanahorias, sandias, manzanas, guineos, etc. Espera que de esta forma poder mejorar sus ventas e ingresos y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is 56 years old. She has been selling fruits and vegetables for two years. She is a hardworking woman and lives with her mother in a house of their own.

María wants to improve her business, so she is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy vegetables and fruits in bulk, such as tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, watermelons, apples and bananas. She hopes to be able to increase her sales and in that way improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk, such as tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, watermelons, apples and bananas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of natural medicines at wholesale

loans.name: Hilda Cristabel

texts.es: Hilda de 27 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 3 años de edad. Hilda se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama y caballero. Tiene tres años de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Hilda ha solicitado a FUSAI este crédito dado que desea invertir en la compra de puertas para la vivienda y para comprar piezas de fibrolite para hacer una división en su vivienda puesto que consta de una sola área común.
texts.en: Hilda, 27, is a single mother who lives in her own home with her 3 year-old daughter.  Hilda has a business selling clothing for men and women.  She's had the business for 3 years, and so she has a lot of experience and customers who increasingly prefer her business.  Hilda is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in doors for her house, and to buy some pieces of Fibrolite (building board) to make a dividing wall in her house, because as of now the house consists only of one common area.

loans.use: to buy doors and pieces of building board to make divisions inside her house

loans.name: Gustavo Antonio

texts.es: Gustavo de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia y junto a su hermano mantienen la economía del hogar. Gustavo trabaja como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Trabaja muy duro para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su hogar y mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Gustavo solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un servicio sanitario por lo que necesita comprar material como: cemento, ladrillo, plancha de cemento,  taza y puerta de madera. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento dado que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en: Gustavo, 25, lives in his own house, and he and his brother support the household finances.  Gustavo works for a company near his home.  He works very hard in order to earn a living, support his household, and improve their living conditions.  Gustavo is requesting this loan from FUSAI to build a bathroom.  He needs to buy construction materials such as: cement, bricks, cement board, a toilet bowl, and a wooden door.  He hopes to be able to obtain this loan, because he lacks the available funds to make these purchases.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a bathroom

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel de 26 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo de dos años de edad. Manuel se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios de seguridad en una vivienda particular la cual cuida desde hace cuatro años. Manuel solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de materiales como: lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena y madera ya que desea reparar la cocina que actualmente se encuentra deteriorada. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inició a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Manuel is 26 years old. He lives in his own house along with his wife and their little son, who is 2 years old. Manual earns a living by providing security services at a private residence, which he has been caring for for four years. Manuel is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of materials such as galvanized metal sheeting, cement, sand, and wood, since he wants to repair the kitchen, which is now deteriorating. He hopes to be able to have this financing and thus begin the improvement as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, cement, sand, and wood to repair the kitchen

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maria de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus hijos y sus nietos, ella se dedica a la venta de accesorios de uso personal y cosméticos desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado en un lugar muy estratégico donde circulan muchas personas, por esa razón posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la calidad de los productos, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de sus hijos logran salir adelante, Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor como: colas, ganchos, aritos, esmaltes para uñas, rubores, labiales, etc. y asi seguir con su trabajo para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en: Maria is 64 years old and lives in her own house with her children and grandchildren. She makes a living selling personal items and cosmetics. She has been doing this for a number of years, with her business located in a strategic area of the market with many passers-by. Because of this location Maria has many customers and she has good prices and good quality products. With her income and with help from her children, the family is able to prosper. Maria is applying for a loan in order to buy more products - such as hairpins, earrings, nail varnish, lipsticks, blusher and more - in bulk. With these items she can continue with her work in order to enjoy a higher quality of life alongside her family.

loans.use: to buy more products - such as hairpins, earrings, nail varnish, lipsticks, blusher and more - in bulk.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo de 34 años de edad es un hombre trabajador quien se dedica a la venta de granos básicos y medicina desde hace 9 años. Habita en casa propia junto  a su hijo de 16 años. Alfredo desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su hijo por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un corredor para la vivienda y al mismo tiempo enladrillar el piso de la vivienda para lo cual comprará: lámina galvanizada, polines, cemento, ladrillo de piso, cemento y arena.
texts.en: Alfredo, 34, is a hardworking man who has had a business selling consumer staples and medicines for 9 years.  He lives in his own house with his 16 year-old son.  Alfredo wants to improve the living conditions for himself and his son, and so he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to add a veranda onto his house and also to install a brick floor in the home.  To do this, he will buy sheets of corrugated metal, beams, cement, bricks, and sand.

loans.use: to buy building materials to build a veranda and put in a new flloor

loans.name: Sandra Jeannette

texts.es: Sandra de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, chiles entre otros tiene 23 años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefieren porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y con un excelente servicio; Sandra es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre está buscando alternativas que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor.Sandra tiene buenas referencias de pago, esta agradecida con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Sandra is 40 years old and lives in the house that she owns with her family. Sandra works selling fruits and vegetables - she sells strawberries, bananas, oranges, tomatoes, onions, chillis and other items. Sandra has had the business for 23 years and this has given her a lot of sales experience, allowing her to earn higher profits. Sandra's business is placed in a very strategic area where there are a lot of passers-by. She has many customers who prefer her stall because the products are fresh and of good quality, they are sold at a good price and the service is excellent. Sandra is an enterprising woman. She is dedicated to her work and has a great desire to get ahead. Sandra is always looking for ways to be successful. In the last few weeks, demand at Sandra's stall has increased and she wants to take advantage and invest more in the business. She does not, however, have enough capital for this and so she is applying for a loan from Integral. This will allow her to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk. Sandra has a good credit rating. She is grateful for this support and assures us that she will be able to pay off this debt and also give her family a better life

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk.

loans.name: Reimunda Gloria

texts.es: Reimunda de 52 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre de 79 años de edad quien depende económicamente de ella. Reimunda se dedica a la venta de pan francés en su lugar de residencia. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de la familia. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para construir una galera para cubrir un horno artesanal para lo cual necesita comprar: lámina galvanizada y madera. Tiene plena confianza que con lo que percibe de la venta de pan logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Reimunda is 52 years old. She lives in her own house along with her mother, who is 79 years old and depends on her economically. Reimunda sells French bread in her home. She works very hard to bring sustenance to her home and maintain the economy of her family. She has decided to apply to FUSAI for this loan to construct a galley to cover an artisanal oven, for which she needs to buy galvanized metal sheets and wood. She has full confidence that with what she receives from the sale of bread she will be able to pay off the debt that the loan entails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting and wood to construct a galley inside her house.

loans.name: Roberto Albino

texts.es: Roberto de 24 años de edad trabaja como mecánico en una  empresa cercana a su localidad y de esa forma lleva el  sustento a sus hermanos de 10 y 14 años de edad. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir su vivienda la cual es su principal patrimonio. Con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de la vivienda solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo del corredor y para bajar la energía eléctrica ya que solo ha logrado hacer las instalaciones necesarias pero falta pagar para que bajen el servicio. Espera poder contar con el financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en: Roberto, 24, works as a mechanic in a company located in his area.  This is how he supports his siblings, who are 10 and 14 years old.  With a lot of effort, he has managed to build his house, which is his main property.  With the goal of improving the condition of the house, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to repair the roof of the veranda and to connect to the electrical grid, because he has managed to wire his house for electricity but he still needs to pay to connect to the grid so that he can receive service.  Roberto hopes to receive this loan so that he can improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, and to connect his house to the electrical grid

loans.name: Ana Margarita

texts.es: Ana de 40 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 16 y 6 años de edad quienes a la fecha se encuentran estudiando. Ana se dedica a la venta de tortillas y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía de su familia. Ana solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto que tiene comenzado a base de lámina. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, ladrillo, arena y hierro. Espera poder contar con el financiamiento y así comenzar con la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Ana, who is 40 years old, lives in her own house along with her husband and their two children, ages 16 and 6, who are now in school. Ana sells tortillas, and this is how she brings sustenance to her household and, along with her husband, supports the economy of their family. Ana is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the construction of a room which she has begun using metal sheeting. With the amount she has applied for, she will buy cement, bricks, sand, and iron. She hopes to be able to have the financing and thus begin with the improvement as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, and iron to construct a room

loans.name: Ana Dolores

texts.es: Ana vive en casa propia con su hijo de 12 años de edad quien estudia actualmente, es una mujer luchadora y responsable para que a su familia no le falte lo necesario para la subsistencia. Actualmente trabaja vendiendo comida cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela fija pues da a un buen precio el plato de comida, Ana desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar todo lo necesario como: verdura, pollo, carne, frutas, etc. pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que solicita un crédito para comprar lo dicho; y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su hijo lo necesario sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en: Ana lives in her own house with her son, who is 12 years old and is now in school. She is a woman who is hard-working and responsible so that her family doesn't lack the necessities for subsistence. She has been selling food near her home for a number of years. She has many regular customers, since she provides a plate of food at a good price. Ana wants to enlarge her stand, that is, to buy everything necessary such as vegetables, chicken, meat, fruits, etc., but she doesn't have sufficient income for this investment. This is why she is applying for a loan to buy these items and thus obtain better earnings to give her son what is necessary without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken, meat, fruits, etc.

loans.name: Ana Celia

texts.es: Ana tiene 52 años de edad y se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace cuatro años.  Ella habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 11 años y 13 años de edad. El negocio de tienda la tiene adecuada en su lugar de habitación por lo que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir un pequeño cuarto para pasar la mercadería y contar con mayor comodidad. Lastimosamente no ha logrado terminar el cuarto por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas para darle la seguridad necesaria.
texts.en: Ana is 52 years old, and she has had a store for four years. She lives in her own house along with her husband and their two children, ages 11 and 13. The store is set up in the place where she lives, and so, with great effort, she managed to construct a small room to transfer the merchandise and to have greater comfort. Unfortunately, she was not able to finish the room, and that is why she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of doors and windows to give her the necessary security.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for a room

loans.name: Silvia Lorena

texts.es: Silvia de 29 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa interior desde hace varios años lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela ya que su mercadería es de muy buena calidad, y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante con los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, Silvia está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más ropa interior  por mayor para seguir con su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en: Silvia, who is 29 years old, lives with her husband and their four children in their own house. She has been selling undergarments for a number of years. She sells as a walking vendor  throughout the different neighborhoods that are near her place of residence. She has many customers, since her merchandise is of very good quality and is sold at a good price. With what she obtains from her sales and with the help of her husband, they are succeeding in getting ahead with the expenses they face in their household. Silvia is applying for a loan to be able to buy more undergarments wholesale in order to continue with her business and to obtain better earnings and have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy undergarments wholesale.

loans.name: Aristides

texts.es: Aristides de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a realizar viajes a estudiantes para los diferentes colegios y escuelas que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia posee muchos clientes ya que es una persona educada, honesta y muy responsable a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene es su trabajo a sacado adelante a su familia, Aristides esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder darle mantenimiento a su vehículo compra repuestos, llantas, etc. ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo y asi podrerle dar a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Aristides, who is 42 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their two children. His work is transporting students for the various schools that are near his place of residence. He has many customers because he is a person who is educated, honest, and very responsible in what he does. With what he obtains from his work, he has raised his family. Aristides is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to maintain his vehicle. He will buy spare parts, tires, etc., since this is his only source of work and thus he will be able to give his family what they need without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and tires and maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Veronica De Los Angeles

texts.es: Veronica de 19 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza de forma ambulante desde hace 4 años. Veronica es muy conocida en la zona como una joven responsable y trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su hogar. Veronica ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en terminar un cuarto el cual no ha logrado terminar por falta de recursos financieros. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, hierro y ladrillo.
texts.en: Veronica, who is 19 years old, lives in her own house along with her life companion. For four years she has been selling beauty products as a street vendor. Veronica is very well known in the area as a responsible and hard-working young woman who does everything that is in her power to earn a living and bring sustenance to her household. Veronica has decided to apply to FUSAI for this loan to invest in finishing a room that she has not been able to complete due to lack of financial resources. With the amount she has applied for, she will buy cement, sand, iron, and bricks.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, and bricks to finish building a room

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy thread, fabric, needles, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Claudia Argentina

texts.es: Claudia tiene 41 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 19 años, 17 años y 15 años de edad. Claudia se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo. Todos los días recorre las principales zonas de su localidad para ofrecer sus productos. Claudia Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y pintura para encementar la entrada de la vivienda y para pintar la pila.
texts.en: Claudia is 41 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children, aged 15, 17 and 19 years old. Claudia sells beauty products from the catalog. Every day she travels the principal neighborhoods of her community to offer her products for sale. Claudia is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, gravel and paint to cement in the entrance to her house and paint the water basin.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and paint to cement in the entrance to her house and paint the water basin.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: Juan de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeña hija de dos años de edad. Juan trabaja como empleado en un en una empresa cercana a su localidad y es así como mantiene a su familia y les da lo necesario. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de un cuarto ya que la lámina se encuentra deteriorada. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en: Juan is 25 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and two year old daughter. Juan works as an employee in a company close to his residence. This is how he supports his family and provides them with what they need. With the goal of improving their living conditions Juan is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the repairing a room where the sheeting has deteriorated. He will buy galvanized sheeting and wood with the money requested.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair a room in his house.

loans.name: Maria Daysi

texts.es: María de 24 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de dos años de edad. María se dedica a la venta de shampoo artesanal desde hace cuatro años. Junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar y dan a su hijo lo necesario. María desea dar mayor seguridad a su familia por lo que desea construir un cerco perimetral para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de malla ciclón, alambre y clavos. Confía que con lo que percibe de su negocio y con los ingresos de su compañero de vida logrará cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
María, 24 years old, lives in a house she owns with her life companion and their two year old son. María has been selling home-made shampoo for four years. She and her life companion maintain the household and give their little boy everything he needs.

María wants to provide her family with greater security. Consequently she wants to construct a perimeter fence and is applying for a loan from FUSAI so that she can purchase cyclone fencing, wire and nails. She is confident that, with the amount she earns from her business and her life companion’s income, she will be able to pay off the debt

loans.use: to purchase cyclone fencing, wire and nails to build a perimeter fence.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es: Mirna de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 15 años y su hijo de 17 años de edad. Mirma es una mujer trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para apoyar con la economía del hogar. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras  desde hace 4 años por lo que sus clientes cada día la prefieren más. Mirna desea mejorar las condiciones del piso de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento y grava para encementar el piso de la casa y así dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Mirna is 36 years old and lives in her own house with her life companion and a 15 year old daughter and 17 year old son. Mirna is a hard-working woman who does everything possible to support the household finances. She has sold fruit and vegetables for the past four years and more clients prefer her with time. Mirna wants to improve the condition of the floor of her house so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand and gravel to cement in the floor of her house and give her children better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to cement in the floor of her house.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus hijos y su madre, ella se dedica al bordado en ropa desde hace varios años, posee clientela ya establecida por la calidad de su trabajo y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de telas, hilos de colores, agujas etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa is 55 years old and lives in her own house with her children and her mother. She has embroidered clothing for several years and has an established clientele because of the quality of her work and her good prices. With her earnings from her work she manages to pay some of the household expenses. Rosa is requesting a loan to buy fabric, colored thread, needles, etc to continue with her work. Then she can generate more income to provide her family with a better quality of living.

loans.use: to buy fabric, colored thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Dina Angelica

texts.es: Dina de 53 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 14 años y 13 años de edad. Dina hace arreglos de flores y luego los comercializa en el mercado central de su localidad. Dina solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y polines para reparar el techo del  corredor de la vivienda ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorado y no es muy seguro.
texts.en: Dina is 53 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and her two children aged 13 and 14 years old. Dina makes flower arrangements and then sells them in the central market of her community. Dina is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized laminate and rafters to repair the roof of the corridor of her house which has deteriorated and is not very safe.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and rafters to repair the roof on the corridor of her house.

loans.name: Yolanda Beatriz

texts.es: Yolanda tiene 25 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad. Yolanda se dedica a la venta de variedad de sandalias las cuales comercializa de forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. Yolanda desea construir un baño sanitario ya que el que tiene se encuentra en malas condiciones y desea cambiarlo por uno lavable por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de un sanitario y una pequeña bomba de agua.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 25 years old and lives in a house she owns with her two sons, who are 7 and 2 years of age. She is a street vender, who sells a variety of kinds of sandals in different areas of her neighborhood. 

Yolanda wants to build a sanitary bathroom because the one she has now is in bad condition and she wants to replace it with one she can keep clean. Consequently she is requesting this loan from FUSAI so she can purchase a toilet and a small water pump.

loans.use: to purchase a toilet and a small water pump.

loans.name: Danilo Angel

texts.es: Danilo de 36 años de edad se gana la vida trabajando muy duro en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Él habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 19 y 22 años de edad. Danilo desea construir un muro frente a su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, hierro, cemento y arena  y así dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Danilo is 36 years old and lives with his wife and their two children, ages 22 and 19. He makes a living working very hard at a business near his home.  

With the support from this loan, Danilo plans to purchase bricks, metal, cement, sand and other building materials for constructing a protective wall in front of his family's home. He hopes this investment will help keep his family and their possessions more secure and less vulnerable to theft and damage.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, metal, cement and sand for building a protective wall in front of his home.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 37 años de edad habita  en casa propia junto a su hijo de 18 años de edad. Hace algunos años murió su esposo por lo que ella asume la responsabilidad del hogar. Ella se dedica a la comercialización de ropa, accesorios y medicina de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo. Santos solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de una división de un cuarto para lo cual necesita invertir en materiales como: cemento, arena y ladrillo ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacer la inversión pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Santos is 37 years old and lives with her 18-year-old son in their own house. Her husband died several years ago, and Santos has risen to the challenges of being a single mother and providing as best she can for her son. She makes a living traveling around her community selling clothing and accessories.

With the support from this loan, Santos plans to purchase cement, sand, bricks and other building materials to repair a room in her house. She promises to make all scheduled loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, bricks and other building materials for repairing a room in her home.

loans.name: Elida Amparo

texts.es: Elida de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de tamales, su  negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tambien vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, posee clientela establecida por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Elida esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios como: maiz, verduras, tomates, hojas de huerta para envolverlos, etc. y poder mejorar la cocina que es la que muestra en la fotografia para seguir con su trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Elida is 40 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and children. She works in sales of tamales and her business is carried out in her residence. Additionally she does business as a traveling vendor in neighboring suburbs and has an established customer base because of her good prices and friendly business manner. The income from her job is used to cover some household expenses. Elida is requesting a loan to purchase necessary ingredients such as: corn, vegetables, tomatoes, leaves for wrapping, etc, and to be able to upgrade the kitchen seen in this photograph so as to continue her work, increase her income, and give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase corn, vegetables, tomatoes, leaves for wrapping, etc, and upgrade the kitchen

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes de 62 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos y se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace dos años. Trabaja muy duro para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Mercedes habita en condiciones muy humildes y desea reparar el techo y el piso de la  cocina  ya que se encuentra  en mal estado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento y arena.
texts.en: Mercedes, 62 years old, lives in a house she owns with her children and has been selling tortillas for two years. She works very hard to provide her children with better living conditions. Mercedes lives in very humble circumstances and wants to repair the roof and the kitchen floor because they are in poor condition. Because of that, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI so she can purchase galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement and sand.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement and sand to repair the roof and the kitchen floor of her house.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia de 43 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hermano y dos hijos. Ella trabaja como educadora en en un centro educativo de su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene la economía de su hogar. Con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a su familia y proteger sus pocas pertenencias desea construir un portón para la entrada de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de hierro, clavos y pago de mano de obra para la elaboración del portón.
texts.en:
Julia is 43 years old and lives with her brother and her two children in their own home. Julia works as a teacher in the local school. Her teaching job is her primary source of income.

With the support from this loan, Julia plans to purchase metal, nails and other building materials, as well as cover costs of labor for the construction of a gate for her home. She hopes this investment will help keep her family and their possessions more secure and less vulnerable to theft and damage.

loans.use: to purchase metal, nails and other building materials, as well as cover costs of labor for the construction of a gate for her home.

loans.name: Sandra Aleida

texts.es: Sandra de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos quienes estudian actualmente, ella posee una tienda donde vende todo tipo de artículos de primera necesidad en su lugar de residencia desde hace 2 años, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa, los buenos precios y la amabilidad con que los atiende, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Sandra esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar mas productos por mayor como: golosinas, granos basicos, cafe, sopas, huevos, etc. y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Sandra, 36, lives in her own house with her husband and two children, who are currently studying.  She runs a convenience store from home, selling all types of goods.  She has had this business for two years and has built up a large customer base thanks to the variety of products she sells, the good prices she offers and the polite way she deals with the customers.  

With her profits she is able to take care of some of the household expenses.  Sandra is asking for a loan to be able to buy more goods in bulk, such as candy, grains, coffee, soup, eggs, etc.  As a result, she will be able to increase her profits and provide more economic stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy candy, grains, coffee, soup, eggs etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es: Roberto de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposa, el posee un taller de enderezado y pintura de vehiculos desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela por el buen trabajo que realiza, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia, Roberto esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un credito para la compra de pinturas, base, protector y demas herramientas que necesita para poder continuar con su trabajo y asi poder darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Roberto, 38, lives in his own house with his wife and two children.  He has had his own car workshop for several years, where he carries out painting and bodywork repairs.  He has a lot of customers thanks to the high standard of work he offers.  He has generated enough income to support his family.
  
Roberto is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy paint, primer, body filler and other tools that he needs to continue working and as a result, provide for his family everything that they need.

loans.use: to buy paint, primer and body filler, etc.

loans.name: Ana Delmi

texts.es: Ana de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos de 17, 15, 12 y 10 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar d residencia posee mucha clientela fija por que sus productos son frescos y a buen precio, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar mas frutas y verduras por mayo como: papas, tomates, cebollas, etc. para obtener mejores ganancias y así poder tener con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Ana, 33, lives in her own house with her husband and four children, aged 17, 15, 12 and 10.  Her children are all at school.  She sells fruit and vegetables in the local market.  She has got a lot of regular customers because she sells fresh produce at a good price.

Ana is asking for a loan to buy more fruit and vegetables such as potatoes, tomatoes and onions.  This will help her improve her profits and have more money to improve her family’s financial situation.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes, onions, etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Wilber Alfredo

texts.es: Wilber es un joven soltero quien vive con sus padres y hermanos. Wilber se gana la vida como jornalero y de esa forma ayuda a su familia con la economía del hogar. Wilber habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y poco a poco con el esfuerzo de todos van saliendo adelante. Él ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de las entrada de su casa ya que las gradas están deterioradas y no son muy seguras. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, ladrillo y arena.
texts.en:
Wilber is a young and single man who lives with his parents and brothers and sisters.  He is a laborer and contributes to the family expenses with what he earns.  Wilber lives in very humble conditions with his family, but little by little, by all working hard, they manage to get along.

He has decided to ask for a loan from FUSAI to be able to repair the entrance to their home because the steps have deteriorated and they are no longer safe.  With the requested amount he will buy cement, bricks and sand.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks and sand to repair the entrance to his home.

loans.name: William Oswaldo

texts.es: William vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijo2 de 8 y 1 año de edad, él se dedica a la venta de hot dog y tortas en un zona muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija pues las personas saben que todo  es elaborado con material de primera calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre a todo con un buen servicio; William quiere aumentar las ventas para obtener mejores ganancias, pero no tiene suficiente capital para realizarlo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar embutido, carne de soya, pan, aderezos, verdura etc. William tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: William lives with his partner and two children, aged eight and one years old respectively. William makes a living selling hot dogs and cakes in a very busy area. He has many regular customers as people know that he prepares his food with top quality products. He also sells his goods at affordable prices and, above all, the service is good. William wants to increase sales in order to make higher profits, but her does not have enough capital to do this. William is therefore applying for a loan from "Integral" in order to buy meats, soya , bread, condiments, vegetables and more. William has a good credit rating and assures us that he will be able to pay off his debt. He also has faith that he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy meats, soya , bread, condiments, vegetables and more.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es: Ana de 47 años de edad es madre soltera y habita junto a sus hijos, hermanos y sobrinos en casa propia. Ana tiene 11 años de trabajar como ordenanza en una institución cercana a su localidad. Este empleo es el que le permite llevar el sustento a su familia y colaborar con la economía de su hogar. Ana ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI  para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención y para cambiar la puerta de su vivienda. Con el monto comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y una puerta. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta.
texts.en:
Ana, 47, is a single mother who lives with her children, brothers and sisters and cousins in her own house.  She has been working for 11 years as an orderly in a business near her home.  This job allows her to support her family and contribute to household expenses.

Ana has decided to ask FUSAI for a loan to invest in building a retaining wall and to change the front door to her home.  With the money she will buy bricks, cement, sand, iron and a door.  She hopes to be able to get this loan as she doesn’t have enough money to buy these things herself.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron; plus a door to be able to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta es una joven que se esfuerza día con día por salir adelante con su familia, desde hace varios años decidió en poner un pequeño negocio de venta de zapatos y sandalias para poder obtener una entrada económicamente y darle a su familia lo que necesita, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas zapatos por mayor y asi surtir su negocio con mas mercadería y poder tener junto con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en: This borrower is a young woman who, every day, is putting in the effort to prosper with her family. Some years ago, the borrower decided to start her own business selling shoes and sandals in order to have an income and to give her family everything that they need. The borrower's business is in the market near her home. She uses her profits to cover some household costs. She lives with her husband and son. The borrower is applying for a loan in order to buy shoes in bulk and thus stock up her business with more merchandise and to have more financial stability with her family.

loans.use: to buy shoes in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es: Maria vive con su familia en casa propia, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de refrescos, gaseosas, jugos, agua, etc. desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencias posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios, Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio ya que las ganancias que obtiene le ayudan a solventar algunos gastos para su hogar por esa razón solicita el crédito para poder seguir dándole a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her family in a house that they own.  For the past few years, she has worked selling refreshments such as sodas, juices, waters and others.  Her business is located in her home, and she has many customers because of her good prices.  

Maria is seeking a loan to purchase more merchandise in bulk in order to continue with her business since the earnings she generates help cover some of her household expenses.  For this reason, she is seeking this loan to continue to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase beverages in bulk: soda, juices, water, etc...

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: maría de 56 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil; Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene 23 años con este trabajo y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener los mejores resultados, su  negocio esta ubicado en una zona muy estratégica y frecuentada por las personas de la comunidad, es muy conocida pues sus tortillas son las mas ricas y siempre están calientitas, tiene mucha clientela y la buscan por su excelente calidad, buenos precios y sobre todo el servicio mas rápido; Maria quiere aumentar su producción pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, etc. Maria tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de otras instituciones y se hace responsable del pago completo de la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá tener una mejor vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en:
María is 56 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband, who works as a construction worker. She makes a living by selling tortillas. She has been doing this for 23 years and she has a lot of experience, which allows her to obtain the best results. 

Her business is located in a very strategic zone and is frequented by members of the community. She is very well-known because her tortillas are the best and they are always hot. She has many customers and they seek her out for the high quality of her products, good prices and, above all, her fast service.

María wants to increase her production, but she does not have enough capital. For this reason, she requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to purchase corn in bulk, propane gas, etc. María has good credit references from other institutions and she will be responsible and pay her debt completely. At the same time, she hopes that she and her husband will be able to have a better life.

loans.use: to purchase corn in bulk, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Joaquin Balmore

texts.es: Joaquin de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, el posee un negocio de radio-técnico desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, es una hombre trabajador, responsable y honesto, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de su trabajo, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Joaquin esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos para electrodomésticos, electrodos, una pistola para soldar, etc. y así poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Joaquin is 47 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and his daughter. He has had a radio engineering business for several years. His business is located in his house. He is a hardworking, responsible, and honest man. He has a lot of clients due to the quality of his work, and from what he earns, he is able to cover some household expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for electrical appliances, electrodes, a soldering iron etc., and in this way he'll be able to continue his work because it is now the only source of income to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for electrical appliances, electrodes, soldering iron etc.

loans.name: Maria Natividad

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieto. Ella posee una tortillería en su lugar de residencia, ya tiene muchos años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene un excelente servicio, es muy amable con las personas que la visitan siempre tiene una sonrisa en el rostro para ellos, Maria es muy dedicada en su trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su hija logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Maria esta solicitando a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor para seguir produciendo mas tortillas, Maria tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará a su familia una seguridad económica en el hogar.
texts.en: Maria lives in a home of her own with her grandson.  She has a tortilla shop in her home and has had this business for many years.  She has many customers because of her excellent service and is very friendly to people who visit her and she always has a smile on her face for them.  Maria is very dedicated to her work and uses her earnings to help her husband with the household expenses.  Maria is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn so she can continue making tortillas.  Maria hopes that she will be able to provide her family with more financial security this way.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Jose Victor

texts.es: josé vive en casa alquilada con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la venta y elaboración de antojitos como: tostadas de tajaditas de papas, yuca, platanitos su negocio lo tiene ubicado en un lugar muy transitado cerca de su lugar de residencia, por esa razón posee mucha clientela, jose esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como: yuca, papa, plátanos, aceite, etc. todo por mayor para la elaboración de estos alimentos y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José lives in a rented home with his wife and their two children. He makes a living by making and selling snacks like toasted slices of potatoes, yucca, and plantains. His business is located in a very busy area near his home, so he has many customers.

José is requesting a loan to purchase raw materials like yucca, potatoes, plantains, oil, etc. He will purchase everything in bulk to make his snacks so that he can earn more money and provide a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to purchase yucca, potatoes, plantains, oil. etc.

loans.name: Oscar Rene

texts.es: Oscar de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar con formado por su esposa y sus dos hijos, es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, se dedica a la mecanica de obra de banco( elaboracion de estructuras metálicas) como: puertas, balcones, portones, techos, etc. desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela por el buen trabajo y los buenos precios. Oscar solicita un credito para comprar mas materiales hierro, laminas, electrodos, polines, etc. ya que tiene mucha demanda y con las ganancias que obtiene ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y solventar los gastos que se le presentan.
texts.en:
Oscar is 35 years old. He lives in his own home with his family, which is made up of his wife and two children. He is a very responsible and hardworking man.

He makes a living as a mechanic making metal structures like doors, balconies, gates, roofs, etc., which he has done for many years. He has many customers due to his good work and good prices.

Oscar requests a loan to purchase materials like iron, laminate, electrodes, rollers, etc. since there is high demand. With the money that he has earned, he has been able to move his family forward and pay for household expenses that arise.

loans.use: to purchase more materials like iron, laminate, electrodes, rollers, etc.

loans.name: Elena Aurora

texts.es: Doña Elena de 54 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus 3 hijos, tiene un minisuper en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, también se dedica a elabora: Cuajada y queso fresco desde hace 4 años, tiene mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles. Doña Elena esta solicitando un credito para la compra de materia prima para elaborar el queso fresco y la cuajada y tambien para comprar productos para su minisuper como: golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos,huevos, aceite, etc. y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Elena is 54 years old, and she lives in her own home with her husband and three children. Elena has a small grocery store in the market, which is close to her residence. She also has been making milk curd and fresh cheese for four years. Elena has many clients because her products are very good quality and affordable. She is requesting a loan to purchase the raw materials for preparing milk curd and fresh cheese, and also to buy products for her store such as candy, sodas, staple grains, eggs, cooking oil, etc., and in this way be able to get better earnings in order to give her family better economic stability.

loans.use: buy candy, sodas, staple grains, eggs, cooking oil, etc., as well as the milk needed to make cheese and milk curd.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 22 años de edad, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, cuando el cultivo esta listo lo almacena en los graneros que muestra en la fotografía, ella esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su compañero de vida.
texts.en: She is 22 years old, has been a farmer for several years.  This has given her the ability and knowledge she needs to tend to her crops, which are mainly corn and beans, which she sells to wholesalers who buy and sell basic grains near her home.  She is and her husband are able to cover some of their household expenses with her earnings.  When the harvest is ready, they store is in the barns shown in the photo.  She is asking for a loan to buy farming supplies that will help with the planting, such as fertilizer, seeds, compost, pesticides, herbicides, etc.  In this way she will be able to have greater earnings and a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Edith Isabel

texts.es: Edith de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 17 y 13 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, ella posee una venta de ropa en su lugar de residencia y tambien vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, Edith esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para seguir con sus ventas ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo y asi ella y su familia puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Edith is 36 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and their two children who are 17 and 13 years old. They are studying. For many years she has had a clothing shop in her home and also sells as a street vendor in different colonies near her place of residence. With what she obtains from her work and with the help of her husband, they are able to cover the household expenses. Edith is requesting a loan to purchase more clothes wholesale to continue with her sales as it is her only source of work and so that she and her family will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Amilcar

texts.es: jose de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo de 19 años de edad quien estudia actualmente, Jose se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta y elaboracion de pan frances y pan dulce, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y cuando ya esta listo el pan sale a comercializarlo por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa,el cliente esta solicitando un credito para la compra de harina, manteca, levadura, azucar, etc. que son los ingredientes que necesita para la elaboración de dichos alimentos mejorar el horno que muestra en a fotografia y poder y a si poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo y poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en: Jose, who's forty-five years old, lives in his own home with his wife and their nineteen year old son who currently attends school. Jose has been baking and selling french bread and pan dulce for several years. His business is located in his home. When the bread is ready, he goes off to sell it throughout several neighborhoods that are located near his home. He is applying for this loan to buy flour, shortening, yeast, sugar, and so forth, which he needs to bake his products; he will also improve his oven which appears in the photograph. In this manner, he will be able to continue with his job, considering that it is his only source of employment, and be able to provide his family with everything that they need without limitation.

loans.use: to improve his oven and buy flour, shortening, yeast, and sugar.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa de 44 años de edad desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta y elaboración de tamales su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, adicional a eso también vende productos de belleza, posee mucha clientela con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, Tomasa esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, pollos, verduras, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Tomasa, 44, has been making and selling tamales for several years. Her business is located in her home. She also sells beauty products. She has a large clientele, and she manages to cover some of her household expenses with the earnings from her work. She lives in her own home with her life partner. 

Tomasa is applying for a loan to buy corn, chickens, vegetables, etc. so that she can continue with her work and thereby give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, chickens, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Morena Guadalupe

texts.es: Morena de 47 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas y su madre, ella posee desde hace varios años una tiende en su lugar de residencia donde comercializa huevos, refrescos, golosinas, granos básicos, pan dulce ,sopas, etc. posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa, Morena esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder surtir su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Morena, 47 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her two daughters and her mother. For several years, she has had a store in her place of residence where she sells eggs, soft drinks, sweets, staple grains, sweet bread, soups, etc. She has many customers due to the variety of products she sells. Morena is asking for the loan to buy more wholesale products in order to be able to stock her business and in this way earn more and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy eggs, soft drinks, sweets, staple grains, sweet bread, soups, etc

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: Maria de 50 años de edad desde hace 30 años se dedica a la venta y elaboración de tortillas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra salir adelante con su familia, vive en casa alquilada con su hermano y su sobrino, Maria esta solicitando un credito para la compra de maiz por quintales y cal y asi poder seguir con su negocio y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Maria, 50, has been making and selling tortillas for thirty years. Her business is located in her home. She has a large clientele due to her friendly manner when she is selling her tortillas, as well as for her good prices. With her earnings, she is able to move ahead along with her family. She lives in a rented house with her brother and her brother-in-law. 

Maria is applying for a loan to buy quintals of corn and lime powder. She will then be able to continue with her business and offer her family better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy quintals of corn and lime powder.

loans.name: Reina De La Paz

texts.es: Reina de 42 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 15 y 7 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, desde hace 11 años se dedica la venta y elaboración de tortillas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la higiene que tiene a la hora de elaborarlas y por lo buenos precios trabaja de lunes a domingo, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Reina esta solicitando un credito para la compra de maiz por quintales y cal y asi seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos y poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: Reina is 42 years old and lives in a rented house with her husband and two children, ages 15 and 17, who are both currently in school. For 11 years she has worked in making and selling tortillas. The business is located in her residence and she has many customers due to the cleanliness she maintains in the tortilla-making process and because of the good prices. She works Monday through Sunday and uses her income to pay some household expenses. Reina is requesting a loan to purchase quintales of corn and lime powder so she can continue her work, since it's her only source of income, and give her family everything they need without exception.

loans.use: To purchase quintales of corn and lime powder

loans.name: Jaime Aquilino

texts.es: Jaime de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su vehículo a las diferentes colonias que se encuentran ceca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela que lo buscan y lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, Jaime esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos y llantas para su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jaime is 44 years old, and he lives in his own house with his wife and his two children. 

He is a taxi driver, making trips between the different neighborhoods near his place of residence in his vehicle.  He has a lot of customers who seek him out and prefer him for his responsible driving.  

Jaime is seeking a loan to purchase spare parts and tires for his vehicle, as it is his only source of work. This way he will be able to earn more income in order to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es: Maria de 66 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, posee un negocio de venta de comida ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela pues se encuentra ubicado en una zona muy transitada, Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como: pollos, carnes, vegetales, frutas, refrescos, arroz, frijoles, etc. y así poder tener una variedad de comidas y atender mejor a sus clientes para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 66 years old and lives in her own home with her family.  She has had a food selling business located in her home for several years and has many customers because its located in a well-travelled area.  Maria is asking for a loan to buy ingredients such as chicken, meat, vegetables, fruits, rice, beans, etc. and be able to have a variety of food and better serve her customers, increase her earnings, and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Digna Emerita

texts.es: Digan de 49 años de edad vive ella sola en casa alquilada, desde hace 10 años posee una venta y elaboración de tortillas ubicada en su casa de habitación, posee mucha clientela que la prefieren por la higiene y amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Digna esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal y así poder seguir con su trabajo para tener una mejor vida.
texts.en: Digan is 49 years old and lives in a rented home.  She has been making and selling tortillas there for ten years and has many customers because of the cleanliness of her shop and friendliness of service.  She covers the household expenses with her earnings.  Digna is asking for a loan to buy corn in quantity and lime so she can continue working and have a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn and lime.

loans.name: Veronica Jeaneth

texts.es: Verónica de 31 años de edad vive sola en casa de sus padres, ella tiene un negocio de salon de belleza desde hace 5 años en su lugar de residencia trabaja de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su casa. Veronica solicita un credito para poder comprar productos para su salon de belleza como: cremas, shampoos, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y asi podra obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Veronica is 31 years old and lives on her own with her parents.  She has had a beauty salon business in her home for five years, works from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm, and has many customers because she does good work.  She uses her earnings to pay her household expenses.  Veronica is asking for a loan to buy products for her salon, such as creams, shampoos, hair clips, scissors, and other things she needs and this way she can obtain better earnings that will help her have financial stability.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Rut Noemi

texts.es: Doña Rut de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo y adicional a esto vende verduras en el mercado que esta cerca de su casa, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio; ella esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, insecticida, fertilizantes, herbicidas, herramientas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía, doña rut tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Rut is 45 years old and lives in her home with her husband and two children.  She raises corn and sorghum and other things which she sells in the market near her home.  She has been farming for several years and has lots of valuable experience, which allows her to have better harvests.  She sells everything around the community and has many customers who prefer to buy from her because of her good prices and service.  She is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL to buy seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, herbicides, tools, etc. and to improve her land, shown in the photograph.  Rut has good credit references and assures us that she can pay off her debt and she expects that this will provide financial stability in her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies and improve her land.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su esposa,  él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles, desde hace varios años se dedica a esta actividad, Él es un hombre muy responsable, honesto y dedicado en su trabajo. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. él quiere estar preparado con los  insumos agrícolas necesarios  para cosechar los principales granos básicos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  etc.   ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios  para realizar la inversión. De esta forma espera lograr un mejor cultivo para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en: Ruben is 55 years old and lives in his own home with his daughter and his wife. He works farming corn and beans, and has done this for many years. He is a very responsible man, honest and dedicated to his work. He is known by his neighbors who give him good references for his work and as a person. Ruben wants to be prepared with the farming supplies necessary to harvest the main basic grains. This is the reason that he is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc., since he cannot count on the economic resources needed to make the investment. In this way he hopes to have a better crop so he can bring home bread every day for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Ana  Del Transito

texts.es: Doña Ana de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de loroco y adicional a eso también siembra maíz y frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia ya tiene clientela fija por lo buenos precios y la calidad el producto, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Doña Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de herbicidas, controles de plagas, fertilizantes, abonos, etc. para continuar con su siembra ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así poder tener junto a su esposo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana, 60, lives in her own house with her husband.  She has been growing loroco for several years and she also sows rice and beans.  She sells her produce in the different markets close to her home.  Thanks to the quality of her produce and the reasonable prices she offers, she can count on her regular customers.  She uses her profits to contribute to some of the household expenses.  

Ana is asking for a loan to buy herbicide, pest control, fertilizers, manure, etc. to continue sowing.  This is the only job she has, but it helps her to enjoy a better standard of living along with her husband.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, pest control, fertilizers, manure, etc.

loans.name: Manuel Ernesto

texts.es: Don manuel de 68 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, desde hace varios años èl posee un molino en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela especialmente las señoras que elaboran tortillas, por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene con sus clientes, Don manuel esta solicitando un credito para a compra de discos, cuchillas, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su compañera de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel, who is 68 years old, lives in his own house with his partner. For several years he has had a mill in his home. He has a lot of customers, especially the women who make tortillas, because of his good prices and the friendly way he treats his customers.

Manuel is asking for a loan to buy discs and blades etc. so he can continue with his work and so have a better quality of life for himself and his partner.

loans.use: to buy discs, blades etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, perfumes, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Mercedes Celina

texts.es: Mercedes de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos de 17, 15 y 12 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, ella se dedica a a venta de ropa lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace 6 años, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, Mercedes esta solicitando un credito para la compra de ropa para damas, caballeros y nios por mayor y asi continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y poder tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 34 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their three children aged 17, 15 and 12, who currently go to school. For 6 years Mercedes has been making a living as a street vendor, selling clothing in the various neighbourhoods around where she lives. She has a lot of customers because of the quality of the clothing and her good prices. 

Mercedes is asking for a loan to buy men's, women's and children's clothing wholesale so she can continue her work, which gives her good profits and enables her and her family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing for men, women and children.

loans.name: Maria Leonarda

texts.es: Doña Maria vive en casa propia con su madre y sus dos hijos de 28 y 22 años de edad, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de comales de barros su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia tiene clientela establecida por su buen trabajo y los buenos precios, Doña Maria quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en a partes de atrás de a casa que es donde muestra la fotografía, por esa razon solicita un credito para la compra de los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra y asi poder mejorar su vivienda para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her mother and her two children who are 28 and 22, in a home that she owns.  For the past few years, she has worked making and selling clay griddles.  Her business is located in her home, and she has a well established customer base because of her good work and fair prices.  

Maria wants to improve her home by building a wall along the rear of her house, which can be seen in the picture.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to purchase the necessary materials like cement, sand, bricks, iron and pay for labor.  This will allow her to improve her home so that her and her family can live more comfortably and secure.

loans.use: purchase sand, bricks, iron and pay for labor.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: Jose de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposa, el posee un molino en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela por la amabilidad con que atiende a sus clientes y los buenos precios con ofrece su servicio de molino, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Jose esta solicitando un credito para la compra de cuchillas, discos, bandas, etc. para poder ofrecer un buen servicio y asi poder con su familia tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Jose is 56 years old and lives with with wife and three children in a house that he owns.  For the past few years, he has had a mill in his home.  He has many customers due to the friendly manner in which he tends to his customers and the fair prices he offers for his services.  With his earnings, he is able to cover some of his household expenses.  

Jose is requesting the loan to purchase blades, discs, bands, etc... in order to offer better service and provide his family with more financial stability.

loans.use: purchase blades, discs, bands, etc.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz de 34 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 12 y 15 años de edad. Ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijole desde hace varios años. Beatriz posee muchos clientes que demandan sus productos por la calidad y los buenos precios, solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra  de abonos, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y poder seguir con sus siembras para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Beatriz is 34 years old and lives with her spouse and two children, ages 12 and 15, in a house that they own.  For the past few years, she has worked growing corn and beans.  Beatriz has many customers that demand her products because of their quality and her fair prices.

She is seeking a loan from Integral to purchase manure, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc..., and be able to continue with her crops in order to improve her earnings and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase manure, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Maria Berta

texts.es: Doña Maria vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus 2 hijos quienes estudian actualmente, ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado lechero desde hace varios años, adicional a eso tambien se dedica al cultivo de maiz y frijol con su esposo, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la comercializa en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa y con las ganancias que obtiene logran cubrir los gastos de su hogar. doña Maria solicita un crédito para la compra de una novillas para reproducir leche y así hacer mas ventas y obtener mas ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own house with her husband and their two children who are currently at school. For several years she has earned a living raising dairy cattle and she also grows corn and beans. When the harvest is ready she sells it at the various markets near where she lives and with the profits she makes she is able to cover her household costs. 

Maria is asking for a loan to buy a dairy calf to produce milk so she can sell more and make better profits, to give her family more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy a dairy calf.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica a la costura su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela porque realiza un buen trabajo y a buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra de hilos, botones, telas de colores, agujas, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her family in a home that they own.  For the past few years, she has worked in her sewing business, which is located in her home.  She has many customers because she does good work at fair prices.  With her earnings, she is able to cover some of her household expenses.

Ana is seeking a loan from Integral to purchase thread, buttons, colored fabrics, needles, etc..., in order to continue with her work and improve her earnings so that she may give her family more financial stability.

loans.use: purchase thread, buttons, colored fabrics, needles, etc.

loans.name: Zoila Adelaida
