texts.es: Zoila de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa, por las buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de atender a los clientes, zoila esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, aceite, café, etc. para poder surtir mas su negocio y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en:
Zoila, who is 64 years old, lives in her own house with her husband. For several years she has had a shop in her home. She has a lot of customers because of the wide range of products she sells, her good prices and her friendly nature when serving the customers. 

Zoila is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, oil, coffee etc. so she can stock her business better and so make bigger profits so she and her husband can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, oil, coffee etc.

loans.name: Sonia Elizabeth

texts.es: Sonia de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieto de 8 años de edad, ella posee un negocio de venta de comida ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios de los platos de comidas, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando el encielado en dos cuartos y las puertas en el baño, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razon solicita un prestamo para poder comprar los materiales como el cielo falso, madera, clavos, chapas y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas comodos.
texts.en: Sonia is 48 years old and lives with her daughter and eight year old grandson in a home that she owns.  She has a business selling food in her house.  She has many customers due to the fair prices of her meals.  She wants to make improvements to her home like installing a ceiling in two rooms and putting a door in the bathroom.  However, with what she makes from her business, she does not have enough to make the repairs.  For this reason, she is seeking a loan to purchase materials like dropped ceiling tiles, wood, nails and sheeting, and to pay for labor.  This will allow her and her family to live more comfortably.

loans.use: purchase dropped ceiling tiles, wood, nails, sheeting and pay for labor.

loans.name: Rosa Ofelia

texts.es: Rosa de 44 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, el hijo mayor trabaja y le ayuda con los gatso del hogar, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de sus productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su hijo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y asi poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Rosa, 44 years old, is a single mom who lives in her own house with her two children. Her oldest son works and helps her with household expenses. She works selling clothes. Her business is located in her house. She has many customers thanks to the quality of her clothes and her good prices. With her earnings and her son's help she is able to pay for some of her household expenses. Rosa is requesting a loan to buy clothes at wholesale prices in order to continue with her job in which she earns well, so she and her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy clothes at wholesale prices

loans.name: Rosa Erlinda

texts.es: Rosa de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad conque elabora las prendas de vestir y los buenos precios, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para a compra de telas, botones, agujas, hilos, etc. para poder seguir elaborando mas prendas de vestir y asi obtener mejores ganancias para que ella y su compañero de vida puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa, 56, lives in her own house with her life partner.  She works making clothes.  Her business is located in her home.  She has a lot of customers because of the quality of the clothing she makes and because her prices are good.  Rosa is requesting a loan to buy fabric, buttons, needles, thread, etc. in order to continue making more clothing items and earning more income so she and her life partner can have a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, needles, thread, etc.

loans.name: Maria Argentina

texts.es: Doña Maria de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica desde hace 15 años a la venta de ropa lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias y mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Maria esta solicitando un credito para la compra de ropa por mayor para damas, caballeros y niños y poder seguir con su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia o que necesitan sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
Maria is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her family. For the last 15 years she has been selling clothing in the streets of the different neighborhoods and markets that are located close to her place of residence. She manages to pay some of the household expenses with what she earns. 

Maria is requesting a loan to buy clothing wholesale, for women, men and children. Then she can continue with her business, make more income and provide her family with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy women's, men's and children's clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Cruz Antonia

texts.es: Doña cruz de 33 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en casa propia, su esposo trabaja en construcciones cerca de su lugar de residencia, desde hace varios años, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, comercializa sus pollos en los mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela ya establecida que la buscan por los buenos precio, por la amabilidad, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, doña cruz está solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado, vitaminas y poder mejorar el lugar donde los mantiene que es el que muestra la fotografia, para luego salir a comercializarlos y así obtener mejores ganancias y para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Cruz, who is 33 years old, lives with her husband and children in her own house. Her husband works in construction near their place of residence and for several years now she has made a living raising chickens to fatten them up. She sells the chickens in markets near to where she lives. She has many regular customers who seek her out because of her good prices and friendly service. With what she earns from her sales and the help of her husband they manage to cover some of the household expenses. 

Cruz is asking for a loan to buy concentrated feed and vitamins and to make some improvements to the place where she keeps the chickens, which is shown in the photograph. She will subsequently go out to sell the chickens thus earning higher profits to give her family what they need with no limitations whatsoever.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and vitamins and carry out improvements to the place where she keeps the chickens.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es: Magdalena vive en casa propia con su hijo y su esposo quien trabaja vendiendo reloj de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias, ella se dedica desde hace 6 años a la venta y elaboración de alborotos (dulce artesanal)su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia ya tiene clientela establecida que la buscan por las calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, Magdalena quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando la madera que detiene el techo ya que esta bastante dañada pero con lo que gana en su trabajo no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para poder comprar madera, clavos, pintura y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Magdalena lives in her own house with her son and her husband.  He works selling clocks in an itinerant manner in the different neighborhoods.  For six years she has been making and selling ‘alborotos’ [homemade sweets].  Her business is located at her house.  She has an established clientele who seek her out for the quality of the products and the good prices.

Magdalena wants to improve her house.  She wants to change the wood that holds up the roof because it is badly damaged.  However, with what she earns with her work she does not have enough to do so.  That is the reason she is requesting a loan to be able to buy wood, nails, and paint and to pay for the labor.  She wants to do this so that she and her family are able to life safely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, and paint and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es: Blanca de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee una pequeña tienda donde vende golosinas, granos básicos, refrescos, dulces, aceite, café, detergentes, etc. desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela establecida que la buscan por la variedad de productos que vende y los buenos precios, Doña Blanca esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos y asi poder surtir su tienda para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y generar mejores ganancias para que ella y su esposo puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Blanca, 51 years old, lives in her own home with her spouse. For a number of years, she has had a small shop where she sells sweets, bulk grains, soft drinks, candies, oil, coffee, detergents, etc. She has many established customers who come to her store because of the variety of products that she sells and the good prices. Doña Blanca is requesting this loan in order to buy more products so that she can stock her store, which will let her provide better service to her customers and generate better profits. This way, she and her spouse will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sweets, bulk grains, soft drinks, candies, oil, coffee, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida quien trabaja como albañil y su hija, ella posee un negocio de venta de antojitos como: yuca y papas fritas, pastelitos de carne, enchiladas, empanadas, etc. desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela por ser un alimento muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante en los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un credito para comprar materia prima como: yuca, papas, maiz, verduras, tomates, carnes, aceite, etc y mejorar el chalet que es el que muestra la fotografía para poder atender mejorar a sus clientes y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia todo lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client lives in a house of her own with her life partner, who works as a stonemason, and with their daughter. She has a business selling snacks like fried cassava, french fries, meat pies, enchiladas, empanadas, etc. She has had a lot of customers for many years because it is a very popular kind of food. With what she obtains from her work and with the help of her husband, they have been able to get ahead in their household expenses. 

The client is asking for a loan to buy raw material like cassava, potatoes, corn, vegetables, tomatoes, meat, oil, etc. and to improve the chalet, shown in the photo, in order to attend to her customers better. In this way she will obtain better earnings to give her family everything it needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy cassava, potatoes, corn, vegetables, tomatoes, meat, oil, etc., and to improve the chalet

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus hijos, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de pescado su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela porque su producto es fresco y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar. el cliente esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pescado por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This member lives in his own house with his wife and children. He has worked for several years in the business of selling fish. His business is located in his home. He has many customers because his product is fresh and offered at a good price. His earnings are enough to cover the his household expenses. He is applying for a loan to buy fish wholesale so he can continue his work; it is his only source of income. This way, he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fish wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria de 31 años de edad es madre soltera desde hace 2 años posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de los productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtienen de sus ventas ha logrado sacar a delante a su familia, vive ne casa propia con sus dos hijos, Maria esta solicitando un credito para la compra de aceite, frijoles, golosinas, refrescos, granos bascos, etc. y si obtener mejores ganancias y poder darle a sus hijos lo que necesitan sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
Maria is 31 years old and is a single mother. She lives in her own home with her two children. For the last two years she has had a store located in her home. She has a a lot of clients because of her variety of products and good prices. With what she earns from her sales she can get her family ahead.

Maria is requesting a loan to purchase oil, beans, sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, etc in order to generate more income and provide her children with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy oil, beans, sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente 21 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con sus padres y sus hermanos, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace varios años, y comercializa sus pescados en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, tiene mucha clientela fija que lo prefiere porque su producto es fresco y a buen precio con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias ayuda en los gastos que se le presentan en su casa, El cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de trasmallos ya que el que tiene se esta deteriorando y poder seguir con su pesca ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así seguir ayudando en su casa sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: The client is 21 years old and lives with his parents and siblings in one of his relatives' house. He has been working in artisanal fishing for several years. He sells his fish in various markets located near his home. He has a great number of regular customers who come to him because his product is fresh and sold at good prices. With the profits he makes he helps afford the expenses that present themselves in his household. The borrower is requesting a loan in order to purchase trammel nets, since the one he has now is deteriorating. That way he'll be able to keep on fishing, since this is his only means of livelihood, and he'll be able to continue contributing to his household with no restrictions whatsoever.

loans.use: to purchase trammel nets for fishing.

loans.name: Alba Yanira

texts.es: Alba de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil y cultiva granos básicos, ella posee una pequeña panadería ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 3 años, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene con a la hora de vender, Alba esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, latas y mejorar el horno que es el que muestra la fotografía para poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en: Alba, 35 years old, lives in her own house with her husband, who works as a construction worker and grows basic grains. For three years she has owned a small bakery located in her home. She has many customers because of her good prices and her friendliness. Alba is requesting a loan to buy flour, yeast, lard, cans and to improve the oven - shown on the photograph. She wants to continue with her job, in which she earns well, so she and her husband may have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy flour, yeast, lard, cans, and to improve the oven

loans.name: Coralia Marlene

texts.es: Coralia tiene 27 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus abuelos. Coralia se gana la vida por medio de la venta de productos de belleza los cuales comercializa dentro de su comunidad desde hace cuatro años. Ella es una joven muy trabajadora, responsable y dedicada quien desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y no es muy seguro. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y pines y así dar a sus abuelos mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en: Coralia is 27 years old and single. She lives in her own home with her grandparents. Coralia has made a living by selling beauty products in her community for the last four years. She is a very hardworking, responsible and dedicated young person. She wants to repair the roof of her home, which has deteriorated over time and is no longer dependable. It is for this reason that Coralia is requesting this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheeting and fasteners, and provide her grandparents with better living conditions in this way.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized metal sheeting and fasteners.

loans.name: Jose Isaias

texts.es: Jose de 37 años de edad desde hace 7 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa de un familiar con su esposa y sus dos hijas de 5 y 4 años de edad, Jose esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jose, who is thirty-seven years old, has been selling clothing for seven years. He peddles his goods around the different neighborhoods near his home. He manages to cover household expenses with his earnings. He lives at a relative's house with his wife and their two daughters, aged four and five. Jose is applying for this loan to buy clothing wholesale to continue his peddling and obtain better earnings to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Sandra Elisa

texts.es: Sandra de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos y su compañero de vida, ella se dedica al cultivo de plátano desde hace 5 años, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la comercializa en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela ya establecida, Sandra esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder obtener una mejor cosecha y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra is 39 years old and lives in her own house with her four children and life partner. She has made a living cultivating bananas for five years. When her harvest is ready she sells it in different markets that are located close to the place of her residence. She has many established customers.

Sandra is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, manure and pest control products, etc., to yield a better harvest and thus improve her earnings to provide her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and pest control products, etc.

loans.name: Claudia Lizeth

texts.es: Claudia de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar y se dedica a la venta de tostadas de plátano, yuca y chicharra desde hace mucho tiempo. El negocio lo tiene en su lugar de habitación desde hace 6 años. Muchas personas la prefieren ya que ofrece buenos productos y buenos precios. Claudia desea terminar de construir las paredes de un cuarto las cuales no ha logrado terminar, además desea invertir en la construcción de cuneta para las aguas lluvias y en la introducción de la energía eléctrica. Por lo anterior Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la compra de los materiales necesarios como: cemento, ladrillo, arena y para pagar por la instalación de la energía eléctrica.
texts.en: Claudia, age 25, lives in her own home with her family and has worked for a long time selling fried tortillas (tostadas) made from bananas, yuca, and cicadas. She has had the business in her home for 6 years. Many people prefer her since she offers good products and good prices. Claudia wants to finish building the walls in one room that she hasn't been able to finish, and then she wants to invest in constructing a ditch to collect rain water and installing electricity. Therefore she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy the necessary materials like cement, brick, and sand, and to pay for electrical installation.

loans.use: to buy cement, brick, sand, and to pay for electrical installation.

loans.name: Karen Jeanmillette

texts.es: Karen es una joven de 19 años de edad quien junto a su madre se  dedican a la venta de tortillas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz) desde hace tres años. El negocio lo tienen en su hogar de habitación y ya cuentan con muchos clientes quienes cada día las prefieren más. Karen desea hacer algunas mejoras en su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción del agua potable, encementar el corredor de la vivienda y reparar el baño sanitario. Por lo anterior solicita esta crédito FUSAI para invertir en los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena, grava, lámina y pago por la instalación del agua potable.
texts.en: Karen is a 19-year-old young woman who has worked with her mother selling tortillas for the past three years (preparing the food from dough made of corn). They have the business in their home and already have many customers who prefer them more every day. Karen wants to make some improvements in her home, and so she requests this loan from FUSAI to invest in the installation of drinkable water, cementing the hallway of the home, and repairing the bathroom. Therefore she is requesting this FUSAI loan to invest in the necessary materials like cement, sand, gravel, laminate, and payment for the installation of drinkable water.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, laminate, and to pay for installation of drinkable water.

loans.name: Julia Mabel

texts.es: Julia de 24 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Julia trabaja como empleada en una empresa cercana a su localidad desde hace tres años. Junto a su esposo trabajan muy duro para llevar el sustento a su hogar y dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Julia desea mejorar  sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que desea cambiar los materiales del cuarto por material mas resistente y duraderos además desea introducir el agua potable por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la compra de adobes, lámina y madera y pagar la mano de obra para la conexión del agua potable que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: Julia is 24 and lives in her own house with her husband and kids.  Julia has been working for a company that is near to where she lives for three years.  She and her husband work very hard to support their household and give their children a better life.  Julia wants to make improvements to her house.  She wants to replace the materials of the room with more resistant and durable materials, and also to install running drinking water.  She requests this loan from FUSAI to buy adobe, sheet metal, and wood, and to pay to have the water connected, which she badly needs.

loans.use: to buy adobe, sheet metal, and wood, and to pay to have running drinking water connected

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es: José tiene 32 años de edad  y junto a su esposa han procreado dos hijos y una hija de 13 años, 3 meses y 10 años respectivamente. José  trabaja como empleado en una distribuidora desde hace 4 años por lo que percibe un ingreso mensual y junto a su esposa mantienen la economía de su hogar. José solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesario (ladrilla, arena, cemento, etc.) para terminar las paredes de su vivienda y para hacer la conexión del agua potable ya que no cuenta con el servicio.
texts.en:
Jose is 32 years old and together with his wife have procreated two sons and a daughter who are 13 years, 3 months and 10 years old, respectively. For four years, Jose has worked as an employee for a distributor, for which he receives a monthly income. Together he and his wife watch over their household expenditures.

Jose is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy the necessary materials (bricks, sand, cement, etc.) to finish the walls of his house, and to build a connection to potable water since he currently does not have this service.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, etc., to finish building his home's walls and a connection to potable water.

loans.name: Zulma Lissette

texts.es: Zulma tiene 19 años de edad y junto a su madre tienen un negocio de tienda el cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Tienen 2 años de contar con el negocio y gracias a sus carisma y buen trato a los clientes muchas personas la prefieren y cada día son  más las personas que buscan sus productos. Zulma ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para pagar por la introducción del agua potable y para poner enrejado metálico en su vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a su mercadería y familia.
texts.en: Zulma is 19 years old and has a business together with her mother: a shop that is their main source of income.  They have had the shop for two years and thanks to her charisma and good customer service, many people choose her and every day more people come in search of her products.  Zulma has made the decision to ask for this loan from FUSAI to pay to install drinking water and to build a metal fence at her home to make her family and her merchandise safer.

loans.use: to install drinking water and to buy metal fencing for her home

loans.name: Marlyn Del Rosario

texts.es: Marlyn de 41 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa de un familiar con sus dos hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Marlyn esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, sopas, etc. para poder surtir aun mas su tienda y generar mejores ganancias para darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marlyn is 41 years old. She is a single mother and lives in a relative's home with her two children. She has run a small shop located at her residence for several years, with which she earns enough to cover some of the household bills.

Marlyn is asking for a loan in order to buy staple grains, candy, soft drinks, soups etc. in order to stock up her shop and increase her income. This will allow her to give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock, including staple grains, candy, soft drinks, soups etc.

loans.name: Jose Trinidad

texts.es: José de 40 años de edad habita en casa propia junto  a sus compañera de vida y su hija de 14 años y su hijo de 8 años de edad. José trabaja como empleado en una gasolinera desde hace 6 años  y de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar y se gana la vida. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, hierro, lámina y taza para baño ya que desea ampliar su pila y construir un baño sanitario.
texts.en:
40-year old José lives in his own house with his wife, 14-year old daughter, and 8-year old son. He has worked at a gas station for six years. This is how he earns his living and supports his family.

José now wishes to improve his living conditions so he is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, rebar, laminate sheets, and a toilet. He wants to build a proper bathroom on to his house.

loans.use: buy bricks, rebar, laminate sheets, and a toilet and build a proper bathroom

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José tiene 51 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo de 9 años de edad quien es su principal inspiración para luchar por mejores condiciones de vida. José trabaja como empelado de una empresa cercana a su localidad desde hace 35 años y junto a su esposa quien posee una pequeña tienda sacan lo necesario para mantener la economía de su hogar y dar a su hijo mejores condiciones de vida. José desea terminar de construir un baño de fosa el cual no ha logrado finalizar por falta de recursos. José solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, plancha y taza del baño. Considera que con lo que percibe en su trabajo logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Jose is 51 years old, married, and lives with his wife and nine year old son who is his inspiration to continue striving for better conditions for his family.  Jose works as an employee for a nearby company and has for 35 years.  He and his wife have a small store and support their family financially and provide better living conditions for their children.

Jose wants to finish building his bathroom, which he has not done due to a lack of resources.  He is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy metal, lumber, and a toilet.  He feels that he will be able to pay off his debt with his salary.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Milagro Roxana

texts.es: Milagro tiene 26 años de edad y se gana la vida por medio de la  venta de ropa como: blusas y ropa interior desde hace dos años. Es una mujer muy trabajadora de quien muchas personas en su comunidad dan buenas referencias. Ella habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, papá y hermano. Milagro y su familia habitan en condiciones muy humildes por lo que desea hacer algunas mejoras dentro de su vivienda. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso y de esta forma dar mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en: Milagro is 26 years old and has been earning a living selling clothing such as blouses and undergarments for the past two years.  She is a hardworking woman who has many good references in her community.   She lives her own home with her life partner, her father, and brother.  Milagro and her family live in humble conditions and she wants to make some home improvements, so she is asking for this loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, and gravel to install a floor and provide better conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 27 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la venta de arena, tierra y piedras a los diferentes comercios que venden producto para construcción, obtiene buenas ganancias ya que tiene clientela establecida, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, El cliente esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar un buey y mejorar la carreta donde transporta los materiales que es la que muestra la fotografía ya que esa es su única herramienta para trabajar y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: He is 27 years old and lives in a rented house with his wife and two children.  He sells sand, soil, and stone to different construction material suppliers and makes a good profit because he has steady customers and uses the money to cover his household expenses.  He is asking for a loan to buy an ox and repair the cart he uses to transport his materials, as shown in the photo, because this is his only work tool.  He will be able to obtain better earnings to provide a better quality of life to his family without limitation.

loans.use: to buy an ox.

loans.name: Cecilia Del Carmen

texts.es: Cecelia de 36 años de edad es madre de dos hijos de 14 años y 3 años de edad y habita junto a ellos y su compañero de vida. Cecilia se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad. Cecilia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y ladrillo de piso para enladrillar el piso de la vivienda que actualmente es de cemento y se encuentra agrietado.
texts.en: Cecilia, 36 years old, is the mother of two children, ages 14 and 3. She lives together with them and her life companion. Cecilia sells beauty products through a catalog. She sells door-to-door in the main areas of her town. Cecilia has decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, sand, and flooring brick  for bricking the floor of her home. Her floor is currently made of cement and it is cracked.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and flooring brick for bricking the floor of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 23 años de edad vive en casa de una tía desde hace un año, el se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace 4 años, tiene mucha clientela por que todo lo que vende es fresco y a buen precio y es un joven muy amable con sus clientes, el esta solicitando un crédito para al compra de frutas y verduras por mayor como: rábanos, tomates, papas, zanahorias, cebollas, etc. y así poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y poder tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: The borrower is 23 years old. He has been living wth one of his aunts for the past year. He has been selling fruits and vegetables for a living for four years, from a stall at the market close to his home. He has many customers because he sells fresh produce at fair prices and treats customers well. he asks for a loan in order to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale, such as radishes, tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, onions, etc. This will enable him to keep his business going. This is his only source of income and his financial stability depends on it.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel de 58 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercializa en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir en sus cultivos por eso le solicita un credito a INTEGRAL que le permita comprar semillas,  insecticida, herbicida, fertilizantes, abonos, etc. Fidel tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Fidel, age 58, lives with his life partner and their children in his own house.  He grows corn and beans.  He has worked in agriculture for several years.  This has gifted him with a lot of experience that allows him to get the best harvests.  He sells his harvests in the areas surrounding the community.  He has a lot of clientele that prefer him for the quality and the good prices.  Most of all, they prefer him for the good service.

He needs to invest in his crops.  That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow him to buy seeds, insecticide, herbicide, fertilizers, and compost, etc.  Fidel has good payment references from the people who know him.  He is very responsible.  He is certain that he will be able to repay the debt during the established time frame.  He is confident that he will bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticide, herbicide, fertilizers, and compost, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Delmi

texts.es: Rosa tiene 32 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 13 y 10 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos desde hace 5 años. Rosa es una madre muy trabajadora y dedicada al cuidado de sus hijos. Con el fin de dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a sus hijos desea repellar las paredes de la vivienda las cuales son de adobe y ademas encementar una parte del piso que actualmente es de tierra. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena.
texts.en: Rosa, 32 years old, is a single mother. She lives in a house of her own with her two children, aged 13 and 10 respectively. She has been selling typical street food for 5 years. A hard-working mother, she is devoted to caring for her children. In order to improve their living conditions, she wants to whitewash the walls, which are made of dried bricks, and to lay cement on part of the floor, which is currently an earthen floor. In order to achieve this, she asks for a loan from the field partner to buy cement and sand.

loans.use: to buy the materials she needs to improve her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 29 años de edad desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de materiales de construcción como arena, hierro, cemento, ladrillos, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas materiales por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así obtener mejores ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The borrower is 29 years old. He has been selling construction supplies (such as sand, iron, cement, bricks, etc.) for several years. His shop is located in his house. He contributes to household expenses thanks to the income derived from this activity. He lives in a house of his own with his family unit. He asks for a loan in order to buy more supplies wholesale so as to keep his business going. This is his only source of income. His goal is to increase his income in order to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more construction supplies wholesale.

loans.name: Rosa Amanda

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado por sus cinco hijos y su esposo, ella tiene una tienda desde hace 10 años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere terminar de mejorar su vivienda pero con lo que gana y con lo que sus hijos le dan no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para pode comprar puertas y ventanas y pago de mano de obra ya que las habitaciones no poseen, así como la que muestra la fotografía, y asi ella y sus familia ouedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en:
Doña Rosa is 58 years old and lives in her own home with her family, which consists of her husband and five children. She has managed a store for 10 years and the income she generates from her sales is used to cover some of her household expenses.

Rosa wants to finish the improvements to her home, but the amount she earns and the contributions from her children are not enough to accomplish this goal. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to buy doors and windows, since her house does not have these fixtures as shown in the photo. Rosa will also pay for labor. This will help Rosa and her family live more securely.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows, as well as pay for labor.

loans.name: Fidubina

texts.es: Fidubina tiene 58 años de edad, es casada y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 20 años de edad. Fidubina ademas de dedicarse a los oficios de la casa también cuenta con un puesto de verduras el cual atiende todos los días y es lo que le permite apoyar a la economía del hogar y junto a su esposo quien tiene un puesto de plátanos ajustan para sacar adelante a su familia. Fidubina ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su vivienda ya que la pila y las paredes de su vivinda se encuentran deterioradas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena.
texts.en:
Fidubina is 58 years old, married, and lives in her own home with her husband and 20-year-old son. In addition to taking care of the household chores, Fidubina has a vegetable stand that she manages every day so that she can contribute to the household finances. She and her husband also have a banana stand that helps their family get ahead.

Fidubina has decided to invest in her home. The water trough and the walls of her house have deteriorated. For this reason, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, and sand.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand for repairing the water trough and the walls of her house.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: Adrian tiene 46 años de edad es casado y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y dos hijos de 2 y 14 años de edad. Adrian es albañil y todos los días se traslada a su trabajo muy temprano par ganarse el sustento diario y mantener la economía del hogar. Adrian solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava ya que desea repellar las paredes y encementar el piso de de dos cuartos dormitorios. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital.
texts.en:
Adrian is 46 years old, married, and lives in his own home with his wife and two children (ages 2 and 14). He is a bricklayer and must travel very early to his job so that he can earn a daily income for maintaining his household.

Adrian is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in the purchase of cement, sand, and gravel. He wants to repair the walls and lay down cement floors in two of the bedrooms. Adrian hopes to be granted this loan since he does not have the capital.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel in order to repair the walls and lay down cement floors in two bedrooms.

loans.name: Sandra Lizeth

texts.es: Sandra de 28 años de edad es madre soltara y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo, padres y hermanos. Sandra es una mujer  muy trabajadora quien se dedica al cuidado de su hijo y al comercio de frutas y productos de belleza. De esta forma es como mantiene a su hijo y le ayuda a su familia con los gastos diarios. Sandra se ha dado cuenta de los créditos que FUSAI brinda a personas de escasos recurso quienes no son tomadas en cuenta por el sistema financiero tradicional y ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito ya que su vivienda necesita que se mejore el techo del corredor el cual se encuentra deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 28 year old single mother who lives in her own home along with her son, her parents and siblings. Sandra is a hard-working woman who is dedicated to the care of her son. She sells fruit and beauty products. This is how she supports her son and helps with the family expenses. 

Sandra has become aware that FUSAI offers loans to people with low economic resources who are overlooked by the traditional financial system. She decided to request this loan as the roof of her house needs to be repaired as it has deteriorated. With the money from the loan she will purchase galvanized laminate and wood.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and wood to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Jose Andres

texts.es: josé de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la crianza de ganada de doble propósito desde hace 5 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela pues sus productos son frescos y de buena calidad, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, josé esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar ganado de doble propósito y así poder seguir con la crianza que le genera buenas ganancias y poderle dar a su familia o que necesitan sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
José is a 33-year old man who lives in his own house with his wife and two children. He has made a living breeding double-purpose livestock (which provides both milk and meat) for 5 years and selling his products at the various markets near his residence. He has a broad client base because his products are fresh and have good quality. The income he obtains from these sales covers some of their household expenses. 

José is requesting a loan to buy double-purpose livestock so that he can keep earning good income. His goal is to support his family without restrictions.

loans.use: to buy double-purpose livestock.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: Luis de 42 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus cinco hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en esta actividad, el terreno donde cultiva es muy accesible cercano a la carretera y con suelo fértil además esta cercano a su vivienda, todo lo que produce lo comercia en todas las comunidades aledañas, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un buen servicio, el quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita capital para la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herramienta, etc. Luis tiene buenas recomendaciones por parte de sus vecinos y tiene la certeza que podrá saldar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que le dará una vida plena a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 42 years old and lives with his life companion and their 5 children. He is a farmer who grows corn and beans. He has worked in this for many years. The land he works is accessible to the highway and is quite fertile. It is also close to his house. He sells his produce in the neighboring communities. He has a lot of clients as people know that everything he sells is of top quality and sells at affordable prices. He also provides good service. 

Luis wants to increase his production but he lacks the capital to do this. So he has requested a loan from Integral which will allow him to buy seeds, manure, insecticides, fertilizer, pest control, tools, etc. Luis has strong recommendations from his neighbors and is certain that he can pay off this loan and at the same time has faith that he can offer his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, insecticides, pest control, tools, etc.

loans.name: Higo Elias

texts.es: Don higo de  33 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, desde hace 10 años y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercializa en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir en sus siembras por eso solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, herbicida, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. don higo tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica
texts.en:
Don Higo is 33 years old and lives in his own home with his life companion and their two children. He has been growing corn and sorghum for 10 years. Higo has gained a great deal of valuable experience, which has allowed him to produce better crops. His harvest is sold in the surrounding areas of his community. He has many customers who prefer the quality of his products, the good prices that he offers, and most of all, the good service he provides.

Higo needs to invest in his crops, so he is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral. This will allow him to buy seeds, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, and other supplies. Don Higo has good payment references from people who know him. He is very responsible and is confident that he can repay the debt within the established period of time. Higo is also positive that he can achieve financial security for his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, and other supplies.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es: Don Lucas de 62 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres  hijos, el es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar y muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y frijol.  Don Lucas  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas y también poder mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía, ya que los terrenos de donde el reside son bastante pedregoso y montañoso, y seguir con sus cultivos que le generan buenas ganancias y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Lucas, who is 62 years old, lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He is a very responsible, hardworking man with many responsibilities at home. He has always been happy and enthusiastic about his work. 

He makes a living as a farmer and grows corn and beans. Lucas would like to increase his sales, so he has requested a loan that will allow him to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pesticides, and also will allow him to improve his land. The photograph shows that the land where he lives is rocky and mountainous. The loan will help him to continue farming, which provides a good income so that he can continue bringing the daily bread home to his family every day without any limitations.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pesticides, and also to improve his land.

loans.name: Aduccio

texts.es: Aduccio de 48 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo y ademas, trabaja como albañil lo cual le permite percibir el ingresos para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Tiene muchas aspiraciones y es muy responsable y dedicado en sus obligaciones. Aduccio  desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya se encuentra en mal estado por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para reforzar el techo.
texts.en:
Aduccio is 48 years old and resides in his own home with his children. He grows crops, such as corn and sorghum. In addition, he works as a bricklayer so that he can generate income to sustain his household. Aduccio has many aspirations, is very responsible, and is dedicated to meeting his obligations.

He wants to repair the roof of his home since it is in poor condition. For this reason, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in the purchase of galvanized sheets and wood to reinforce the roof.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets and wood for repairing the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 24 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa ineterio para damas y caballeros, desde hace 3 años ejerce este oficio y cuenta con muchos clientes fijos con lo que puede mantener su negocio a flote, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar ,el vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo, el cliente  solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior ya que posee gran demanda por parte de muchas personas, con lo que podrá adquirir en diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The customer is 24 years old. He makes a living by selling men's and women's undergarments. He began this business three years ago and has many returning customers who allow him to maintain his business. With the money that he has earned from his sales, he has been able to pay for some household expenses. 

He lives with his life partner and their son. He requests a loan, which he will use to purchase undergarments in bulk since his products are in high demand. This way, he will be able to acquire items of different prices, styles, and colors so that he can increase his customer base and improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase men's and women's undergarments in bulk.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es: Jose de 45 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a su familia, Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son: maíz y frijol. José desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso solicita un crédito INTEGRAL  el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografia. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Jose, 45, is a man who is very responsible about his family obligations.  He has always done the best he can for his family.  Currently he lives with his wife and four kids.  He works very hard, with gusto and enthusiasm.  Jose is a farmer.  Every year he plants the main staple crops of the region, corn and beans.  Jose wants to increase his sales, which is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  The loan will allow him to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc. and improve his land, which is pictured in the photo.  He hopes to receive the requested assistance since he doesn't have any other sources of income, and this will allow him to continue providing for his household's daily necessities without any problems.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc. and improve his land

loans.name: Alvaro

texts.es: Álvaro de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia junto con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijo. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 6 años, cultiva los principales granos básicos como: arroz, frijoles y maíz. Es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos, es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas, semillas, etc. Con mucha confianza en Dios y en su trabajo espera tener una cosecha abundante de la cual pueda vender una parte y dejar otra parte para el consumo. Espera cumplir su sueño de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Álvaro is 37 years old. He lives in his own house with his life companion and their two children. He has been a farmer for 6 years. He grows the main basic grains like rice, beans and corn. He is a hard-working, responsible and enterprising person. He works very hard every day to bring home the daily bread. His household has no other source of income.

So Álvaro has decided to request a loan from Integral to invest in buying manure, fertilizer, insecticide, seeds, etc. With a lot of confidence in God and in his work, he hopes to have an abundant harvest. Part of it would be sold and the other part for their own consumption. He hopes to fulfill his dream of providing his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticides and seeds.

loans.name: Mario Ernesto

texts.es: Mario de 31 años de edad es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maiz y frijol; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista sale a comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia. Mario solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Mario is 31 years old. He lives with his wife and three children. He is very happy and hard-working. He works hard on his own plot of land where he grows corn and beans. His produce is of high quality and when it is harvest time he sells the product in the different markets close to his residence. 

Mario is requesting a loan from Integral to have the necessary money to purchase agricultural inputs like pest control, fertilizers, manure, seeds, etc, needed for planting. He longs to increase his sales to be able to get greater revenues and provide his family with a greater financial stability.

loans.use: to buy pest controls, fertilizer, manure, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Alma Jeaneth

texts.es: alma vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Alma lives in her own house with her husband and two children. She has a store where she sells daily use items like beans, milk, eggs, bread, etc. She has had the business for many years now which gives her the experience to know what items bring the greatest return. The store is located in her house and it is well-known by the people in the neighborhood. She has gained a lot of clients as her store is well-stocked.

Alma would like to increase her business and make another investment but she lacks the capital. So she is requesting a loan which will permit her to buy what is necessary for her store. She assures us that she can pay off the loan and at the same time is confident that she can provide her family with a higher quality of living.

loans.use: to buy beans, milk, eggs, bread, sweets, detergents, soap, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el posee un negocio de venta de huevos ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela pues su producto es muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su negocio logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de cartones con huevos por mayor y así tener siempre surtido su negocio y poder obtener mejores ingresos para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client lives in his own home with his wife and son. He has a business selling eggs, located in the market that his close to his place of residence. He has a lot of customers because his product is very sellable. With what he earns from his business, he is able to cover some of his household expenses.

The client is applying for a loan to buy cartons of eggs wholesale, so that his business is always stocked, he can get a better income and give his family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy cartons of eggs wholesale.

loans.name: Carlos Brigido

texts.es: Carlos de 58 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 40 años siembra maicillo y maiz comercializa en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos. Don Carlos está solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor estabilidad económica junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 58 years old and has been a farmer for some 40 years. He plants sorghum and corn, and sells the crops in the areas surrounding the zone where he resides. With the sale of his harvests, Carlos is able to cover his household expenses. He is responsible, honest, and a hardworker who lives with his wife and their 2 children.

Carlos is requesting a loan for purchasing inputs for his harvest, such as fertilizers, manures, seeds, etc. What he earns is insufficient to cover these expenses and produce better income and greater economic stability for Carlos together with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manures, seeds, etc., for his crops.

loans.name: Salvador Antonio

texts.es: Salvador de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus hijos, el se dedica a la venta y reparación de calzado desde hace 10 años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la calidad del trabajo que realiza, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logar solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Salvador esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como suelas, platillas, pegamento, cuero, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Salvador, 43 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and children. For 10 years he has worked selling and repairing shoes. His business is located in the place where he lives. He has many customers because of his good prices and the quality of his work. With his earnings he pays for some of his household expenses. Salvador is requesting a loan to buy some basic items such as shoe soles, insoles, glue, leather, etc. He wants to continue with his job, in which he earns well, so that he may give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shoe soles, insoles, glue, leather, etc.

loans.name: Wenceslao

texts.es: Wenceslao de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus hijos, el es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Wenceslao se dedica a la agricultura siembra maíz y maicillo, y adicional a eso también se dedica  a la pesca artesanal, sus cosechas las vende en las comercios de compra-venta de granos básicos que se encuentran cerca de su casa con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos  gastos de su hogar. Wenceslao desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso ha solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos,fertilizantes, controles de plagas, entre otras cosas, para seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Wenceslao, 44 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and children. He is a man who is very responsible with his household obligations, since he has always been known as someone who brings his family the best. Wenceslao is a farmer and grows corn and sorghum, and in addition to that he also engages in traditional fishing. He sells his harvests at the businesses trading in staple grains that are found near his house. With the earnings he obtains from his sales, he is able to cover some of the household expenses. Wenceslao wants to increase his sales, so he has requested a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pest control products, among other things, in order to continue providing his household with its daily bread.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pest control products, etc

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Don oscar de 39 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos, el tiene una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia como lo muestra la fotografía donde vende refrescos, golosinas, granos básicos, huevos, café, etc.   con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Oscar quiere terminar de mejora a su vivienda cambiando por completo el techo de toda su casa y otras necesidades que tiene pero con lo que obtiene de su negocio no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, por esa razón solicita un crédito para comprar laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en:
Oscar is 39 years old, and he lives with his wife and his two children.

He has a small store in his place of residence, as the photograph shows, where he sells soft drinks, snacks, dry beans and grains, eggs, coffee, and similar items. With what he earns from his sales, he manages to cover some of his household expenses.  

Oscar wants to complete the improvement of his home, replacing the entire roof, and other necessities; but he cannot accomplish this with what he earns from his business.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan—so that he can purchase metal sheeting and beams, and pay for labor, so that he and his family can live more safely.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting and beams, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos de 5 años y 11 años de edad. Eduardo se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad desde hace 12 años y es así como va sacando adelante a su familia y les da lo necesario. Eduardo solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la ampliación de un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual comprará cemento, ladrillo, arena, grava y hierro.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 47 years old.  He lives in his own home, together with his wife and two young children, ages 5 and 11 years.  Eduardo has worked as a security guard for twelve years.  This is how he gets his family ahead and gives them what they need.  

Eduardo is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in enlarging a bedroom.  To do this, he will buy cement, bricks, sand, gravel, and iron.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, gravel, and iron to enlarge a room in his home.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 14 años de edad y trabaja como operaria en una fábrica de su localidad desde hace tres años. Ella desea terminar de construir una pared y encementar el pisos de la misma ya que es de tierra y desea dar condiciones más higiénicas a su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra del material necesario como: cemento, grava, arena, ladrillo y hierro para hacer las mejoras necesarias.
texts.en: Elizabeth, 31, lives in her own home alongside her 14-year-old daughter. She has been an employee in a local factory for three years. She wants to finish building a wall, as well as put down cement floors, because right now they are made of earth, and she wants to provide more hygienic conditions for her family. This is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy materials like cement, gravel, sand, brick, and iron.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, sand, bricks, and iron to finish a wall, and put down a cement floor in her home.

loans.name: Reinaldo Alejandro

texts.es:
Reinaldo de 52 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos. Reynaldo se gana la vida trabajando como albañil y él es el único que percibe ingresos por su trabajo dado que su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar y al cuido de sus hijos. Reinaldo es un hombre comprometido en su trabajo y su deseo es que su familia cuente con buenas condiciones. Desea mejorar el techo de la vivienda y construir una fosa séptica por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento e inodoro. 
,
texts.en: Reinaldo, 52 years old, lives in his own house with his partner and their two children. Reinaldo earns a living as a construction worker. He is the only one who earns income from his work, since his wife dedicates herself to the household duties and to caring for their children. Reinaldo is man who is committed to his work and his desire is that his family live in good conditions. He wants to improve the roof of his dwelling and build a septic tank, so he requests this loan from FUSAI in order to buy galvanized roofing sheets, wood, cement, and a toilet.

loans.use: to buy galvanized roofing sheets, wood, cement, and a toilet to repair the roof of his dwelling and to build a septic tank

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto tiene 51 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida, madre y un hijo quien ya es mayor de edad. Ernesto trabaja como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad desde hace 7 años. es un un hombre muy trabajador y muy conocido en su localidad como un hombre responsable y honesto. Ernesto y su familia habita en condiciones muy humildes y desea reparar la pared de la parte trasera de la vivienda y una pila para reguardar el agua. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo, arena, grava y lámina. Es un hombre muy comprometido y expresa que con lo que gana logrará cancelar la deuda y así dejar abiertas las puertas de la Fundación para seguir siendo bien calificado para futuros créditos.
texts.en: Ernesto is 51 years old and lives in his own house together with his life partner, his mother and one son who is already an adult. For 7 years, Ernesto has worked as an employee in a business near his town. He is a very hard-working person and is very well-known in his community as a responsible and honest man. Ernesto and his family live in very humble conditions, and he would like to repair the wall of the back part of his home, and also construct a tank for storing water. Because of this, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, bricks, sand, gravel and metal sheets. He is a very committed man, and he says that he will be able to pay the debt with the money he earns, and thus keep the doors of the Foundation open so that he can remain well qualified for future loans.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, gravel and metal sheets to repar a wall of his home and build a water tank.

loans.name: Berta Gilma

texts.es: Berta tiene 39 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus padres y su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad. Berta trabaja en una biblioteca en un Colegio cercano a su localidad y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Berta desea terminar de construir un cuarto dormitorio el cual no ha logrado terminar por falta de recursos. Es por esta razón que solicita esta crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo, arena y grava. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Berta is 39 years old and is a single mother. She lives in her house together with her parents and her 4 year old son. Berta works at a library in a school close to her home. That is how she earns a living and takes care of her home expenses. Berta hopes to finish building a bedroom, which she has not been able to finish because of lack of resources. This is why she is requesting this loan with FUSAI. She will invest it in buying cement, brick, sand, and gravel. She hopes to have this financing, since she does not have the money available, but she is able to make payments on the loan.

loans.use: to buy cement, brick, sand, and gravel to finish a bedroom.

loans.name: Santos Matías

texts.es: Santos de 31 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 10 y 5 años d edad. Santos trabaja como vendedor en una comercial cercana a su municipio. Santos desea construir un muro de retención en su terreno ya que por la inclinación que tiene cuando llueve se lava. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y para pagar la mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en: Santos, who is 31 years old, lives in his own house along with his life companion and their two children, ages 10 and 5. Santos works as a vendor in a commercial center near his town. Santos wants to build a retaining wall on his land, since due to the slope that it has, it washes away when it rains. To do this, he is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of blocks, cement, and sand and pay for labor for the construction.

loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, and sand and pay for labor to construct a retaining wall.

loans.name: Sindy Marianela

texts.es: Sindy tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y y sus cinco hijos (2, 4, 7, 14 y 17 años de edad). Sindy se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos y junto con su compañero de vida quien es agricultor complementan para sostener los gastos del hogar y dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Sindy desea construir un corredor a su vivienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo han logrado construir. Sindy solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios (lámina galvanizada y polines) para construir el corredor de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en: Silvia is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her life companion and her five children of 2, 4, 7, 14 and 17 years old. Sindy makes her living by providing housekeeping services, and with the help of her companion who is a farmer they are both able to pay for the household expenditures and give the children better living conditions. With a lot of effort she was able to construct her house, and now she wishes to build a hallway in it. Sindy is asking for a loan to FUSAI to buy the materials required (corrugated galvanised iron and poles) to build the hallway in her home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy corrugated galvanised iron and poles to build a hallway in her house.

loans.name: Sonia Del Carmen

texts.es: Sonia de 41 años de edad es una mujer muy  trabajadora quien se gana la vida por medio de la venta de pan francés. Reside en casa propia y es muy conocida en su comunidad como una mujer responsable y honesta. Sonia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir un cuarto dormitorio y no cuenta con el capital disponible. Con el monto solicitado comprará madera, vara de castilla y lámina galvanizada. Ella está muy consiente de la deuda que adquirirá pero esta dispuesta a asumirla y cancelar las cuotas en el tiempo estipulado.
texts.en: Forty-one-year-old Sonia is a very hardworking woman who earns her living selling French bread.  She lives in her own home and she is very well-known in her community as a responsible and honest woman.  Sonia has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI because she wants to build a fourth bedroom and she does not have capital available.  With the requested amount she will buy wood, castilla cane, and corrugated sheet metal.  She is very conscious of the debt she will acquire, but she is ready to take it on and make her payments in the designated time.

loans.use: to buy wood, castilla cane, and sheet metal to build a bedroom

loans.name: Elio Del Carmen

texts.es: Elio de 54 años de edad es viudo y reside en casa propia junto a sus dos hijas de 15 y 13 años de edad. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Todos los años cultiva la tierra y cuando saca la cosecha pone una parte a la venta y el resto lo deja para el consumo. De esta forma es como da a sus hijas lo necesario y lleva el sustento diario. Elio en la actualidad no cuenta con el servicio de agua potable por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el pago del derecho a la conexión del servicio y para construir una pila para reguardar el vital líquido que tanta falta les hace.
texts.en: Elio is 54-years old.  He is a widow and lives in his own home with his two daughters, who are 15- and 13-years old respectively.  Elio makes his living growing corn and beans.  Each year he plants the fields, and when he harvests his crop he puts some aside to sell and the rest is for his family's consumption.  This is how he gives his daughters what they need and supports his household.  At this time, Elio does not have potable water service.  That is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI.  He wants to invest in paying to tap into the water supply and to build a basin to store this vital liquid, which they so greatly need.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand and brick and to pay for his potable water service connection.

loans.name: Jesús Pastora

texts.es: Jesús es una mujer de 73 años de edad quien habita en casa en casa propia junto a su hija y nieto. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable quien toda su vida ha trabajado para sacar adelante a su hija y darle lo necesario. Jesús desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para el repello de la paredes de la vivienda que con  tanto esfuerzo ha logrado construir.
texts.en: Jesús is a 73 year old woman who live in her own house with her daughter and grandson.  She is a very hardworking and responsible woman who has worked her whole life to get her daughter ahead and give her everything she needs. Jesús wants to improve her home and that is why she is asking FUSAI for this loan. She will invest in buying cement, sand and paying for the labor costs to plaster the walls of her house that she was able to build with so much work.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of her house.

loans.name: Carlos Atilio

texts.es: Carlos tiene 40 años de edad y habita en condiciones muy sencillas junto a su compañera de vida y su hija de 7 años y dos hijos de 10 años y 14 años de edad. Carlos trabaja como jornalero desde hace 18 años y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Carlos se ha dado cuenta de la oportunidad que FUSAI brinda a personas de escasos recursos con deseos de mejorar sus condiciones.
