Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica ya que no cuenta con el servicio y desea mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 40 years old and lives very simply with his life companion and a 7 year old daughter and 2 sons who are 10 and 14 years old.

Carlos has been working as a laborer for 18 years and this is how he supports the household. 

Carlos has taken the opportunity that FUSAI offers to people with scarce resources wanting to improve their circumstances. Therefore, he is asking for a loan through FUSAI in order to have electricity installed as he does not have this service and he wants to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to have electricity installed at his home

loans.name: Carolina Marisela

texts.es: Carolina de 32 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia  junto a sus dos hijos de 13 años y 6 años de edad. Carolina se dedica a la venta de tamales y a la prestación de servicios domésticos dese hace dos años. Carolina es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y muy comprometida en sus obligaciones. Carolina solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de una pila ya que se encuentra deteriorada y el agua se filtra. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, ladrillo y arena. Tiene plena confianza que podrá pagar el crédito con los ingresos que percibe de trabajo.
texts.en: Carolina is a 32 year old single mother. She lives in her own house together with her two children, aged 6 and 13 years old. Carolina has been selling tamales and working as a domestic worker for the past two years. Carolina is a hard-working woman who is responsible and very committed to her obligations. She has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the repair of her water-basin which has deteriorated and leaks water. With the requested money she will buy cement, sand and bricks. She is confident that she can meet her payments with the income she receives from her work.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks and sand to build a washbasin.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es: María tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su pequeño hijo de 8 meses de edad. María se dedica a la venta de pupusas(preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.)desde hace un año. el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su hogar de habitación y gracias al buen trato y deliciosas pupusas que ofrece muchas personas la prefieren por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes. María desea construir un cuarto para la cocina ya que actualmente no tiene. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina y madera ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso pero expresa que junto a su esposo ajustarán para cancelar la deuda  que el crédito implica.
texts.en: María is 21 years old and she lives in her own home together with her husband and her little eight-month-old son.  María has been selling pupusas (a prepared food with a corn dough base, beans, cheese, etc.) for a living for a year.  Her business is located in her home and, thanks to the good service and delicious pupusas she offers, many people prefer her and she already has many customers.  María wants to build a room for her stove as she does not currently have one.  For that reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in sheet metal and wood because she does not have the capital for the expense, but she tells us that, together with her husband, they will adapt to repay the debt from the loan.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal and wood to build a room for her stove.

loans.name: Reina Luciana

texts.es: Reina tiene 55 años de edad y habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su esposo y sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y le colaboran con la economía del hogar. Reina se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 7 años y es así como se gana la vida y junto a su esposo han sacado adelante a sus hijos. Reina se ha dado cuenta de los créditos que FUSAI ofrece a personas de escasos recursos que no son cubiertas por el sistema financiero tradicional por lo que como toda mujer visionaria solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo de la vivienda el cual se encuentra en mal estado y cuando es tiempo de lluvias se mojan sus pocas pertenencias.
texts.en:
Reina is 55 years old and lives in very poor conditions with her husband and her adult children who help with the household expenses.

Reina has worked as a domestic worker for 7 years and this is how she earns a living and together with her husband she has brought up her children.

Reina has taken advantage of the FUSAI loans offered to people of scarce resources which more traditional financing does not cover, and as a woman of vision she is asking for this loan through FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of galvanized steel sheeting and wood in order to repair the roof of the house which is in poor condition because in the rainy season their few belongings get wet.

loans.use: to buy galvanized steel sheeting and wood to repair the roof of the house

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es: Roberto tiene 41 años de edad y trabaja como albañil desde hace 6 años. ÉL habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y dos hijos de 7 años y 11 años de edad. Roberto es un hombre comprometido  con su familia y siempre esta pendiente de que cuenten con mejores condiciones de vida. Para dar mayor segurirdad a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea repellar las paredes de la vivienda y reparar el techo de la misma. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, lámina galvanizada, y polines.
texts.en: Roberto is 41 years old and has worked in construction for six years. He lives in his own house with his wife and two children aged 7 and 11. He is dedicated to his family and always on the lookout for a way to improve their living conditions. To provide his family with greater security, Roberto has decided to seek a loan from FUSAI as he wishes to plaster the walls and repair the roof of his house. With the money he plans to buy cement, sand, galvanized sheeting, and beams.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, galvanized sheeting, and beams to repair his house

loans.name: Margarita Patricia

texts.es: Margarita tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y pequeña hija de 4 años d edad. Margarita se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva desde hace 6 años y es así como se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida quien trabaja en una cooperativa mantiene la economía de su hogar. Margarita desea construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Margarita is twenty-two years old and she lives in her own home with her partner and four-year old daughter. Margarita has been selling new clothing to make a living for six years. Together with her partner, who works in a co-op, she maintains household finances. Margarita wants to build a fourth bedroom in her home; for this reason, she is applying for this loan with FUSAI to buy wood and galvanized sheet metal.

loans.use: to buy wood and galvanized sheet metal to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Wuil Alfredo

texts.es: Wuil tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 5 meses de edad. El es un hombre muy trabajador, responsable y dedicado. Trabaja como jornalero y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de las paredes y techo de la vivienda para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: adobes, lamina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en: Wuil is 30 years old and lives in his own house with his life companion and 5 month old son. He is a hard-working, responsible and dedicated man. He works as a day laborer and this is his way to earn a living and support his household. With the goal of providing better security to his family he has decided to request a loan from FUSAI to invest in repairing the walls and roof of his house. To do this he needs to buy materials like bricks, galvanized laminate and wood.

loans.use: to buy bricks, galvanized laminate and wood to add walls to the house and change the roof.

loans.name: Yolanda Isabel

texts.es: Yolanda tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos. Yolanda se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace tres años. Es así como junto a su esposo mantienen a sus hijos y dan lo necesario. Yolanda desea terminar de construir las paredes de un cuarto ya que no ha podido terminar por falta de recursos económicos. Yolanda solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina galvanizada y madera para terminar de construir el cuarto.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 40 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children.

Yolanda has been working as a domestic for 3 years. This is how she and her husband have brought up their children providing them with necessities.

Yolanda wants to finish constructing the walls of a room that she has not been able to complete due to lack of financial resources.

Yolanda is asking for this loan through FUSAI in order to buy galvanized steel sheeting and wood in order to finish building the room.

loans.use: to buy galvanized steel sheeting and wood to finish building a room

loans.name: Felicita Martina

texts.es: Felicita de 32 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 7 años quien se encuentra estudiando. Felicita trabaja como operaría en una fábrica cercana a su localidad y junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía de su familia. Felicita desea construir un baño sanitario ya que el que tiene se encuentra en malas condiciones y no es muy saludable para la familia. Para realizar la obra solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, taza para baño, cemento y arena ya que no puede hacerle por sus propios medios.
texts.en: Felicita is 32 years old. She lives in her own house along with her partner and their small daughter who is 7 years old and in school. Felicita works as an operator in a nearby factory in her town and with her spouse they maintain the family. Felicita wishes to build a sanitary bathroom since the one they have is in bad condition and is not healthy for the family. To perform this job, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheets, a toilet, cement and sand since she cannot build it by her own means.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, a toilet, cement and sand to build a sanitary bathroom.

loans.name: Reinaldo Osmin

texts.es: Reinaldo tiene 33 años de edad y se gana la vida  trabajando como jornalero. Él y su familia habitan en condiciones muy humildes pero trabaja muy duro para mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Tal como se puede apreciar en la fotografía la vivienda de Reinaldo es muy sencilla y no es muy segura por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de adobes y lámina galvanizada para asegurar las paredes de la vivienda y al mismo tiempo a su familia.
texts.en:
Reinaldo, age 33, earns a living working as a day worker.  He and his family live under very humble conditions.  However, he works very hard to improve their living conditions.  As you can see in the photograph, Reinaldo’s house is very simple, and it is not very secure.

That is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy adobes and galvanized metal sheeting to secure the walls of the house.  At the same time he will be making his family secure.

loans.use: to buy adobes and galvanized metal sheeting to secure the walls of the house.

loans.name: Deysi Iduvina

texts.es: A sus 61 años de edad Deysi trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ricas quesadillas que día con día prepara con mucho amor. Gracias a su carisma y buen trato a los clientes muchas personas la prefieren y cada día son más las personas que solicitan sus productos. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de las paredes de la vivienda ya que el material se encuentra deteriorado y desea cambiarlo por material más resistente. Con el monto solicitado comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava para cambiar las paredes de la vivienda.
texts.en: At 61 years old, Deysi is working very hard in order to support her household. She makes a living making and selling delicious quesadillas, which she prepares with much love every day. Thanks to her charisma and her good customer service, many customers prefer to come to Deysi's stall and her number of customers is always growing. In order to improve her living conditions Deysi is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to repair the walls in her home. The materials used to build them are now deteriorated and Deysi wants to replace them with more resistant material. Deysi will use this loan to buy bricks, cement, sand and gravel in order to change the walls in her home.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and gravel in order to change the walls in her home.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad. Carlos es un hombre trabajador quien se gana la vida como jornalero. Para el lo más importante es su familia y por ella hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar mejores condiciones de vida. Carlos solicita este crédito a FUSAI para mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda ya que las paredes no cuentan con material resistente y el techo se encuentra dañado. Con el monto solicitado comprará adobes, lámina galvanizada y madera. Espera poder contar con el financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en: Carlos is 36 years old and lives in his own house along with his life companion and his small son of 4 years old. Carlos is a hardworking man who makes a living as a day laborer. For him the most important thing in life is his family and makes everything he can to give them the best possible living conditions. Carlos is asking for a loan to FUSAI to improve the conditions of his house, given the fact that the walls do not have a resistant material and the roof presents some damages. With the amount requested he will buy adobe, galvanised sheet and wood. He hopes to get this funding because he doesn’t have the necessary resources to buy the materials by his own means.

loans.use: to buy adobe, galvanised sheet and wood to build walls and change the roof of the house.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es: Consuelo tiene 41 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos de 21 años, 18 años, 15 años y un año de edad. Consuelo se dedica a la venta antojitos típicos y productos de primera necesidad en su pequeña tienda que ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación. Consuelo desea construir un baño con servicio sanitario  lavable para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, grava e inodoro lavable. Confía que  con los ingresos que percibe de su negocio logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Consuelo, 41, lives in her own house with her four children, ages 21, 18, 15 and one year old.  She sells typical snack foods and staples at the small store she has been able to establish in her house.  Consuelo wants to build a bathroom and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, gravel and a flush toilet.  She trusts that with the income she earns through her business she will be able to pay back the loan.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, gravel and a flush toilet to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Eduardo Luis

texts.es: Eduardo tiene  24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Eduardo trabaja como agricultor desde hace 6 años y de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Eduardo ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para para invertir en las mejoras que su vivienda necesita como lo son las paredes y el piso. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso y para repellar las paredes de la vivienda las cuales son de adobe y cuando es tiempo de lluvias se deterioran.
texts.en: Eduardo is 24, lives in his own home with his family, and has earned a living by farming for six years. He has decided to apply for a loan from FUSAI [Fundación Salvadoreña de Apoyo Integral, Salvadoran Foundation for Integral Support] to invest in essential repairs to his home, such as installing a new floor and plastering the walls. Eduardo will use the loan funds to purchase cement, sand, and gravel for a new floor and to repair the adobe walls of his home, which suffer damage during the rainy season.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, and gravel to install a floor and plaster the walls of his home.

loans.name: Yesenia Patricia

texts.es: Yesenia tiene 21 años de edad y se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz) desde hace tres años. Ella habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 4 años de edad. Yesenia desea invertir en el cambio de techo y puertas de su vivienda dado que se encuentran en mal estado y desea dar mejores condiciones a su familia. Yesenia no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y puertas para la vivienda.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 21 years old and has worked making and selling tortillas (a healthy food with a corn dough base) for 3 years.  She lives in a house that she and her life partner own along with their young 4-year-old daughter.  Yesenia wants to invest in getting a new roof and new doors for her house, since they are in bad condition.  She wants to give her family better living conditions.

Yesenia doesn't have the money to cover the cost, which is why she is asking FUSAI for this loan so she can invest it in buying sheet metal, wood, and doors for her house.

loans.use: buy sheet metal, wood, and doors so she can repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Lorena  Guadalupe

texts.es: Lorena de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija de 7 años de edad y su esposo quien trabaja como albañil, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace vario años, donde comercializa variedad de productos  como: refrescos, golosinas, granos básicos, aceite, café, azúcar, detergentes, etc. posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios, Lorena está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor y así surtir la tienda que le genera venas ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Lorena is 32-years old.  She lives in her own home with her 7-year old daughter and her husband, who works as a brick layer.  For a numbers of years, Lorena has run a small store out of her home.  She sells a variety of products, like beverages, sweets, basic grains, cooking oil, coffee, sugar, detergents etc.  She has a large clientele because of the good prices she offers.  Lorena is requesting a loan in order to purchase more wholesale products to stock up her store, which will generate a good profit and allow her to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale beverages, sweets, basic grains, cooking oil, coffee, sugar, detergents etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 25 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos; Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene varios años con este trabajo y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener los mejores resultados, su  negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, es muy conocida pues sus tortillas son las mas ricas y siempre están calientitas, tiene mucha clientela y la buscan por su excelente calidad, buenos precios y sobre todo el servicio mas rápido; la clienta es una joven luchadora, entregada a su labor, su mas grande meta es alcanzar el triunfo y se esfuerza día con día para ganarse ese futuro mas próspero; quiere aumentar su inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor y cal, la clienta tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos asegura que cancelara la deuda y así podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 25 years old, and she lives with her life partner and their two children.  She sells tortillas, work that she has been doing for several years.  She has a lot of experience, which allows her to obtain the best results. 

Her business, which is located in her place of residence, is well known, as her tortillas are the tastiest, and always hot; and she has many customers who seek her out for her excellent quality, good prices, and above all, her fast service. 

The client is a young woman who strives, and is dedicated to her work.  Her biggest goal is to achieve success, and she works very hard every day, in order to have a more prosperous future. 

She would like to invest more, but she doesn’t have enough capital.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from Integral, which will allow her to purchase corn at wholesale, and lime powder.

The client has good references from her neighbors, and she promises that she will pay off the loan. This way, she will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn at wholesale, and lime powder.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 28 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus padres, el se dedica a la serigrafia, confección y venta de ropa deportiva desde hace varios años, posee clientela establecida que lo buscan por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, siempre esta a la orden de los clientes, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo ayuda en los gastos del hogar, El cliente esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra de variedad de telas por mayor y pintura para poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y así poder tener junto con sus padres una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This borrower is 28 years old and lives in his own house with his parents.  He's had a business where he does silkscreen and makes and sells sports clothes for a number of years.  He has an established customer base.  His customers seek out his business for the quality of his products and his good prices, and because he is always ready to serve them.  With his earnings from this business, he helps with the household expenses.  

This borrower is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy fabric at wholesale and paint, so that he can continue with his work.  This way he can generate good profits, enabling him to have a better quality of life with his parents.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fabric at wholesale and to buy paint

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 22 años de edad  vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como: frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, las personas la prefieren y la mantienen delante de la competencia porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes,  como toda buena comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This borrower is 22 years old. She lives in her own house with her life companion. She has a store where she sells basic products such as beans, milk, eggs, and bread, among other items. She has been in her business for many years, and this has given her experience in sales that allows her to obtain the best earnings. The store is located in her place of residence in an area with a lot of traffic, and so she has many customers, since she has the best stocked store. People prefer her, and they keep her ahead of the competition because she always has what they need, with quality products at affordable prices and unequaled service. She is always at the service of her customers. Like any good businessperson, she wants to increase her business and make a new investment, but she needs capital. For this she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy bulk grains, candies, eggs, bread, beverages, etc. She affirms that she will pay off the debt, and at the same time she is confident that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bulk grains, candies, eggs, bread, beverages, etc., for her store.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella posee un molino y venta de gas propano desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por el buen servicio que brinda, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de gas propano por mayor y discos, cuchillas y herramientas necesarias para el molino y así continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos para darle a su hijo lo que necesita sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
Rosa is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her son. She has had a mill and has sold propane gas for several years. Her business is located in her home and she has many customers, because of the good service that she offers. With what she gets from her earnings, she manages to pay some household expenses. 

Rose is requesting a loan in order to buy propane gas at wholesale, as well as disks, blades and tools necessary for the mill. This is so that she can continue with her work, as that is her sole source of income. This will enable her to provide her son with what he needs, without any limitations.

loans.use: To buy propane gas at wholesale, as well as disks, blades and necessary tools for the mill.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia,  desde hace varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de ganado de repasto, comercializa sus productos en los mercados que se encuentran cerca de su residencia, ya es clientela establecida que lo prefieren porque siempre vende a un buen precio y el producto es fresco, Jorge está solicitando un crédito a INTEGAL  para la compra de un novillo de engorde y así seguir con su producción que le genera buenas ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge, 42, lives in his own house with his family.  He has been working in agriculture and livestock for several years, selling his products on the markets near his home.  He already has a good customer base because of the fresh produce and affordable prices that he offers.
  
Jorge is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy a young bull for fattening, which will help him to continue to generate an income to provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy a young bull for fattening.

loans.name: Luz De Maria

texts.es: Luz de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas y un nieto, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano, comercializa la ropa de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela que la prefieren por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, Luz esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor y así poder seguir con su trabajo que es su única fuente de ingresos y poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz, 42, lives in her own house with her two daughters and one grandson.  She sells second-hand clothes for a living.  She sells her clothes travelling around the different areas near her house.  She is preferred by a lot of customers for the quality of her clothes and the affordable prices.  

Luz is asking for a loan to buy clothes in bulk so that she can carry on in this line of work, which is her only source of income.  In this way, she can improve her income and provide a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Jose Uclides  Antonio

texts.es: Jose de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, desde hace varios años posee una venta de frutas y verduras, vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, tiene mucha clientela por las buenos precios,  y las verduras y frutas son frescas, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo  logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar,  Don José está solicitando un crédito para la compra de  frutas y verduras por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y así el y su esposa puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose, 56, lives in his own house with his wife.  For several years he has been working as a street vendor selling fruits and vegetables in the different communities near his home.  He has many customers because of his fresh produce and low prices.  He is able to cover household expenses with the income he earns with his work.  

Jose is requesting a loan to buy wholesale fruits and vegetables to continue his work so he and his wife can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 61 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con su hija y su nieta,  ella tiene un negocio de Venta de ropa usada ó de segunda, en donde ofrece variedad de prendas de vestir como: faldas, vestidos, blusas, pantalones, etc. Ubicado en una  zona muy transitada y conocida por los habitantes de donde ella reside. El puesto de Teresa es muy visitado ya que las personas siempre encuentran lo que buscan, la amabilidad y el buen trato es lo más importante. Su sueño es ver crecer su negocio por lo que ha decidido hacer un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar más fardos de ropa usada y tener más variedad de prendas de vestir Como: pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisetas, shorts, entre otros. Con el propósito de atraer a más compradores y lograr un mayor nivel de ventas así como un mayor nivel de ingresos para que ella y su familia puedan tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Teresa is 61 years old and lives in a rented home with her daughter and granddaughter. She has a used clothing business where she sells a variety of garments such as: skirts, dresses, blouses, pants, etc. It's located in a busy area that's well-known by residents. Teresa's stand is very busy because people always find what they're looking for, and friendliness and customer service are always what's most important. Her dream is to see her business grow so she has decided to apply for a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase more bundles of used clothing increase the variety of garments such as: pants, skirts, blouses, shirts, shorts, among others. The idea is to attract more buyers and obtain higher sales as well as more income so that she and her family can have greater financial stability.

loans.use: To purchase pants, skirts, blouses, shirts, shorts, among other things

loans.name: Israel Baltazar

texts.es: Israel de 55 años de edad desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de hamacas  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en la calle principal de donde el reside, tiene clientela pues donde se encuentra es un lugar muy transitado y la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios también hace que tenga clientela que lo prefieran, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposa, Don Israel está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hamacas de diferentes estilos y tamaños para surtir a una mas su negocio y así obtener mejores ganancias para que el y su esposa puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Israel is 55 years old. For 10 years, he has sold hammocks. He has his business on the main street where he lives. He has customers because a lot of people go by the place where it is located and the quality of the products and the good prices also make customers prefer him. With the earnings he makes he is able to pay for some household expenses. He lives is a house he owns with his wife. Israel is asking for a loan to buy different styles and sizes of hammocks to stock his business more so he can obtain better earnings so he and his wife can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy different styles and sizes of hammocks.

loans.name: Bartola

texts.es: Bartola de 59 años de edad, reside en casa propia con su hija y nietas. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ricas pupusas. Día a día se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado y tener frescos y listos los ingredientes que le permiten hacer sus deliciosas pupusas. Tiene mucha clientela, Bartola ha decidido hacer un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio ya que su sueño es verlo crecer de manera que pueda así mejorar su calidad de vida. Piensa invertir en la materia prima necesaria como: maíz, arroz, chicharon, queso, frijoles, tomates, repollo, etc. de esta manera espera lograr su sueño y poder dar a su familia una mejor oportunidad de vida.
texts.en: Bartola is 59 years old and lives in her own house with her daughter and grandchildren. She works in the production and sale of tasty pupusas. Every day she gets up very early to go to the market and prepare the fresh ingredients necessary for making her delicious pupusas. She has many customers, and Bartola has decided to apply for a loan with INTEGRAL to invest it in her business. Her dream is to see her business grow so that she can improve her quality of life. She's thinking of investing in necessary ingredients such as: corn, rice, pork rinds, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc so she can make her dream come true and provide her family with the opportunity to have a better life.

loans.use: To purchase corn, rice, pork rinds, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Ana Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos, ella  posee un puesto en la zona  donde reside en el cual vende ricas e higiénicas tortillas. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la venta de tortillas razón por la cual ya es muy conocida en la zona y los clientes la prefieren por brindar un buen servicio y sobre todo higiene y buenos precios en sus tortillas. Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora.  Ana esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar maíz por quintales y cal. Tiene mucha Fe que tendrá éxito con la decisión tomada y sus condiciones de vida poco a poco se irán trasformando de manera positiva para que a ellas y a su familia no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Ana, 44, lives in her own house together with her husband and children.  She has a stall nearby where she sells delicious and healthy tortillas.  She has been doing this for many years, so she is well-known in the area.  Her customers prefer her because of the good service she offers, especially the cleanliness of her stall, and the good prices.  

She is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman.  She is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy some quintals of corn and lime powder.  She firmly believes that this will bring her success and little by little, she will be able to improve her family’s conditions and make sure they have all they need.

loans.use: to buy quintals of corn and lime powder.

loans.name: Francisco Ovidio

texts.es: Francisco de 53 años de edad se dedica a la venta de yuca desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante con los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos. Francisco está solicitando un crédito para la compra de yuca por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi el y su familia pueden tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Francisco is 53 years old. He has worked selling cassava for various years. His business is located in the market close to his home. With the earnings from his sales he can pay the expenses of his household. He lives in his own house with his wife and four children.

Francisco asks for a loan to be able to buy cassava in bulk. By this he will be able to continue his business. This is the only job he has and it helps him and his family to achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cassava in bulk.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: Maria de 42 años de edad vive con su esposo quien se dedica a la pesca artesanal. Ella posee una tienda donde vende: arroz, frijoles, leche, golosinas, refrescos,  entre otros,  adicional a eso también vende antojitos como yuca y papas frita, pastelitos de carne, etc. últimamente se ha hecho de  mucha clientela, pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con productos de excelente calidad a precios realmente accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Maria es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere sentirse ganadora y para lograr el éxito sus mayores secretos son la constancia y la dedicación, esta dispuesta a hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, embutidos, golosinas, bebidas etc. ella tiene la confianza que con su dedicación podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 42, lives with her husband who is a traditional fisherman.  She has a shop where she sells rice, frijoles beans, milk, candy, soft drinks and more.  She also sells other treats such as yucca, potato chips, meat filled pastries, etc.  Recently, she has attracted a lot of customers because she always has high quality products at affordable prices and a good service.  

Maria is an entrepreneurial woman who is very keen on progressing and being successful.  To fulfill her goals, her most important secret is hard work and dedication.  She wants to increase her business so she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, cold meats, candy, drinks, etc.  She firmly believes that thanks to her dedication, she will be able to provide her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, cold meat, candy, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Misael Adonay

texts.es: Misael de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia,  Él se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz y maicillo, adicional a eso también cultiva jocote. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante varios años de su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que él consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Misael is 49 years old and lives in his own home along with his family. He is a farmer who grows corn, sorghum, and also hog plums. He has been farming for several years and this is how he is able to earn a living. Misael is a hardworking and responsible man who is well-known in the area for his huge heart and his friendliness with other people.

Misael decided to begin preparing for the planting season, which is why he is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral. He will invest in the purchase of seeds, compost, insecticides, fertilizers, pest controls, and other supplies. What he wants most is to have an abundant harvest that is better than the previous ones. This will enable him to continue supporting his family. The trust he puts in God to help him, his dedication, and the effort he puts into his work will allow him to achieve his dream of improving his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, insecticides, fertilizers, pest controls, and other supplies.

loans.name: Ilsia Edith

texts.es: Ilsia tiene 33 años dedad y se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su pequeña tienda que con mucho tiempo ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación. Además también posee un molino de Nixtamal en el cual muchas personas llegan a moler variedad de semillas como: maíz, arroz, frijoles, etc. Ilsia habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 5 años y su hija de 10 años de edad quien se encuentra en edad escolar y desea mejorar las condiciones de el cuarto donde posee el molino ya que no ha logrado terminar las paredes por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena y así mejorar la seguridad de su molino que es una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos.
texts.en:
Ilsia is 33 years old and manages a small store where she sells basic necessities. She established this business in her home a long time ago. In addition, she also owns a grain mill where many people come to have a variety of dry goods processed such as corn, rice, beans, and other crops.

Ilsia resides in her own home with her husband, her five-year-old son, and her 10-year-old daughter. Her children are of school age.

She wants to improve the conditions of the room where her grain mill is kept since the walls have not been finished. Therefore, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to buy bricks, cement, and sand. This will ensure that the grain mill is stored in a secure place since it serves as one of her main sources of income.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand for repairing the area where her grain mill is kept.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 25 años de edad dese hace dos años se dedica a la venta de libros su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia vende todo tipo de libros educativos y posee mucha clientela que la buscan por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo ayuda en los gastos del hogar, vive en casa propia con la madre, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas libros para vender y así seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y asi ella su madre puedan tener una mejor vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
This borrower is 25 years old and has been selling books for two years. Her business is located in her home. She sells all types of educational books and has many customers who look for good prices. The income she earns from her work helps with the household expenses.

The borrower lives in her own home with her mother. She is requesting a loan so that she can buy more books to sell. As a result, she can continue her work and generate good profits so that she can provide a better life for her mother without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy books at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 24 años vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer honesta, trabajadora y sobre todo muy emprendedora. Hace 3 años que logro establecer una pequeña tiendita en su lugar de residencia y gracias a Dios y a su arduo trabajo y dedicación el negocio es muy reconocido en la zona por lo que ya cuenta con mucha clientela. Para la clienta es muy importante mantener activo este negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la tienda tales como: huevos, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, leche, frijoles, pan dulce y de más artículos que parezcan atractivos para los clientes. De esta manera espera lograr su sueño de seguir mantenido activo su negocio y poder tener junto con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The customer is 24 years old, she lives in her own home with her family. She characterizes herself as being an honest, hardworking and above all a very enterprising woman. Three years ago, she managed to set up a small grocery store in her home, and thanks to God and her hard work and dedication, the business is well known in the area which is why she already has a lot of customers.

For the customer it is very important to keep this business alive as this is her main source of income. It is for this reason that she has decided to seek a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of merchandise for the store such as eggs, sweets, sugar, rice, milk, beans, sweet bread and more items that appear attractive to customers. It is in this manner that she hopes to achieve her dream of keeping the business alive and to have a better financial stability together with her family.

loans.use: to buy eggs, sweets, sugar, rice, milk, beans, sweet bread and more items.

loans.name: Marcelino De Jesus

texts.es: Don Marcelino vive junto a su familia en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercializa en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren  por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, herbicida, fertilizantes, abonos,  etc. Don Marcelino tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Marcelino lives with his family in his own home. He makes his living growing corn and beans. He has been working in agriculture for many years, and this has given him a lot of experience that allows him to get better harvests. He sells his harvests in the areas surrounding the community. He has a lot of customers who prefer him for his quality, good prices, and above all, good service.

He needs to make an investment which is why he is applying for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, insecticide, herbicide, fertilizers, compost, etc. Marcelino has good financial references from people who know him. He is very responsible and guarantees that he will be able to pay off the debt in the established period, and is also confident that he will bring financial security to his home.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticide, herbicide, fertilizer, compost, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 28 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 5 años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz y el maicillo, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus hijos, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: This client is 28 years old. He has worked in agriculture for 5 years. This has given him the skills and knowledge necessary to help his crops. His main crops are corn and sorghum. He sells his crops in basic grains buying and selling agencies that are close to her home. With the earnings he obtains from his sales, he helps with his family's expenses. He lives in his own home with his wife and children. He is asking for a loan to be able to buy agricultural materials to help him plant his crops, such as: fertilizer, seeds, pest control. herbicide, etc., as well as to improve the land seen in the photograph and thus be bale to have better profits and continue to help with expenses without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, pest control, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Santos Roberto

texts.es: Santos de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a trabajar como albañil, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo ha salido adelante con los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en la parte de enfrente de su casa y colocar piso  en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero con lo que gana, no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para poder comprar los materiales necesarios como: arena, ladrillos, hierro, cemento, cerámica, etc. y asi mejorar su vivienda para el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Santos is 42 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and their two children. He works as a bricklayer and with what he obtains from his work he has gotten ahead with the household expenses. He wants to improve his home by building a wall in front of his house, and to put in a floor in the place shown in the photograph. What he earns isn't enough to be able to do it and that is why he is asking for a loan to buy necessary materials such as sand, bricks, iron, cement, ceramics, etc. This way he can improve his home so that he and his family can live more comfortably and safer.

loans.use: to buy sand, bricks, iron, cement, ceramics, etc.

loans.name: Marina Elizabeth

texts.es: Marina de 35 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 11 y 2 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de antojitos como: tostadas de tajaditas de papas, yuca, platanitos,  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en un lugar muy transitado cerca de su lugar de residencia, por esa razón posee mucha clientela, Marina esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como: yuca, papa, plátanos, aceite, etc. todo por mayor para la elaboración de estos alimentos y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marina, who is 35 years old, lives with her husband and their two children, ages 11 and 2. She makes and sells snacks such as tostadas with sliced potatoes, yucca, and plantains. Her business is located near her home in a place with a lot of traffic. For this reason, she has many customers. Marina is applying for a loan to purchase basic supplies such as yucca, potatoes, plantains, oil, etc., all wholesale, to prepare these foods and thus obtain better earnings to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy yuccas, potatoes, plantains, oil, etc.

loans.name: Ana Marisol

texts.es: Ana de 35 de años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa de un familiar con sus dos hijos, ella tiene un negocio de salón de belleza desde hace varios  años en su casa de habitación trabaja de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Ana solicita un crédito para poder comprar productos para su salón de belleza como: cremas, shampoo, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y asi podrá atender mejor a sus clientes y obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad económica junto con sus hijos.
texts.en: Ana, who is 35 years old, is a single mother. She lives in the house of a relative with her two children. She has had a beauty salon in her home for a number of years. She works from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm. She has many customers, since she does very good work. With the earnings that she obtains, she manages to pay her household expenses. Ana is applying for a loan to be able to buy products for her beauty salon such as creams, shampoo, hair clips, and scissors, among other items that she needs. Thus she will be able to serve her customers better and obtain better earnings, which will help her and her children to have better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoo, hair clips, and scissors, among other items.

loans.name: Alba Marisol

texts.es: Alba de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol  y adicional a esto vende ropa, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde siembra está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio; ella quiere realizar una nueva inversión que le permita aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, herramientas, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, etc. Alba tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Alba, 32, lives in her own house with her life partner and their two daughters. 

She farms corn and beans as well as sells clothes. 

She has worked in farming for several years and has very valuable experience which allows her to have the best crops. The land where she grows crops is in a high farming area and very close to her house. 

She does business throughout the community and has a large clientele as everyone knows her products are high quality at reasonable prices and come with good service.
 
She wants a new loan which will allow her to increase her production. 

This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, pest control etc. 

Alba has good payment references and assures that she will be able to pay off the loan. At the same time she hopes to bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, pest control etc.

loans.name: Xiomara Griselda

texts.es: Xiomara tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su  pequeño hijo de 7 años de edad. Xiomara se dedica al comercio de ropa nueva y sandalias de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad. Gracias a la variedad y buenos productos que ofrece ya cuenta con variedad de clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Xiomara desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la luz eléctrica dado que no cuenta con el servicio que tanta falta le hace para buen desarrollo de su hijo.
texts.en:
Xiomara is 24 and lives in her own house, together with her partner and their small 7-year-old son. She works as a street trader, selling new clothes and sandals in the main shopping areas around her neighbourhood. Thanks to the range of high-quality goods she offers, she already has lots of customers who daily choose to use her services.

She would like to improve her living conditions and those of her family, which is why she is asking for this loan through FUSAI to invest in the installation of electric lighting. This is something that is really necessary for her son's proper development.

loans.use: to have her house connected to the electric supply.

loans.name: Ana Gladis

texts.es: Ana de 57 años de edad de un familiar con su nuera y su nieto. Ana se caracteriza por ser una mujer honesta, trabajadora y sobre todo muy emprendedora. Hace varios años que logro establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia y gracias a Dios y a su arduo trabajo y dedicación el negocio es muy reconocido en la zona por lo que ya cuenta con mucha clientela. Para ella es muy importante mantener activo este negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la tienda tales como: huevos, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, leche, frijoles, pan dulce y de más artículos que parezcan atractivos para los clientes. De esta manera espera lograr su sueño de seguir mantenido activo su negocio y por consecuencia seguir trabajando para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Ana, 57, lives with her daughter-in-law and grandson. 

Ana is characterized as a very honest, hard working and above all entrepreneurial woman. 

Several years ago she was able to open a small store in her home and thanks to God and her hard work and effort the business is very well known in her neighborhood where she has most of her clientele. 

For her it is very important to keep the business active as it is her main source of income. 

This is why she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in merchandise for the store such as eggs, sodas, sugar, rice, milk, beans, pastries etc to stay attractive to her clients. 

This way she hopes to reach her dream to keep her business alive and keep working for a better quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy eggs, sodas, sugar, rice, milk, beans, pastries etc

loans.name: Amparo Noemi

texts.es: Amparo de 47 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar junto a su hija, Amparo es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en cual consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para Amparo  lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de artículos de tienda al por mayor, con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRLAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño de mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Amparo is 47 years old. She lives in a relative's home with her daughter. Amparo is an entrepreneurial, determined woman. A few years ago, she decided to open a small business which was a small store. With great effort and dedication, she has maintained it throughout the years. She has many customers since the customers are the most important thing to Amparo. She always greets them with a smile and lots of friendliness which, along with the fact that she always has what the customers are looking for, is why she has earned the trust of many people in the area.

She has decided to invest in her business by purchasing items in bulk so that she can attract more customers, which will increase her sales and income. This is why she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL, so that she can invest in her store and stock it with products like rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergent, and other products that customers will enjoy. 

She reports that this is how she will achieve her dream of improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergent, and other products.

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es: Maria de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos que actualmente estudian, Ella posee un negocio donde vende articulos para fiestas infantiles como: gorritos, dulces, piñatas, juguetes, vasos, platos, tenedores, etc.  tiene clientela que la buscan porque  siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con productos de excelente calidad a precios realmente accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Maria es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, esta dispuesta a hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mas mercadería por mayor y surtir mas su negocio, ella  tiene la confianza que con su dedicación podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her husband, and three children who are currently in school. María has a business selling items for children's parties, such as hats, sweets, piñatas, toys, cups, plates, forks and the like. María has customers who come to her shop because she always has the items that customers need, and the products are of good quality and available at affordable prices, and the service is unbeatable. María is an enterprising woman, with a great desire to get ahead. She wants to expand her business and so is applying to Apoyo Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy more merchandise in bulk in order to stock up her business more. María is confident is that, with dedication, she will be able to give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy party hats, sweets, piñatas, toys, cups, plates, forks and more in bulk.

loans.name: Mirian Yesenia

texts.es: Mirian de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su grupo familiar. Ella se gana la vida por medio de la venta de productos de belleza de catalogo lo cual le permite colaborar con los gastos del hogar dado que con lo que gana su esposo no logran cubrir todas las necesidades básicas de la familia. Mirian desea terminar de construir un cuarto para adecuar su cocina por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y lámina. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso pero expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Mirian is 23 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and family. She makes a living selling beauty products out of catalogues, allowing her to help with household costs. Mirian's husband does not earn enough to pay for all of the family's basic necessities. Mirian wants to finish building a room where she can install a kitchen. To do this, she is applying for a loan in order to invest in buying bricks, cement, sand and metal laminate sheeting. Mirian hopes to be able to count on this loan as she does not have the available capital to pay for this. She is, however, able to make the repayments.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and laminate metal sheeting in order to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Dina Del Carmen

texts.es: Dina tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 14 años de edad quien se encuentra estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Dina se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva en diferentes zonas de su localidad. Tiene tres años de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha clientela. Dina habita en condiciones muy humildes y desea reparar las paredes de la vivienda dado que se encuentran deterioradas ya que son de madera y los insectos han anidado en ella. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para dar inicio a la reparación de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Dina, 44, lives in her own house with her 14 year old son who studies at the public school in their town. Dina sells new rope in different areas of her town. She has worked in this job for three years and already has many customers. 

Dina lives in very humble conditions and wishes to repair the wood walls of her home as they have deteriorated and insects have nested inside them. 

For this reason, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI so she can invest in the purchase of galvanized sheet metal and wood to start the repair of her home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal and wood to repair the walls of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 27 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
The client, 27 years old, lives in her own home with her three children. She is well-known in the area where she lives for her humility and her commitment to her work. She has never let herself be beaten and she has always made progress with her troubles.

With hard work and dedication, she has a store where she sells products that fill basic needs: staple foods, milk, eggs, rice, and other items. She is very dedicated to her work and very helpful when it comes to selling. That's why she has clients who look for her and prefer her for her products.

She has seen the necessity to stock the store a bit more, due to increasing demand, and she doesn't have the capital to do so. So she is requesting a credit to buy more products such as staple foods, instant products, sweets, drinks, etc.

She trusts in God that the help requested will be given soon, and she won't have any other worry than to bring home the daily sustenance.

loans.use: to buy staple foods, instant products, sweets, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia de 43 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus hijos, ella tiene un negocio de salon de belleza desde hace varios años en su lugar de residencia trabaja de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar. Sonia  solicita un credito para poder comprar productos para su salon de belleza como: cremas, shampoos, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y asi podra obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Sonia, 43, lives with her husband and their children. She has had a beauty salon business for several years in her place of residence. She works from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM. She has a large clientele since she works really well. With the profits she obtains and with the help of her husband, they achieve covering the expenses of her home. Sonia is applying for a loan to be able to buy products for her beauty salon like: creams, shampoos, hairpins, scissors, among other things that she needs. Thus, she will be able to obtain more profits which will help her have a better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoos, hairpins, scissors, among other things.

loans.name: Victoria Maribel

texts.es: Victoria tiene 46 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Victoria se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su pequeña tienda que ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía de su hogar y dan a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Victoria solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de malla ciclón, cemento, arena y hierro para construir un cerco perimetral en su vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a sus pocas pertenencias y a su familia.
texts.en:
Victoria, age 46, lives in her own house with her husband and their children.  Victoria sells basic needs products in her small store, which she managed to establish at her house.  She is a very hard-working woman.  Together, she and her husband maintain the household finances and give their children better living conditions.

Victoria is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to buy cyclone fencing, cement, sand, and iron in order to build a fence surrounding her house.  This will  provide greater security for their few belongings and for her family.

loans.use: to buy cyclone fencing, cement, sand, and iron in order to build a fence surrounding her house.

loans.name: Marta Yanira

texts.es: Marta de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa de la hermana con sus dos hijos y sus dos sobrinos. Ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como arroz, frijoles, leche, golosinas, entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con productos de excelente calidad a precios realmente accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Marta es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere sentirse ganadora y para lograr el éxito sus mayores secretos son la constancia y la dedicación, esta dispuesta a hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, embutidos, golosinas, bebidas etc. ella tiene la confianza que con su dedicación podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marta, 40, is a single mother who lives in her sister's house with her two children and her two nephews. She owns a store where she sells staple goods like rice, beans, milk, snacks, among others. Lately, she has gained many customers, since she always has what the people need with products of excellent quality at really accessible prices and with unmatched service. Marta is an enterprising woman with much desire to get ahead. She wants to feel like a winner and to achieve success, her greatest secrets are consistency and dedication. She is ready to make her business grow. Therefore, she has applied for a loan from INTEGRAL, which permits her to buy basic grains, instant products, meats, snacks, drinks, etc. She has the confidence that with her dedication, she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, meats, snacks, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es: Rosa tiene 42 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y tres hijos de 10 años, 12 años y 17 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Rosa trabaja muy duro como costurera para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de proteger sus pocos pertenencias solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de un cuarto el cual se encuentra en mal estado y desea reparar. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
Rosa is 42 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their three children; they are 10, 12, and 17 years old and they go to school. Rosa works very hard as a seamstress to earn a living and put food on the table. 

With the goal of protecting her few belongings, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the repair of a room that is in bad condition and needs repair. With the amount requested, she will buy metal sheeting and wood.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting and wood to repair a room.

loans.name: Sonia Aracely

texts.es: Sonia tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de dos años de edad. Sonia se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva desde hace un año. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad y gracias a los buenos precios y buena atención a los cliente ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Sonia dese hacer la instalación de la luz eléctrica dado que no cuenta con el servicio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del servicio que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en:
Sonia is 25 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her spouse and their two-year-old daughter.  For the past year, Sonia has worked selling new clothing.  She sells the clothing door-to-door in different areas of her city.  Thanks to her fair prices and good service, she has many customers that choose her. 

Sonia wishes to install electricity in her home because at the moment she does not have any.  For this, she is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in installing the service which they truly need.

loans.use: install electricity service.

loans.name: Rosa Deysi

texts.es: Rosa vive en casa propia con su esposo. Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; Rosa es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando luchando por salir adelante. Para ella el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Rosa tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in her own house with her husband. She has a business selling clothing and sells different styles for everyone; men, women, boys and girls. The clothing she sells is of a very high quality and she sells it at affordable prices. Because of this she has gained a lot of customers recently.

Rosa is very active and is always working and striving to make progress in life. For Rosa the resolve and courage she puts into her work are directed towards seeing the business grow so she can have a better future. 

This is why she decided to apply to INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy a variety of clothing such as skirts, trousers, blouses, t-shirts, suits etc. By doing this she will always be able to satisfy the needs of her customers. Rosa hopes that in this way she will be able to give her family financial security and a full life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing such as skirts, trousers, blouses, t-shirts, suits etc.

loans.name: Humberto Guillermo

texts.es: Humberto de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el posee un pequeño chalet ubicado en la escuela que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, los alumnos lo prefieren porque tiene variedad de productos y a buen precio, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario como: golosinas, frutas, dulces, paletas, aguas, gaseosas, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Humberto is 42 years old and lives in his own house with his family. He has a small stall in the school which is near his home. He has had the business for many years and this has given him sales experience which enables him to make better profits. The students prefer him because he has a wide range of products at a good price. Humberto wants to increase the business and make a further investment but he needs capital. 

This is why he is asking for a loan which will enable him to buy what he needs, such as  sweets, fruit, lollipops, water, fizzy drinks, soft drinks etc. He gives assurances that he will pay off the loan and at the same time he believes it will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sweets, fruit, lollipops, water, fizzy drinks, soft drinks etc.

loans.name: Elba Rubidia

texts.es: Elba vive en casa propia con su madre, ella es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace varios años se decidió en poner una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de estos años, Cuenta con mucha clientela que la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos buscan, Elba solicita un prestamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que dede esta manera logrará tener junto con su madre una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elba lives in her own house with her mother. She is an entrepreneurial woman and a fighter. Several years ago she decided to open a small store. With effort and dedication she has managed to maintain it through the years. She has many customers who prefer her because she always has what they are looking for.  

Elba is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in her little store and stock it with all kinds of products, such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergent and other products that are appealing to customers. She is confident that in this manner she will attain a better quality of life for her and her mother.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Carmen Guadalupe

texts.es: Carmen de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida quien trabaja como agricultor y sus tres hijos, Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su casa desde hace varios años trabaja de lunes a domingo, tiene mucha clientela pues es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, con las ganancias que obtiene y la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de us hogar. Carmen solicta un credito para comprar maiz por quintales para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica con su familia.
texts.en:
Carmen is 33 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband, who is a farmer, and her three children.  She makes and sells tortillas in her home and has for several years.  She works Monday through Sunday and has many customers because she is very hardworking and friendly.  She helps her husband pay for the household expenses with her earnings.

Carmen is asking for a loan to buy quintals of corn to continue making tortillas and increase income so she can have better financial stability with her family.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, Hace varios años que logro establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia y gracias a Dios y a su arduo trabajo y dedicación el negocio es muy reconocido en la zona por lo que ya cuenta con mucha clientela.
