Para Martha es muy importante mantener activo este negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Para ella lo más importante son los clientes ya que sabe que manteniéndolos satisfechos con el servicio que presta seguirán prefiriéndola y su negocio seguiría siempre activo tal como es su sueño. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la tienda tales como: huevos, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, leche, frijoles, pan dulce y de más artículos que parezcan atractivos para los clientes. De esta manera espera lograr su sueño de seguir mantenido activo su negocio y por consecuencia seguir trabajando para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Martha lives in a home of her own with her husband and two children.  She set up a small store in her home several years ago, and thanks to God and her arduous work and dedication, the business is well known in the area and she has many customers.  For Martha, keeping this business active is very important because it’s her main source of income.  For her, the most important thing is to keep her customers happy with the service.  She will continue to perfect it and her business will remain active, as is her dream.  For this reason she decided to request this loan through INTEGRAL so she can buy items for the store such as eggs, snacks, sugar, rice, milk, beans, sweet bread, and other things that her customers need.  In this way she hopes to achieve her dream of continuing to keep her business active and working toward having a better life with her family

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Josefa Antonia

texts.es: Doña josefa vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a trabajar en su molino, procesando todo tipo de alimentos, como maiz, frijoles, hárinas, salsas, entre otros. Tiene ya algún tiempo con el negocio y posee amplia experiencia que le ayuda a generar muy buenas ganancias, es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefieren por la calidad, por los precios accesibles y por el servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, es una mujer emprendedor, dedicado a su labor y muy decidida a luchar por sus sueños, esta trabajando muy duro todos los días para no decepcionar a su familia, se siente satisfecha y muy cómoda con su negocio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por el servicio y sus dos molinos ya no le dan abasto por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar un molino nuevo de trabajo. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevará seguridad económica a su familia.
texts.en: Josefa lives in her own home with her husband and three children.  She works at a mill, processing all kinds of food, such as corn, beans, flours, salsas, and other things.  She’s had this business for some time and has lots of experience that helps her have good earnings.  She is well known by the people in her area and has lots of customers who prefer to buy from her because of the quality and good prices and excellent service.  She is very enterprising and very dedicated to her work and strives toward her dreams.  She is working very hard daily so as not to disappoint her family.  She feels satisfied and very comfortable with her business.  Customer demand for her services has increased in the past weeks and her two mills can no longer keep up.  She is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so she can buy a new mill.  She has good credit references and is committed to paying off her debt and has faith that she will provide financial security to her family.

loans.use: to buy a new mill.

loans.name: Rogelio Walter Antonio

texts.es: Rogelio tiene 32 años de edad y junto a su compañera de vida han procreado dos hijos de 8 años y un año de edad. Rogelio trabaja como promotor en un programa cercano a su loocalidad lo cual le permite llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Regelio habita en condiciones muy humildes  junto a su familia y hace algunos meses comenzó a construir su vivienda con material más resistente la cual no ha logrado terminar por falta de recursos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, polines y lámina para terminar paredes y el techo de la vivienda.
texts.en: Rogelio is 32 years old.  He and his life partner have two kids, an eight-year-old and a one-year-old.  Rogelio works as a promoter for a program near to where he lives and this is how he covers his household expenses.  Rogelio and his family live in very humble circumstances.  A few months ago he started building a house out of more durable materials but he has not been able to finish it due to a lack of resources.  For this reason he has requested this loan from FUSAI to spend on bricks, cement, sand, beams, and sheet metal to finish the walls and roof of the house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, beams, and sheet metal to finish the walls and roof of his house

loans.name: Oscar Esauth

texts.es: Oscar de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y dos hijos de 10 y 3 años de edad. Oscar se dedica a la realización de estructuras metálicas como puertas, ventanas, cercas, etc. Oscar trabaja muy duro dado que desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Con el fin de mejorar la seguridad de sus pocas pertenencias y la de sus hijos y esposa solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea terminar de construir un cuarto dormitorio  y para construir una fosa séptica. Con el crédito comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento dado que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Oscar is 39 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and two children aged 10 and 3. Oscar earns a living making metal items such as doors, windows, fences etc. Oscar works very hard since he wants to improve the living conditions for himself and his family.

In order to improve the security of his few belongings and his wife and children, he is asking FUSAI for this loan as he wants to finish building a fourth bedroom and to build a septic tank. He will use the loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron etc. He hopes to be able to get the loan since he does not have the available capital to cover the payment. He does, however, have enough to pay the loan instalments.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks and iron to finish building a fourth bedroom and to build a septic tank.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan tiene 43 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia junto a su madre, hermanos y sobrino. Juan se gana la vida trabajando como albañil desde hace 20 años y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Juan ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica dado que no cuenta con el servicio y desea dar mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 43 years old and is single. He lives in his own house with his mother, siblings and nephew. For the last 20 years Juan has earned a living working as a bricklayer and this is how he provides for the household. 

Juan has decided to ask FUSAI for this loan to pay for the installation of electricity, which they do not currently have. He wants to give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Ruben Antonio

texts.es: Ruben tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y dos hijos. Ruben se gana la vida trabajando como albañil desde hace 20 años y de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar y mantiene la economía de su familia. Las condiciones de su vivienda son muy humildes y desea mejorar las condiciones de uno de los cuartos por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para levantar el cuarto lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Ruben, age 39, lives in his own house with his life partner and two children.  Ruben has been earning a living by working as a bricklayer for 20 years.  This is the way he supports his household and manages his family’s finances.

The condition of his house is very humble.  He wishes to improve the condition of one of the rooms.  That is why he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron to raise the room as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron to build a room.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es: Concepción  tiene 47 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos (19 años, 17 años, 15 años y 2 años. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida por medio del cultivo y venta de hortalizas y verduras. De esta forma lleva el sustento a su familia y mantiene la economía de su hogar. Concepción y su compañero de vida están construyendo su vivienda con mucho esfuerzo pero no han logrado finalizar por falta de recursos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, lámina y polines para finalizar la vivienda y mudarse lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Concepción is 47 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their four children aged 19, 17, 15 and 2. She is a very hard-working woman who earns a living growing and selling vegetables. This is how she provides for her family and supports the household finances. Concepción and her partner are putting a lot of effort into building their own home but they have been unable to finish it due to a lack of resources.

This is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand, sheeting and beams to finish building her home so they can move in as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, sheeting and beams to finish building her home.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es: María tiene 63 años de edad y es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable quien se gana la vida por medio de la crianza y venta de cerdos, gallinas, pavos y patos. Además junto a su esposo también cultivan maíz, frijol y verduras. Son personas muy trabajadoras y muy responsable de quienes dan buenas referencia sus vecinos. María desea construir un pequeño cuento para su cocina para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, madera, cemento y arena y así poder construir su cocina lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María, age 63, is a very hard-working and responsible woman.  She earns a living by raising and selling pigs, chickens, turkeys, and ducks.  Also, she and her husband grow corn, beans, and vegetables.  They are very hard-working and very responsible people, and their neighbors give them good references.

María wishes to build a small kitchen.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to buy bricks, wood, cement, and sand.  This way she will be able to build her kitchen as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, wood, cement, and sand to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y le colaboran con la economía del hogar. María se dedica a la venta de tamales y variedad de antojitos típicos los cuales comercializa de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. María habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su grupo familiar y desea construir un cuarto para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacerlo por su cuenta. Con el crédito solicitado comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en: María is 49 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and children. Her children are now adults and help with household costs. María makes a living selling tamales and other typical snacks as a street vendor around the town. María lives in very humble conditions with her family and would like to build a room. To do this, she is applying for a loan from FUSAI as she does not have enough capital to carry out the work alone. María will use this loan to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron in order to build another room.

loans.name: Jose Martin

texts.es: Jose es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maiz y frijol; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en el granero que muestra la fotografia para luego salir a comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia. Jose solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
José's a very friendly and hardworking man.  He lives with his wife and his three children.

He works very hard growing corn and bean crops of very high quality on his own plot of land.  When his harvest is ready he stores it in the silo shown in the photograph, then goes out to sell it in the different markets near his home.

José's asking Integral for a loan so he has the money he needs to buy pest controls, fertilizer, soil amendments, seeds, and other agricultural inputs for farming.  He's eager to increase his sales so he can earn more profits and give his family better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy pest controls, fertilizer, soil amendments, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Marina De La Paz

texts.es: Doña marina vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de yuca y papa frita, enchiladas, pastelitos de carne, etc. comercializa de forma ambulante por la diferentes colonias, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Marina esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios como: papas, yuca, verduras, maíz, carne, etc. y así poder seguir con su trabajo y tener junto a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marina lives in her own home with her son. She sells yuca and fried potatoes, enchiladas, meat pastries, etc. She sells as a street vendor around the various neighborhoods. With the earnings she gets from her sales she manages to cover some household expenses.

Marina is requesting a loan so that she can buy the ingredients she needs, such as: potatoes, yuca, vegetables, corn, meat, etc. In this way she will be able to continue with her work, so that she and her son can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, yuca, vegetables, corn, meat, etc.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 8 y 6 años de edad, el se dedica desde hace 15 años a la crianza de ganado de repasto, adicional a eso también se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Rafael esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado de repasto para seguir con la crianza y así poder obtener mejores ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rafael is 47 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and his two children, 8 and 6 years old. He has made a living for 15 years raising livestock for fattening. In addition to this, he also makes a living cultivating corn and beans.

He sells his products in the surrounding areas of the zone. With what he obtains from his sales he is able to settle some expenses that his home presents him. 

Rafael is requesting a loan for the purchase of livestock for fattening to continue with the breeding and so be able to obtain a better income and provide his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase livestock for fattening.

loans.name: Daysi Elizabeth

texts.es: Daysi tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a sus dos hermanos de 25 años y 17 años de edad. Daysi es una joven trabajadora y responsable quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos. Daysi solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro ya que desea construir un cuarto para cocina ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Daysi is 22 years old and lives in her own home along with her two siblings ages 25 and 17.  Daysi is a young hard-working and responsible woman who is dedicated to offering domestic services.  Daysi is asking for a loan from Kiva partner FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of bricks, sand, cement and iron since she wants to build a room for a kitchen.  She does not have sufficient capital on her own to be able to pay for the materials without a loan.

loans.use: To purchase bricks, sand, cement, and iron in order to construct a room for a kitchen.

loans.name: Gabriela Carolina

texts.es: Gabriela tiene 19 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y ricas pupusas en su hogar de habitación. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a la venta por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes quienes cada día la prefieren más. Ella habita junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de un año de edad. Su deseo es mejorar el piso de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena y grava para dar inicio al encementado del piso lo antes posible y así dar a su hija condiciones más higiénicas.
texts.en: Gabriela is 19 years old and makes a living selling staple goods and "pupusas" (cheese tortillas stuffed with meat and beans) from her home. She has a lot of time for this sales work and so has many customers who prefer her store. Gabriela lives with her partner and their one-year-old daughter. Gabriela's dream is to improve the floor in her home. She is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy the necessary materials, such as a cement, sand and gravel. She can then start to cement the floor as soon as possible and thus give her daughter cleaner living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to cement the floor of her home.

loans.name: Santos Maritza

texts.es: Santos de 34 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con su esposo y sus tres hijos, Ella posee una tortillería en su residencia, ya tiene muchos años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene un excelente servicio, es muy amable con las personas que la visitan siempre tiene una sonrisa en el rostro para ellos, además tiene gran agilidad para la elaboración de las mismas y atiende a los clientes en poco tiempo. Santos es muy dedicada en su trabajo para ella las batallas más importantes de la vida son las que peleamos diariamente para alcanzar nuestros sueños y ella está dispuesta a esforzarse por su objetivo es por eso que le solicita a ITNEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor para seguir produciendo. Santos tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará a su familia una seguridad económica en el hogar.
texts.en:
Santos is 34 years old and lives in a rented home with her husband and their three children. She has a small tortilla factory in her home, and already has many years in the business. She has acquired a large number of customers as she provides excellent service. She is very friendly with the people who visit her and always has a smile on her face for them. As well, she is very quick in making the tortillas and serves the clients in a few minutes.

Santos is very dedicated in her work. For her the most important battles in life are those we fight daily to achieve our dreams, and she is prepared to do her very best to reach her objective. That is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy corn at wholesale so that she can continue producing. 

Santos hopes that in this way she will give her family and household financial security.

loans.use: To buy corn at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 25 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 4 años a la venta y elaboración de tamales, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, La clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de los tamales como maíz, pollos, verduras, tomates, utensilios de cocina, etc.  para continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poder tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 25 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their three children. She has been making and selling tamales for four years, and her business is located in her home. She has many customers because of the good prices and her friendliness at the time of sale. 

The client is requesting a loan to buy the necessary supplies for making the tamales, such as corn, chicken, vegetables, tomatoes, kitchen utensils, etc. This is so that she can continue with her work, as it is her only source of income, and so that she and her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn, chicken, vegetables, tomatoes, kitchen utensils, etc.

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es: María tiene 53 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo  y sus tres hijos de 22 años, 20 años y 28 años de edad. María se dedica a la costura. Realiza variedad de hamacas, colchas y manteles los cuales luego comercializa en su casa de habitación y gracias a su carisma y buenos productos que ofrece ya cuenta con variedad de clientes que cada día la prefieren más. María desea invertir en su negocio ya que necesita la materia prima para seguir trabando y ofreciendo sus productos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de telas, hilos, agujas, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder mejorar sus ingresos en la medida que las ventas aumenten.
texts.en:
María, 53, lives in her own home with her husband and their three children, ages 22, 20 and 28.  She is a seamstress and makes a variety of hammocks, bedspreads and tablecloths that she sells from home.  Thanks to her charisma and quality products she has several customers who prefer her products over others.

María wants to invest in her business because she needs raw materials to continue her work.  She has requested a loan through FUSAI to buy fabric, thread, needles, etc.  She hopes to receive the loan so she can improve her income by increasing sales.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, frijoles, leche entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con productos de excelente calidad a precios realmente accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere sentirse ganadora y para lograr el éxito sus mayores secretos son la constancia y la dedicación, esta dispuesta a hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, embutidos, golosinas, bebidas etc. ella tiene la confianza que con su dedicación podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa is 35 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and kids. She has a store where she sells basic products like rice, beans, and milk, among others things. Lately, she has had a lot of clients since she always has what people need with products of excellent quality at really accessible prices and with unbeatable service. Rosa is an enterprising woman with the will to move forward, she wants to be a success, and to be able to achieve success, her biggest secrets are perseverance and dedication. She is ready to grow her business, and for this she requests from INTEGRAL a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, instant food, cold cuts, candies, drinks etc. She has the confidence that with her dedication she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant food, cold cuts, candies, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: A sus 60 años de edad Manuel se gana la vida por medio del cultivo de maíz y frijoles y por medio de un pequeño comedor que ha logrado establecer donde vende variedad de platillos y bebidas. Es un hombre muy trabajador y visionario quien desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Con el fin de percibir una mayor cantidad de ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposa y de su hija ha tomado la decisión de invertir en  su comedor ya que desea abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado que le permita alcanzar su sueño. Con el monto solicitado comprará bebidas, arroz, frijoles, carnes y verduras. Confía que con los ingresos que percibe de su negocio logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
At 60 years old, Manuel earns a living by growing corn and beans, as well as through the small eatery he managed to open, where he sells different meals and drinks.  He is a hardworking and visionary man who wishes to improve his and his family's living conditions.  With the goal of increasing his income in order to improve his wife and daughter's quality of life, he has decided to invest in his restaurant because he wants to cover a larger share of the market, which will allow him to reach his dream.

With the amount he has requested, he will purchase beverages, rice, beans, meat and vegetables.  He is confident that with the earnings from his business, he will be able to pay off his debt from the loan.

loans.use: purchase beverages, rice, beans, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Idalia Del Carmen

texts.es: Idalia de 46 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su familia, ella tiene un puesto de venta de tortillas desde hace muchos años razón por la cual ya es muy conocida en la zona y los clientes la prefieren por brindar un buen servicio y sobre todo higiene y buenos precios en sus tortillas. Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora cada día se pregunta cómo puede mejorar sus ingresos para poder dar a su familia, Esto le dio la idea de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar maiz por mayor y cal, Tiene mucha Fe que tendrá éxito con la decisión tomada y sus condiciones de vida poco a poco se irán trasformando de manera positiva.
texts.en: Idalia is 46 years old and lives in her own home with her family. Idalia has had a stall where she sells tortillas for many years and so is well-known in the local area. Customers prefer Idalia over other business because she provides good service, and is hygienic and has good prices. Idalia is plucky and enterprising woman and every day she is looking for ways to improve her income in order to provide for her family. She thus had the idea to apply for this loan from "Apoyo Integral" in order to buy corn in bulk, and lime. Idalia has a lot of faith that she will be successful in her decision and that, little by little, her living conditions will improve.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk and lime.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: Paulina de 63 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus dos hijos quienes trabajan y su nieto quien estudia actualmente. ella es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un negocio en cual consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para Paulina lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de artículos de tienda al por mayor, con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRLAL para poder invertir en su tienda con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Paulina is 63 years old and lives in her own house with her two children - who work - and her grandson - who is in school. Paulina is a plucky and enterprising women. Some years ago she decided to start her own little shop and, with a lot of effort and dedication she has kept it going over the years. Paulina has many customers and for her they are the most important thing. She always gives them friendly service, and it is always with a smile. As a result Paulina has won the confidence of many locals, also because she has the products that customers need. Paulina has decided to invest in her business and to buy items for the shop in bulk. With these items she can attract more customers, allowing her to improve her sales and income. To do this, Paulina has applied for a loan from "Apoyo Integral" in to invest in her store by buying all types of products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, oil, paper, detergent and other products for her customers. Paulina is confident that, will this loan, she will achieve her dream of improving her and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, oil, paper, detergent and more.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria de 56 años de edad vive con su familia, es una mujer luchadora y responsable para que a su familia no le falte lo necesario para la subsistencia. Actualmente trabaja vendiendo comida cerca de su lugar de residencia cerca de una zona indudustrial desde hace varios años tiene mucha clientela fija pues da a un buen precio el plato de comida, Maria desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima como: pollos, carnes, verduras, arroz, frutas, frijoles, pescado, etc. para variar su menú y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que solicita un crédito para comprar lo dicho; y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo necesario sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en: María is 56 years old and lives with her family. She is an enterprising and responsible women and works so that her family does not need for anything. María currently works selling meals near to her house, close to an industrial area. She has done this work for a number of years and has many regular customers as she sells her dishes for a good price. María would like to expand her stall by buying chairs, tables and more supplies such as chicken, meat, vegetables, rice, fruit, beans, fish and more. She can then vary the menu more and earn a higher income. María does not have enough capital to carry out this investment alone and so is applying for a loan to do it. She can then earn higher profits in order to give her family everything that they need.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables and more supplies such as chicken, meat, vegetables, rice, fruit, beans, fish and more.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José tiene 55 años edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijas de 24 años, 19 años y 17 años de edad. José es un hombre muy emprendedor quien todos los días recorre las calles de su localidad para ofrecer billetes de lotería. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos ha solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de billetes de lotería ya que este es su principal fuente de ingresos y desea mantenerlo activo mientras pueda.
texts.en:
José is 55 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his wife, and their three daughters who are 24, 19 and 17 years old.  José is an enterprising man who works everyday walking the streets of his town selling lottery tickets.  This is how he earns a living, and provides for his family.  

With the goal of increasing his income, he has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in his business by purchasing a large quantity of lottery tickets since this is his main source of income, and he wants to keep it active while he still can.

loans.use: purchase a large quantity of lottery tickets.
